ESP.ORIGINAL: >\ Get Beauty, Moira and Chester out of the ammo box by the shelf. Give them to Willow in dialogue before you return here to move to BFF. Then after you reach BFF talk to her again to choose Friends or Romance. Then come here to complete quest. If you wait to talk about her personal topics until after BFF there is one topic to use to cheat through them all. You can still go to RepConn to buy J.T.
ESP.TRADUIT: >\得到红颜步枪，莫伊拉和切斯特在弹药箱旁边的架子上。在你和她成为挚友之前通过把他们给维儿。成为挚友后谈话，选择友情或者爱情。然后来这里完成任务。如果你迫不及待地谈论她的个人问题，直到成为挚友后，有一个对话选项用来欺骗她。你仍旧可以去REPCONN买J.T

ESP.ORIGINAL: Schematics - Teddy Bear Charges
ESP.TRADUIT: 原理图 - 维儿的泰迪熊炸弹

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow, at a workbench, combine:
3 Sticks of Dynamite Wires taken from Scrap Electronics A salvaged watch 1 Teddy Bear
Oh, be careful. These are funny, but very powerful! I recommend that you throw the bear and run like hell the other way.
- Ron
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿,去工作台组装这些东西:
3支炸药
电子废料
表(Salvaged)
泰迪熊一只
哦,对了一定要小心点.这很有趣,但非常危险!我建议你把熊扔出去后能跑多远就跑多远
-罗恩

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agreement with Mr. Williams
ESP.TRADUIT: 威廉姆斯先生的协议

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You will pursue Michael Jefferson, the ghoul that took and killed my two sons, into Nevada and capture him and bring him back to me alive.
If you bring him to me alive I will give you $1000 NCR.
If you kill him, or he is dead by someone else's hand, but you bring me his head, I'll pay you $500 NCR.
Any other outcome and you will receive nothing from me.
The latest intel I have from my investigator is that Jefferson is heading for a small town south of New Vegas. There's a cult there led by a ghoul named Jason Bright. Jefferson thinks he will be safe hidden among the other zombies. We bribed his lover for this information and we believe it to be reliable.
John Williams
ESP.TRADUIT:
你要一路追踪迈克尔杰佛森,这个人杀了他的两个孩子.进去内华达荒原并把他活着带回来.
如果你办到了就可以得到一千NCR币,但如果你把他打死了,或者他已经死了,那么就把他的头带回来.我会付你五百块NCR币.
如果发生任何其他的情况你都休想从我这里得到一个子儿.
最新的情报显示他正躲在维加斯南边的一个小城里,有一个叫杰森布莱特的家伙领导着他们.杰佛森一定以为他会在那里很安全.我们贿赂了他的小情人,所以这条信息应该非常可靠

ESP.ORIGINAL: She Likes You, She Likes You Not...
ESP.TRADUIT: 她喜欢你,她不喜欢你....

ESP.ORIGINAL:
She Likes You, She Likes You Not...
-This is Willow's main quest in which you will gain Willow's friendship and perhaps more... -Some things you do will make Willow happy or unhappy. You will know when you've made her happy or unhappy by a sound that plays when points are awarded or taken away from you. This process begins as soon as you meet her. -Once Willow has joined you, there will be an item added to your apparel inventory that you can equip, at any time, to get the number of points you have at that time. -There are many benefits of gaining her friendship and you will discover them over time as your relationship with her progresses.
Good luck and have fun!
:) llama
ESP.TRADUIT:
她喜欢你,她不喜欢你...
你在此阶段的目标就是让维儿足够喜欢你,并且成为你的终生挚友.这点只能靠你达成一些特别的事件,并得到100点认可度来提高好感.当你使她开心或者不开心时可以通过不同的音效来判断.当维儿加入你后,就会有一个可以在装备后显示数值的的指示器添加到你的物品里.
你可以通过和她长期相处中所听,所闻,所谈论的各种信息来帮助自己获得她的友谊.你也可以在Pip小子里找到重要的提示线索.
玩的愉快!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's eating with you! How it works...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿正和你共同进餐!感觉如何?...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow's eating with you is for roleplaying purposes.
She will try to sit down to do it. If there is no appropriate seat nearby she won't be able to eat although she will remain standing and drink something.
She will eat and/or drink for two minutes and then return to following you. There is nothing more you need to do.
:) Have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT:
和你一起进餐是维儿更真实的角色扮演的一种体现,
她会试着坐下来进餐,但如果条件不允许的话她则不会这么做.她将站着喝点东西了事.
她会吃或者喝上两分钟的时间,然后继续跟随你.而且除了瞪眼看之外什么都不需要做
^^玩的开心

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Going Shopping! How it works...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿正在商店买东西!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow's shopping works like this:
She will need 15 or 20 caps per trip.
She finds caps of her own while following you, but she probably won't have enough if you take her shopping frequently. When you enter the area where she is supposed to talk to the trader, if she does nothing, go talk to her. She has a dialogue topic that allows you to give her caps if you want to. That topic only appears in those locations. She also has an Idle Chatter topic that alerts you when she has fewer than 20 caps.
The items she buys are ingredients for her own recipes and a couple of others that she will successfully cook if she has ingredients when you ask her to put out her campfire.
However, she doesn't buy everything she needs. Some things will need to be scavenged or gathered.
ESP.TRADUIT:
通常维儿的购物方式是这样的
她会需要15到20个瓶盖
在跟随你的时候她会为自己收集瓶盖,但通常来说如果你时常带她去的话这些显然是不够的.当你进入她要和交易商进行买卖的区域时,如果她什么都没做,就去和她发起对话.在对话树中有一个选项允许你给她任意数量的瓶盖.这个选项只会在这些地方出现.而且会有一些提示信息告诉你她身上的瓶盖不足20个了.
她买的所有东西都属于她自己,其中的一部分当你要求她点一堆营火时会被用来更好的为她的怪队友做饭,前提是有足够的材料.
她也可能需要很多额外的帮助来集齐这些材料用于制造东西.例如她不会为了维儿的星核克咖啡而买昂贵的饮品原料,而是去四处淘宝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alright losers, like I said before, go out and get me good stuff. I get tired of repeating myself so this is your last chance. I want weapons, chems, stuff that I can use or sell. Oh, and if you find anything nice I can give to Wendy that would be good. Jewelry or something she'll like.
I'm not going to Primm with the rest of those losers from NCRCF, not with the NCR sitting right at the gate so you're going to have to track me down. I'm going to catch up with Wendy and her friends. They're usually at The Raided Farmstead or at a place up on Highway 95 just south of Novac. To get to the Raided Farmstead go along the road that Nipton's on. If you keep going east you'll come to it soon enough. It's south of the road.
Find me when you have something good for me and I'll make it worth your while.
Stan
ESP.TRADUIT:
好了菜鸟,就像我曾经说的那样,滚出去给我找点好东西回来.我没一遍遍重复的习惯,所以这是最后一次了,我要武器,杂物,部件等等任何你能找来出售或者使用的东西.哦另外如果你找到什么特别好的东西了,我可以给温迪,这样会很好.她会喜欢珠宝之类的东西的.
我不会带着剩下那票NCRCF来的废物们去普瑞姆的,至少不会在NCR就驻扎他们门口的情况下,好让你小子把我轻易结果了.我会去追上温迪和她的朋友,通常她们都在 Raided Farmstead 或者95号高速路附近,靠近诺瓦镇的南边.要想到 Raided Farmstead 的话往下直走到尼普顿市那里.然后拐到东边直走就行了,他就在路南边.
等你找到些好玩意了就来找我,我会让你觉得这么做是值得的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Ant Stew
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的炖蚂蚁配方

ESP.ORIGINAL:
These are the ingredients I use to make Ant Stew:
Ant Meat x1 Carrot x1 Potato x1 Water Purified x1
I just throw these things together and let them cook.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿的炖蚂蚁配方:
蚂蚁肉 x1 胡萝卜 x1 土豆 x1 纯净水 x1
这就是一锅乱炖,哈哈哈.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Mantis Casserole
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的螳螂煲配方

ESP.ORIGINAL:
These are the ingredients I use to make Mantis Casserole:
Mantis Leg x1 Jalapeno Pepper x2 Blamco Mac and Cheese x1
This one is tricky to do at the campfire. It turns out better at home on the stove.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿的螳螂煲配方:
螳螂腿 x1 小绿椒 x2 布拉科芝士通心粉 x1
我可以在营火上给你做一份,但是烤炉能做的更好吃

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Cazador Egg Puff
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的大黄蜂蛋卷配方

ESP.ORIGINAL:
These are the ingredients I use to make the Cazador Egg Puff:
Brahmin Meat x1 Banana Yucca Fruit x2 Cazador Egg x1
This recipe is very hard to pull off. Well, it can be eaten no matter what, as long as you cook it until the egg is done, but it tastes best if you cook it just right.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿的大黄蜂蛋卷配方:
双头牛肉 x1 大土蕉 x2 大黄蜂蛋 x1
这道菜很难吃到,但是只要能弄到蛋并且煮熟了,肯定是废土最好吃的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gone to Mojave Outpost
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往莫哈维前哨站

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've decided to leave for the Mojave Outpost. If you still want J.T. once you've gotten the 250 caps together meet me there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决定离开莫哈维前哨站.如果你还想要J.T的话,拿250个瓶盖来这里见我

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Rescue
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:搜寻

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Great Robbery!!!
I was robbed. What a disaster! I lost Beauty, Chester and Moira; I'm heart broken. I got hurt in the scuffle and my leg is sore. I had enough stimpaks on me to heal up the worst of it, but it's really bothering me and is itching horribly. I hope that goes away soon.
But, I think that there might be something good to come out of it, as crazy as that sounds. How can losing Beauty be good? Well, someone found me on the road and is going to help me find my stuff.
And the someone! I don't want to jinx it so I'm just going to say this. I'm excited and am hoping for good things to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT:
大劫案!
我被抢了,神马社会啊!我的红颜步枪啊!切斯特啊!莫瑞拉啊!我的心啊....受伤了..好疼,腿也不能动了.我把所有的治疗针都用在腿上后才勉强站起来.但他现在完全派不上用场,希望能赶快好起来.
但是,我觉得还是有点好处的,多么疯狂的想法..丢掉红颜还能是什么好事?当然,有人在路上找到了我,而且决定帮我找回我的东西.
而这个某人!我实在不想把霉运带给他所以只好这么说了.希望老天爷开眼...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Ingredient List
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的原料表

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Apple Banana Yucca Fruit Blamco Mac and Cheese Brahmin Meat Broc Flower Carrot Empty Nuka-Cola Bottle Flour Gecko Meat Jalapeno Pepper Nuka Cola Pinyon Nuts Potato Purified Water Sarsaparilla Sugar Bombs Xander Root
These are the ingredients I need to make my favorite recipes. I need more than one of some of them to make a batch of something and, of course, we'd need to use a campfire to cook. I can set one up for us anytime. Willow :)
My favorite recipes: all my own recipes but I also like to make Gecko Steak and Gecko Kebabs
ESP.TRADUIT:
苹果, 大土蕉, 布拉科芝士通心粉 双头牛肉, 锦缎花 萝卜, 空核口可乐瓶子, 面粉, 蜥蜴肉, 小绿椒 核子可乐, 松子, 土豆, 纯水, 夕阳沙士, 甜麦炮弹, 山德根,
这些都是我需要的成分，用来打造我最喜欢的食谱。当然每种东西越多越好咯,然后我们就需要点起一堆营火做饭啦,这点随时都可以办到~小维儿^^
我最喜欢的食谱：都是我自己的配方，但我也可以做各种烤肉哦

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal San Francisco
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:旧金山

ESP.ORIGINAL:
San Francisco
I'm exhausted. We got into San Francisco yesterday morning early. I'm traveling with a guy named Harry, his brother Ron and their sister Joanne. They've been great companions. We stay up late every night laughing and telling stories around the campfire. It might be good to find someone new to travel with so I get some sleep for a change!
I'm determined to have a jacket made out of the hides of the geckos that killed Big George. I've been carrying the gecko hides around with me since Big George was killed. The trader that told me it could be done gave me the name of the woman who can do it and told me she's here somewhere. I'm going to find her no matter how long it takes. I'm going to wear a jacket made from those hides. Poor Big George deserves to be remembered. Stupid geckos.
:( I sure do miss him.
It's funny, but I never really liked gecko meat before, but since Big George died, I'm suddenly very fond of it and hunt them whenever I can. Maybe it's the sense of revenge I get every time I chew one of them into little bits.
Hmm. That sounds pretty savage. But dammit, they killed my dog!
ESP.TRADUIT:
旧金山
我真是太激动了,昨天上午早些时候我们到了旧金山市.我和一个叫哈利的人.他的兄弟罗恩,还有他们的妹妹乔安娜一起旅行.他们都是很好的搭档.每天夜里我们都在营火边大笑大闹着讲故事.也许现在可以找一些新朋友继续旅行,所以我倒下就睡,并且期待醒来后的大变化.
我决定用杀死大狗乔乔的那些臭蜥蜴的皮做一件夹克穿.自从大狗乔乔被杀了之后我就一直带着这只死爬虫.商人们告诉我说着附近的一个什么女人可以做到这点.我决定无论多远我都要找到她.我要把这个家伙的皮做成衣服穿!可怜的大狗乔乔值得我去怀念.蠢蜥蜴.
真的好想他啊T_T.
真有趣,但以前我从没喜欢过蜥蜴肉,不过自从大狗乔乔死了后我简直离不开这玩意了.也许是复仇的欲望驱使我一口一口把他们咬碎的
唔...这听上去实在太野蛮了.但是..去他的...他们可是杀了我的大狗乔乔啊! 旧金山
我真是太激动了,昨天上午早些时候我们到了旧金山市.我和一个叫哈利的人.他的兄弟罗恩,还有他们的妹妹乔安娜一起旅行.他们都是很好的搭档.每天夜里我们都在营火边大笑大闹着讲故事.也许现在可以找一些新朋友继续旅行,所以我倒下就睡,并且期待醒来后的大变化.
我决定用杀死大狗乔乔的那些臭蜥蜴的皮做一件夹克穿.自从大狗乔乔被杀了之后我就一直带着这只死爬虫.商人们告诉我说着附近的一个什么女人可以做到这点.我决定无论多远我都要找到她.我要把这个家伙的皮做成衣服穿!可怜的大狗乔乔值得我去怀念.蠢蜥蜴.
真的好想他啊T_T.
真有趣,但以前我从没喜欢过蜥蜴肉,不过自从大狗乔乔死了后我简直离不开这玩意了.也许是复仇的欲望驱使我一口一口把他们咬碎的
唔...这听上去实在太野蛮了.但是..去他的...他们可是杀了我的大狗乔乔啊!

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Willow are now friends...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在和维儿是朋友了...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've helped Willow recover her stolen items and she is very grateful. She now considers you a friend. To help you on your way to becoming BFFs and beyond here is a list of the gifts you can give to Willow that are guaranteed to make her happy. A dialogue topic will appear when you have one or more of these items in your inventory.
Teddy Bear, Intact Garden Gnome, Nuka Cola Quartz, Fancy Lad Snack Cakes, Bubblegum, Gumdrops and Junk Food.
You can give no more than one present a day.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找回了维儿被抢走的东西,她非常的开心.现在你和维儿是朋友了为了帮你尽快和维儿更进一步的发展,这里是一张绝对好使的礼物单子.当你的物品栏里有其中一样时就可以去跟维儿对话了.
泰迪熊,花园矮人,石英型核子可乐,奇想小子蛋糕，泡泡糖,橡皮糖,垃圾食品 你每天只能给她一样礼物

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Chester
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:切斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Chester
We found Chester today. I'm so happy.
I'm starting to like &PCName; more and more all the time. I wonder if we'll ever be more than friends? I think about it a lot.
I had a pretty good day today, found a couple of little things and some caps. I don't do nearly as much scavenging as I'd like, since I'm sticking close to &PCName; but I manage to pick up some stuff. As always, my watch obsession keeps me looking for them tucked in the pockets of clothes I find. I'm hoping I'll be lucky enough to find dynamite or gun powder or maybe even some more pencils wherever we end up going.
ESP.TRADUIT:
切斯特
我们今天找到切斯特了,我真是太高兴了
我开始越来越有点喜欢上 &PCName;了,我有点好奇不知道我们会不会不仅仅是朋友呢?我可能想的太多了..
今天真是太秒了,还找到了一些小玩意和瓶盖子.我不是整天像只小老鼠一样四处翻找的.但既然我得紧紧跟着 &PCName; .....恩..但我还是能偷空捡点小玩意的.我那非凡的观察力让我在找到的那些衣服兜里发现了不少东西.只是希望我够幸运能找到些炸药和弹药,甚至一大把铅笔,哦呵呵呵~

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Novac
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:诺瓦克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Novac
We went into a place called Novac today. There's a statue there that is completely amazing! It's so big there's a gift shop inside and snipers guard the town from inside its mouth! It sits at the edge of the courtyard to the motel in town. I loved everything about the motel. It reminded me so much of home, but instead of just a sign there's a magnificent, friendly statue that says hi to you whenever you come near.
ESP.TRADUIT:
诺瓦克
今天我们去了一个叫做诺瓦克的地方。那里有一个超大的恐龙雕像，真是太神奇了！大到里面甚至放得下一家礼品店，恐龙嘴里还有一个狙击手护卫着城镇道路！它位于镇上汽车旅馆的边上。我喜欢这家汽车旅馆的一切。它让我想起了回忆起家乡的点点滴滴，这个恐龙雕像就像是跟过路人打招呼一样，太可爱了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal CassCaravanSite
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:卡斯的商队残骸

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cass Caravan Site
We found Cass' caravan site today. The caravan had been totally destroyed. She was very upset. I felt bad for her.
ESP.TRADUIT:
卡斯的商队残骸
今天我们找到了卡斯的商队残骸。商队已被完全摧毁。她很沮丧。我为她感到难过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:莫哈维前哨站2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mojave Outpost Day 2
I spent most of today talking to people finding out everything I could about the Mojave and New Vegas. I got some good information. I don't know why I did it, but I asked about Bethie. No one I talked to has seen her. I knew it was pointless to ask, but I couldn't help myself. I was happy to see the NCR folks here; they made me feel welcome, although they don't seem overly happy to be here in the Mojave. There was a lot of legion talk, too. I don't like showing up here when war's so close to breaking out, but it's a problem I'm not going to worry about until I have to or until I see a legion guy coming at me. That's a scary thought. But that's why I've got Beauty! Oh, and last night I was having a drink and got into a fight! I haven't been in a fight in months. She was drunk and mean and she called me stupid and naive! Stupid and naive! I've been on the road for nearly two years, that stupid red-haired brahmin! We were both so angry I think it would have come to blows, but a Ranger came over and told us to calm down or he'd dump a bucket of water on us. A bucket of water! I felt like a seven year old. It was so embarrassing. I haven't lost my temper like that in a long, long time. But, oh, she made me so mad!!
ESP.TRADUIT:
莫哈韦前哨站第二天
我今天大部分时间都在与人们交谈，以了解莫哈韦沙漠和新维加斯的一切。我不知道为什么要这么做，但是我问起了贝西。我没有和她交谈过。我知道问这个问题毫无意义，但我还是忍不住。
我很高兴在这里见到NCR的人们。他们让我感到宾至如归，尽管他们似乎不太高兴待在这里。也有很多有关军团的谈论。当战争快要爆发时，我不希望出现在这里，但这我不必担心的，除非一个军团士兵找我。那是一个可怕的想法。但这就是为什么我拿着红颜步枪的原因！
哦，昨晚我酒后打架了！我好几个月没打架了。她喝醉了，骂我愚蠢和天真！我在这条路上已经走了近两年了，那个愚蠢的红发老娘们！我们俩都很生气，但是一名游骑兵走过来，告诉我们冷静一下，否则他会向我们倒水。一桶水！太尴尬了。我好长时间没有发脾气了。但是，哦，她让我非常生气！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:莫哈维前哨站2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mojave Outpost Day 2
I spent most of today talking to people finding out everything I could about the Mojave and New Vegas. I got some good information. I don't know why I did it, but I asked about Bethie. No one I talked to has seen her. I knew it was pointless to ask, but I couldn't help myself. I was happy to see the NCR folks here; they made me feel welcome, although they don't seem overly happy to be here in the Mojave. There was a lot of legion talk, too. I don't like showing up here when war's so close to breaking out, but it's a problem I'm not going to worry about until I have to or until I see a legion guy coming at me. That's a scary thought. But that's why I've got Beauty!
ESP.TRADUIT:
莫哈韦前哨站第二天
我今天大部分时间都在与人们交谈，以了解莫哈韦沙漠和新维加斯的一切。我不知道为什么要这么做，但是我问起了贝西。我没有和她交谈过。我知道问这个问题毫无意义，但我还是忍不住。
我很高兴在这里见到NCR的人们。他们让我感到宾至如归，尽管他们似乎不太高兴待在这里。也有很多有关军团的谈论。当战争快要爆发时，我不希望出现在这里，但这我不必担心的，除非一个军团士兵找我。那是一个可怕的想法。但这就是为什么我拿着红颜步枪的原因！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Mormon Fort
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:摩门要塞

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mormon Fort
We went to the Old Mormon Fort today and I saw a man that looks just like Val!! His name is Arcade and he's even a doctor. It's so weird. They even wear the same kind of glasses. I ran over to talk to him when I saw him, but he wouldn't say much. I don't know if I scared him or if he thought I was crazy because I was trying to talk to him even though I don't know him, but it was kind of funny the way he wouldn't say much to me. I miss Val. I'd love to hear his voice and talk to him. The Fort is in Freeside. Freeside is right outside The Strip, with rats running around on the street. And The Strip, with all the money, is just behind a gate; not too different than some other places I've seen. Oh, and The Fort is very, very old. It reminded me of The Lion, The Witch and the Wardrobe and fortresses and castles and towers. But, too bad, there are no princesses or magic here.
ESP.TRADUIT:
摩门要塞
今天我们去了老摩门要塞，我看到一个长得像瓦尔的男人！他叫阿凯德是个医生。好奇怪他们甚至戴着相同的眼镜。见到他时，我跑过去和他说话，但他没说太多。我不知道我吓着他还是他以为我疯了，因为即使我不认识他还是想和他说话，但是他不对我说太多，真是可笑。 我想念瓦尔。我很想听听他的声音并与他交谈。 摩门要塞在自由之城。自由之城就在赌城区外，老鼠在街上到处乱跑。金碧辉煌的赌城区就在大门后面。与我见过的其他地方没什么不同。 哦，摩门要塞很老很旧。它使我想起了狮子，女巫和衣柜，要塞，城堡和塔楼。但是，太糟糕了，这里没有公主或魔法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal J.T.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:J.T.

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. is dead. I'm so sad. He was a very good dog. I'll miss him very much. Poor puppy. I love you, J.T., wherever you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.死了我很难过。他是一只很好的狗。我会非常想念他的。可怜的小狗。我爱你，J.T。，无论你身在何处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Raul
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:劳尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Raul
Raul has been telling us his stories and they are all so tragic. It's no wonder he's so sad all the time. I wish there was more we could do for him. What he really needs is a woman. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT:
劳尔
劳尔一直在告诉我们他的悲惨故事。难怪他一直这么难过。我希望我们能为他做更多的事情。他现在真正需要的是一个女人的陪伴！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Boomtown
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:大炮族

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Boomtown!
We were in Boomtown today. What a place. It's gigantic. There's a plane there, which are things that are kind of like trains but they flew in the air like birds. They must have been so beautiful flying with those giant wings flapping in the sky. Oh! Better than that, we met Pearl, who's this very, very old lady. She seems very nice, but she reminded me of Madame Zelda. I kept expecting her to invite us to sit down so she could tell us our fortunes! I had to fight hard not to giggle at her and ask her when she did palm readings. Madame Zelda would only do them during the week of the full moon. Bethie and I always made sure to go get our palms read. It was so fun. When she died we stole her crystal ball from her trailer. I hope it's still in my room. oh! I hope mom hasn't cleaned my room! I bet she has. Grr! I'll get home someday and she'll have dumped half of my stuff!!!
ESP.TRADUIT:
大炮族！
今天我们在大炮族。好奇妙的地方，这里有巨大一架飞机，就像火车一样大的鸟一样飞在空中。那些巨大的翅膀在天上拍打着，它们一定非常美丽。
哦!更好的是，我们遇到了祖母珀尔，她是一位非常非常老的女士。她看上去很好，但让我想起了塞尔达夫人。我一直希望她邀请我们坐下，这样她才能告诉我们我们的命运！我必须努力不对她傻笑，问她什么时候来看手相。塞尔达夫人只会在满月的一周里这样做。贝蒂和我每次都去。真是好玩。她死后，我们从拖车中偷走了她的水晶球。我希望它仍然在我的房间里。哦！我希望妈妈没有打扫我的房间！我敢打赌她有！如果有一天回家，她还会把我一半的东西丢掉！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Westside
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:西区

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Westside
We went into Westside today to do some shopping. I heard that the man who runs the liquor store there is named Klamath Bob! He's from Klamath too! Small world, huh? It seems very poor, like most places I've seen, but the people seem happy enough, although they are worried about the fiends, who have territory nearby. There's this giant supermutant there named Mean Sonofabitch. He's so sweet, but very hard to understand, and a place called the Casa Madrid Apartments where there are some prostitutes. I was a little anxious to see what &PCName; would do about them
ESP.TRADUIT:
西区
我们今天去西区去逛街。我听说在那里酒吧老板叫克拉马斯·鲍勃（Klamath Bob）！他也是克拉玛斯人！？就像我见过的大多数地方一样，这里似乎很贫穷，但人们似乎很高兴，尽管他们担心附近的恶魔帮。 这里有一个巨大的超级变种人，名为小恶魔（Mean Sonofabitch）。他挺好玩的，但很难理解，在一个叫卡萨马德里公寓的地方有一些妓女。我有点急于想知道 ＆PCName 会为他们做些什么

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Westside
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:西区

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Westside
We went into Westside today to do some shopping. I heard that the man who runs the liquor store there is named Klamath Bob! He's from Klamath too! Small world, huh? It seems very poor, like most places I've seen, but the people seem happy enough, although they are worried about the fiends, who have territory nearby. There's this giant supermutant there named Mean Sonofabitch. He's so sweet, but very hard to understand, and a place called the Casa Madrid Apartments where there are some prostitutes.
ESP.TRADUIT:
西区
我们今天去西区去逛街。我听说在那里酒吧老板叫克拉马斯·鲍勃（Klamath Bob）！他也是克拉玛斯人！？就像我见过的大多数地方一样，这里似乎很贫穷，但人们似乎很高兴，尽管他们担心附近的恶魔帮。 这里有一个巨大的超级变种人，名为小恶魔（Mean Sonofabitch）。他挺好玩的，但很难理解，在一个叫卡萨马德里公寓的地方有一些妓女。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Nelson
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:纳尔逊

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Nelson
We went into Nelson today and killed the main legion guy there. I have no idea what they call themselves; by rank I mean. And, honestly, I couldn't care less. They all wear red and should be shot as far as I'm concerned. So we did that and Novac should be a lot safer which makes me very, very happy. That sounds cruel, I know, but the legion is cruel, and evil. Hmm, two wrongs probably don't make a right, so I shouldn't gloat that real people, people that may have real families are dead, but the people of the Mojave deserve to be protected from Caesar. Later... Okay, I can't stop thinking about how the guys in the legion may have family too. Family like me, you know? Sisters. And now I feel terrible. War is a horrible thing. I did not want to get involved in this, you know? I just wanted to go to New Vegas!! Although, legion sisters are going to be treated like slaves...Ugh. I hate this. I'm not going to think about that. The legion is evil. I'll focus on that.
ESP.TRADUIT:
纳尔逊
我们今天走进纳尔逊，杀死了那里的主要军团成员。我不知道他们叫什么。而且，老实说，我一点也不在乎。它们全都穿红色，就我而言就是活靶子。所以我们做到了，诺瓦克应该更加安全，这让我非常非常高兴。 我知道那听起来很残酷，但军团同样是残酷而邪恶的。尽管我不应该为那些可能成家的人丧命而幸灾乐祸，但莫哈韦人不应该受到凯撒的奴役。 后来... 好吧，我迫不及待想着军团里的家伙也可能有家庭。像我这样的。现在我感觉很糟糕。战争是一件可怕的事情。我不想参与其中，你知道吗？我只是想去新维加斯！虽然，军团姐妹将被当作奴隶对待。我讨厌这个。 我会忘记这一切。军团是邪恶的，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Nipton
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:尼普顿

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Nipton
I saw Nipton today. Nipton's been destroyed by the legion. Well, the buildings are fine, but all of the people are gone.
I'd always heard the legion were evil, cruel, etc. But hearing it and seeing it are two different things.
What they did to Nipton is unforgivable. There were crosses in town with people on them and fires and those that weren't killed were sent to be slaves. There must have been kids there too...whole families.
I don't think I'm making sense. I'm too upset to write much. If I didn't hate them before I hate them now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
尼普顿
我今天到了尼普顿。这里被军团摧毁了。尽管建筑物还大体完好，但是所有人不见了。 我总是听到军团是邪恶的，残酷的。但是听到和看到这是两回事。 他们对尼普顿所做的事情是不可原谅的。他们到处放火，镇上到处都是十字架，上面还钉着人，未被杀死的人被送为奴隶。那里肯定也有孩子，，， 我认为这事不可理喻。我太难过写下这些。如果我以前不恨他们现在不再是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Tabitha
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:塔比瑟

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tabitha
So there is this crazy radio station on the air run by a Nightkin named, Tabitha. Today we went up the Mountain where her radio station is located. It took us awhile to reach the top of the mountain because of all the obstacles in the way. Besides being attacked by supermutants and Nightkin along the way, there were also rockslides!! to avoid. And the Nightkin! They are so impressive the way they go invisible on you. Who wouldn't want to be that powerful in combat?
When we reached the top there was a lot of radiation and a couple of big craters where bombs must have hit during the Great War. Beyond the craters are the group of buildings and towers that Tabitha calls Utobitha.
Tabitha was inside the radio station wearing a crazy wig and a pair of red heart-shaped glasses! She went crazy (crazier?) and fought and died. I feel sorry for her. The Nightkin are so tortured, poor things.
ESP.TRADUIT:
塔比瑟
有一个由叫塔比瑟（Tabitha）蓝皮人运营的疯狂广播电台。今天我们去了她的电台所在的山上。由于路障，我们花了一段时间才到达山顶。除了沿途受到超变和蓝皮人的攻击外，还发生了岩崩！ 还有蓝皮人！他们隐身再突然出现的方式令人印象深刻。谁不想在战斗中如此强大？
当我们到达山顶时，有很多辐射，还有几个巨大的坑，肯定是大战期间炸弹命中了这里。塔比塔称火山口之外的一组建筑物和塔楼为乌托比塔。
塔比瑟戴着一顶疯狂的假发和一副红色的心形眼镜，正躺在广播电台里！她发疯的死了。我为她感到难过。 蓝皮人居然忍受这么大的折磨，可怜的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Tabitha
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:塔比瑟

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tabitha So there is this crazy radio station on the air run by a Nightkin named, Tabitha. Today we went up the Mountain where her radio station is located. It took us awhile to reach the top of the mountain because of all the obstacles in the way. Besides being attacked by supermutants and Nightkin along the way, there were also rockslides!! to avoid. And the Nightkin! They are so impressive the way they go invisible on you. Who wouldn't want to be that powerful in combat?
When we reached the top there was a lot of radiation and a couple of big craters where bombs must have hit during the Great War Beyond the craters are the group of buildings and towers that Tabitha calls Utobitha.
&PCName; fixed Rhonda and took it back to Tabitha. So, that was a happy ending for Tabitha, I guess, as happy endings go, although she'll still be crazy, since she's a Nightkin. Oh, and Tabitha was wearing a crazy wig and a pair of red heart-shaped glasses!
ESP.TRADUIT:
塔比瑟
有一个由叫塔比瑟（Tabitha）蓝皮人运营的疯狂广播电台。今天我们去了她的电台所在的山上。由于路障，我们花了一段时间才到达山顶。除了沿途受到超变和蓝皮人的攻击外，还发生了岩崩！ 还有蓝皮人！他们隐身再突然出现的方式令人印象深刻。谁不想在战斗中如此强大？
当我们到达山顶时，有很多辐射，还有几个巨大的坑，肯定是大战期间炸弹命中了这里。塔比塔称火山口之外的一组建筑物和塔楼为乌托比塔。
&PCName; 修好了机器人并且还给了塔比瑟，我猜这是一个美好的故事结局，尽管塔比瑟是一个脑子不正常的蓝皮人，戴着一顶疯狂的假发和一副红色的心形眼镜，

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Boomtown2
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:大炮族2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jack
We've been doing stuff for the Boomers so they'll like us and we've been doing a LOT of walking around Boomtown. It's so big!!! So, we helped Jack, he's this guy who watches girls through binoculars. He fell in love with a girl at the Crimson Caravan (he saw her through his binoculars) and wanted help getting together with her. So &PCName; went to Crimson Caravan and talked to the girl and now she's gone to Boomtown to be with Jack! It was very romantic (although a lot of work for &PCName; to pull together). Every time I see that little building Pearl lives in I want to go ask her for a palm reading or to have her tell my fortune. I bet she'd be really good at it. Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT:
杰克
我们一直在做一些零工，让他们会喜欢我们，并且我们沿着空军基地走了一大圈。它好大！！！我们帮助了杰克，他就是用双筒望远镜瞭望外面女孩的家伙。他爱上了赤红商队（Crimson Caravan）一个女孩（他透过双筒望远镜看到了她），并希望得到帮助与她团聚。所以 &PCName; 去了那里和她说话，现在她和杰克在一起！这非常浪漫（尽管 &PCName; 撮合了他们俩）。 每次我看到祖母住的那栋小房子，我都想去找她看看手相。我敢打赌她会真的很擅长哈！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Boone
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:布恩

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Boone
So now that &PCName; and I are staying friends forever, and our relationship isn't going any further, I wonder if it will be a problem that I like Boone? I don't think Boone will ever notice me, but he's such a good man. What he did for Carla was so brave and noble and he's so skilled with his weapon (heh) and that voice! Wow, so incredibly sexy. I guess I'll just keep being nice to him and see what happens...
ESP.TRADUIT:
布恩
现在 &PCName; 和我永远保持朋友关系，而且我们的关系不会进一步发展，我想知道我是否会喜欢布恩吗？我不知道布恩会不会注意到我，但他真是个好人。他为他妻子做的事是如此勇敢高贵，他的武器和嗓音都如此性感！！我想我会一直对他好，看看会发生什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Cover Page
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿日记的封面.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This journal belongs to:
Willow Coleen Andersen
It was given to me by my mom for my 17th birthday on, May 13, 2279 to take on my trip to New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本日记属于： 维儿·科琳·安德森（Willow Coleen Andersen） 这是我妈妈在2279年5月13日，我17岁生日时送给我的，记录我前往新维加斯的旅行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Star Bottle Caps
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:有五角星的沙士瓶盖

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Legend of the Star Bottle Cap treasure...
I wonder if the legend of the Star Bottle Cap treasure is true? And if it is, how much treasure is there and where it might be? Would it be caps or would it be other things? Is it buried and is there a map somewhere that you can find? I wonder if it did exist once upon a time, but someone already found it and it's long gone now.
It would be a scavenger's and adventurer's dream come true to find something like that! Much better treasure than the stuff I've found before, like those dog toys from before the war that still squeak or my bottle of Nuka Cola quantum or even my necklace, which, no matter how much I love it, isn't real treasure!
ESP.TRADUIT:
五星汽水瓶盖子的传说
我真奇怪如果这个传说能是真的么?如果真的是的话,这里还得有多少又会将有多少传说诞生啊?那会是一大堆瓶盖子或者别的什么吗?黄金...珠宝...还是...!?但这里会有什么线索或者地图标记指引我们去找到他么?我很好奇如果那个真的曾经存在过,但某些人早就已经找到并且拿走了呢?不过这正是我曾梦想的一个大冒险寻宝记的好开头啊..我以前曾找到过不少小宝贝,比如嘎叽噶叽响的战前小狗玩具....还有用来炸飞阵子里那辆碍事儿的破车的炸药(小伙子们因为这事儿没少被咆哮啊!!!)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Willow are now BFFs...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在和维儿是一生的挚友了...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations! You and Willow are Best Friends Forever! She will never leave you unless you fire her. She is completely loyal and devoted to you.
In addition to that, several benefits of being friends will now be unlocked which you will discover in dialogue with her.
Plus there's more to come if you continue to gain points with her.
Have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜!现在你和维儿是可以相伴一生的挚友了!除非你把她赶跑,否则她永远不会离你而去.她会一直支持你,并按你喜欢的方式去做.她对你无条件的忠诚,并且一心一意.
顺便说一句,一些更多的对话选项已经被解锁了,你可以试着找一找.
其次如果你继续获得认可度的话还有惊喜等着你.
玩的开心!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Boomtown3
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:大炮族3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cass
We've been doing stuff for the Boomers and when we're there Cass is so crabby about them. Sure, at first they were cautious, and yes, they have heavy artillery that they shoot at outsiders, but they aren't that bad once you're inside. It's not like they're just waiting for us to let down our guard so they can attack; they're good people.
All she wants to do is drink and complain about stuff. She knows a lot of stuff and that's useful. I have to give her that. And she seems to like &PCName; even though she's kind of crabby about that too.
I don't see how the two of us will ever get along, we are just so different.
ESP.TRADUIT:
卡斯
我们一直在为他们打零工，当我们到那里时，卡斯就对他们如此痴迷。当然，起初他们很谨慎，是的，他们有重型火炮向外人射击，但是深入了解他们之后，人还不错。并不是说他们要偷袭我们。他们是好人。
她唯一想做的就是喝酒，怨天怨地。她知道很多东西，这很有用。而且她似乎喜欢 &PCName;。即使她对此也有点不满意。
我看不到我们两个人如何相处，我们不是一路人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuka-Star Coffee Ingredients List
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的星核克咖啡配方

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;-
I did the math and this is what I need to make as much Nuka-Star coffee as I would love to have for a month.
4 Broc Flowers 4 Xander Roots 4 Pinyon Nuts 4 Purified Waters 4 Sunset Sarsaparilla 4 Nuka-Colas 12 Bottle Caps (no, not Star Bottle Caps even though my mom named it Nuka-Star Coffee) 12 Empty Nuka Cola Bottles (they have to be Nuka Cola Bottles)
-Willow
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;-
我觉得一周三杯星核克咖啡就够了,如果每天来一杯以上的话我会像风中的叶子一样东摇西摆的.而且我不会每天都喝的
4 锦缎花, 4 山德根, 8 松子, 4 纯水, 4 夕阳沙士, 4 核子可乐, 12 瓶盖(不不,不要五星的瓶盖,虽然我妈妈叫它维儿的星核克咖啡) 12 空汽水瓶子(必须是核子可乐瓶)
维儿^^

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Dream Big George
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:大狗乔乔的梦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bad dreams, bad sleep...
I've been having trouble sleeping lately. I keep dreaming about the day Big George died only instead of Big George I'm the one that falls off the edge of the trail and breaks my leg and maybe my arms too. I'm not sure, I lay there and I can't move my body at all. I can look around and it's very dark, which is weird, because the accident with Big George happened during the day, but it's night and I can hear something coming for me and I think it's the geckos. I'm scared because I can't move and I keep trying to get to Beauty. I can see it lying just out of reach on the ground and I'm getting more and more frantic and the approaching sounds get louder and louder and as I start to yell in frustration and fear I wake up. It's a little different every time (sometimes whatever it is that's coming almost gets close enough that I can see it and sometimes I wake up while I'm still trying to get to Beauty), but I've had it three or four times now and each time I wake up with my heart pounding and I'm so scared it takes me a long, long time to get back to sleep. I'm afraid it's not geckos coming for me, but maybe deathclaws...if they reach me before I wake up one night, I'm worried I'll wake up screaming and crying out loud.
ESP.TRADUIT:
没睡好也没好梦，，，
我最近很难入睡。我一直在梦到大乔治去世的那一天，我有一次从小路边缘掉下来摔断我的腿和胳膊的人。我躺在那儿，根本无法移动身体。环顾四周，天很黑，这很奇怪，因为大乔治的事故发生在白天，但是到了晚上，我能听到一些声音越来越近了，我认为这是蜥蜴。我很害怕，因为我无法动弹，我一直尝试去够到红颜步枪。我可以看到它在地面上，我越来越害怕，声音越来越大，当我开始沮丧地大喊。我被惊醒了 每次都略有不同（有时候它就像正在发生一样，醒来时仍拿着红颜步枪），但是已经三四次了，每次我心跳加速醒来时，都非常害怕，需要很长很长的时间才能入睡。恐怕不是蜥蜴，但也许是死爪，，，如果它们抓到我，我担心我会醒来尖叫并大声喊叫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 情书

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal The Boneyard
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：埋骨场

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Boneyard
Mina, Jonathan and I split up yesterday. We've been on the road together for about a week. I wasn't sorry to see them go. Mina was starting to get jealous of the way Jonathan was being nice to me. He wasn't interested in me that way, but there was no telling her that. He only had eyes for her. She's going to lose him if she doesn't stop acting like such a jealous bitch all the time.
I started asking around for someone else to travel with and I've already found someone going my way. I wish I had a big dog with me. I sure miss Big George. I'd have felt comfortable heading out towards Nevada on my own and picking up someone on the way with him along, but I don't really want to do that all alone.
Anyway, this guy I've met and I are planning to leave tomorrow morning. We're going to make a market run to buy some things on the way out of town. He wants to get some new gear and I could use a new pack. I've done really well on the road so far so maybe I'll splurge and get something that looks really nice with my Gecko jacket - stupid geckos :(
ESP.TRADUIT:
埋骨场
米娜,乔纳丹和我昨天分开了.我们已经在路上一起旅行了一个星期左右了.见到他们离开我一点都不遗憾.米娜开始由于乔纳丹对我那么好而感到嫉妒不已.他对我并不是有那种意思,但显然这种道理是没法和她讲的.他的眼里其实只有米娜而已.但她如果还是总像个幽怨又寂寞的老处女一样的话早晚都会失去他的.
我开始试着询问周围的一些过客是否愿意一起旅行,而且我也确实找到了那么几个.真希望我身边有只大狗乔乔那样的大狗,真的好想念他..就这么一直朝内华达的方向自个走,并且碰到了一个可以一起走的家伙也不错.不过我宁愿那时候不是自己一个人.
不管怎么样,我打算明天一早就离开这个家伙.我们正打算跑一圈商并买一些城里找不到的东西,他想弄到一些新装备,而我想弄到一个新背包不管怎么样这一路我都还应付的不错,而且说不定我能找到一些东西可以点缀我的蜥蜴皮夹克,该死的臭蜥蜴 :<

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Present
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：礼物

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Present
I gave &PCName; a present today. I just couldn't help myself anymore and had to do something. I have such a crush. I'm just bursting. I may start flirting soon to get things moving...I'm ready for more...a lot more. Although, the timing has to be right, and the setting, and, oh, most of all I want it to be hot and steamy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
礼物
今天我给了 &PCName; 一个小礼物. 我真的没法说服我自己不这么干.我一定是爱上这家伙了.天啊!我肯定是在骚动了..也许我要多逗逗这家伙,好让情况更进一步..进一大步.而且时节很不错,气温也很好,而且..哦..天啊!..真希望马上开始变得又热又闷的好有个借口啊!!!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Present
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：礼物

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Present
I gave &PCName; a present today. I've been looking for just the right thing for awhile. I've never been so happy with a travel companion. I have fun every day and traveling is the adventure it should be. I love it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
礼物
今天我给了 &PCName; 一件礼物,用了不少时间选择合适的东西呢.从来没有和哪个旅伴在一起这么开心过.每天都那么开心,而且整个旅行和真的探险一模一样,太棒了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Reading her Magazine Now
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿正在读她的杂志

ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿正在读她的杂志.等结束后她的格斗技能会提高4点.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dear &PCName;,
ESP.TRADUIT: 致 &PCName;,

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My love,
I've thought about this a lot and have come to a decision you might not like, but I have to leave. I won't be able to live with myself if I fight with you to support Caesar.
As much as I love you, it cannot overcome how much I hate that man and what he stands for and what he does.
Please, please forgive me.
I'll be waiting for you so come pick me up after, okay? Stay safe.
Love, Willow
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的爱人，
我想了很多，而且做出了一个你可能不喜欢的决定，但我必须离开。我无法忍受自己和你一起支持凯撒。
虽然我爱你，但我没法克服的我对凯撒的厌恶，他代表了和他一样人。
请你，原谅我。
我会等着你，来接我，好吗？照顾好自己。
爱你的维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dear &PCName;,
ESP.TRADUIT: 致 &PCName;,

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've thought about this a lot and have come to a decision you might not like, but I have to leave. I won't be able to live with myself if I fight with you to support Caesar.
As much as I love you, it cannot overcome how much I hate that man and what he stands for and what he does.
Please, please forgive me.
I'll be waiting for you so come pick me up after, okay? Stay safe.
Love, Willow
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的爱人，
我想了很多，而且做出了一个你可能不喜欢的决定，但我必须离开。我无法忍受自己和你一起支持凯撒。
虽然我爱你，但我没法克服的我对凯撒的厌恶，他代表了和他一样人。
请你，原谅我。
我会等着你，来接我，好吗？照顾好自己。
爱你的维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal &PCName; Dream
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：&PCName;梦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Weird dream!
I just had the craziest dream! It was like I was living another life completely, but &PCName; was in it.
So the dream starts with us meeting, and we met the same way we met in real life. &PCName; finds me and helps me and then we go look for my stuff and do whatever we do together. It's very much like things have been in real life, except that &PCName; seems to be an entirely different person.
So neat, except that it was also so weird. But that's not the weirdest part. After I was dreaming for awhile, It started over again.
I met &PCName; again, as another person, with another name in the same place we met the first time.
I woke up so happy. What a great idea, living many lives over and over again with the same person I like so much.
ESP.TRADUIT:
奇怪的梦！
我刚刚做了最疯狂的梦！就好像我过着另一种生活，但是 &PCName; 在里面。
因此，梦始于我们的相遇那天，而我们相遇的方式与现实生活中的相遇相同。 &PCName; 找到并帮助我，然后我们去寻找我的东西，并一起做的所有事情。除了 &PCName; 之外，这很像现实生活中的事情。似乎是一个完全不同的人。
但这不是最奇怪的部分。我做了一段时间的梦之后，它又重新开始了。
我再一次遇到了 &PCName; 作为另一个人，在我们第一次见面的同一地点使用另一个名字。
我很高兴的醒来，能与一个我非常喜欢的人一次又一次生活在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Dex's Dogtags
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：Dex的狗牌

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dex's Dogtags
I've been thinking a lot about Dex lately. I don't know if I should tell &PCName; about him or not. When I've talked about it before it didn't turn out so well and I don't really want that to happen again.
The thing is Dex was in the NCR and then what he did to me, trying to rape me, that sounds bad, but what I did is so much worse. Or maybe it wasn't, because he said he'd kill me so I did it to save myself. I hate to think about it anymore. I've spent so much time thinking about it. I like to think that I did the right think saving myself. And it wasn't my fault he was an NCR trooper and not an evil Raider that everyone expects to be out in the world looking for women to rape.
And that NCR captain was so mean about it (how did you manage to kill a trooper if you didn't plan it ahead of time? (I always carry a weapon with me that's why) what were you doing out there alone with a man, anyway, if you didn't want to get raped? (what? is that a serious question?) Is that what you were wearing? Isn't that what whore's wear? (I'm wearing regular clothes, no I'm not a whore, you asshole!)). He made me so angry. Blaming me because I was acting like a normal girl on a date with a (huh!) respectable NCR trooper at a NCR outpost.
Thank goodness, though, that after he was so awful he decided to believe me (turned out Dex had been in trouble about girls before). I learned a lot about the NCR and life during that week, didn't I? Yes, yes, I did.
I don't know why I keep Dex's dogtags. Maybe it's time to get rid of the damn things so I can just forget about it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
Dex的狗牌
我最近一直在思考关于Dex的事。我不知道我是否应该告诉＆PCName;。我真的不希望这种情况再次发生。
事情是Dex在NCR服役的时候，他对我做了什么，他试图强奸我，这太糟糕了，但我所能做的就是差那么多。也许不是，因为他说他会杀了我，所以我这样做是为了拯救自己。我不愿意去想它了。我花了这么多时间思考这个问题。我觉得我做了正确的事来拯救自己。那不是我的错，他是一个NCR士兵，而不是一个邪恶的入侵者，每个男人都希望可以和姑娘翻云覆雨。
NCR队长的意思是这样的（你是怎么设法杀死一个士兵的？（我总是随身携带武器，我这是为什么）如果你不想被强暴，你为什么总是自己一个人独处？（什么？这是个很严重的问题吗？）难道你就是这么穿什么衣服？妓女不都是这么穿？（我的穿着很普通，不，我不是一个妓女，你这个混蛋！））。他让我很生气。他把事情的根本都归咎在我身上（呵呵！）就像是个小姑娘和尊敬的NCR士兵在NCR的前哨约会一样。
谢天谢地，虽然之前是如此的可怕，但是他决定要相信我（原来Dex已经找过其他姑娘的麻烦）。这一周期间我学到了很多，NCR还有怎么生活，不是吗？是的，是的，我确实学到了。
我不知道为什么我总是保留着Dex的狗牌。也许是时候摆脱这个该死的东西了，这样我就可以忘记它了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记:莫哈维前哨站1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mojave Outpost
The Big Guy and I only just got into the Mojave Outpost a couple of hours ago. We split up right away. I'm kind of sad to see him go. He wasn't much fun (hardly any talking! and he didn't ever tell me his name!), but he was a great comfort to have along. I felt very safe with him around and it was nice to be with J.T. I didn't miss Big George so much.
I've been on the road for almost two years now and still haven't found a great friend to bring along with me on my travels or someone to fall in love with and maybe even settle down with in a cozy home somewhere. I don't think I'm ready to stop having adventures yet, but I do long to have someone special in my life and wouldn't mind having a place to call my own again.
Anyway, enough of that! I have practical things to worry about, like who to travel with next and where to go (New Vegas!!). I'll do that in the morning after I get a good night's sleep. I can hardly keep my eyes open.
ESP.TRADUIT:
莫哈维前哨站
大个子和我刚到这里几个小时.然后立刻就分开了.看到他离开我多少有点难过.他不是个很有趣的家伙(简直是个闷骚男,连他的名字都没告诉我啊!)但他的确让我的旅程安心了很多.有他在旁边我觉得安全多了.还有那条可爱的小家伙J.T,我都有点不是那么想念大狗乔乔了.
我在路上已经走了快两年了.却依然没找到什么真正要好的朋友或者可以爱上的人来一起旅行,甚至在一个温暖的家里安定下来.我还没打算停下脚步,但我的确也不小了啊...
不管怎么说,吐槽够了!我还有别的事儿需要担心呢,比如这次我该找谁一起去哪儿(维加斯!)呢?这是等我睡饱起来后第一件要做的事儿,眼都快睁不开了....

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal First Night
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：第一夜

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First Night
I'm so excited. Big George and I are laying out under the stars together on my Bedroll. I cooked our first meal on the campfire tonight (Big George had dog treats and some Brahmin Meat the traders shared with him) and I tried to make mom's famous coffee over the campfire. It was a disaster. It's hard enough to make at home on the stove, but tonight it tastes horrible! I'm going to have to practice a lot to make it taste good. I assumed cooking on the campfire wouldn't be that different from cooking at home. Boy, was I wrong!
We're traveling with a caravan that we know from the Motel. I'm not sure exactly where we are tonight but we're headed south from Klamath towards San Francisco. I plan to stop at many places along the way and maybe spend months at a time in some of them. This isn't going to be a fast trip. I may spend years away from home.
This is the exciting beginning to a very exciting adventure!
ESP.TRADUIT:
第一夜
我真是太兴奋了,大狗乔乔和我一起躺在铺盖卷上仰望着头顶的千亿星辰.今晚我还在营火上做了我们的第一顿晚餐(大狗乔乔的晚餐和一些商人那里买来的双头牛肉).然后我试着还原老妈做的宇宙第一的维儿的星核克咖啡,但简直就是一团糟...虽然就算在家这也不是那么轻松的事儿,但今晚的味道简直发指啊!我还得多练习练习才成.我还同样以为在营火上做饭不会比在家里更难.姑娘,你谱离得简直千万里之遥啊...
我们是和一只在旅店认识的大篷车队一起旅行的.我不太确定今晚我们到底在什么地方,但我们正在从克拉玛斯的南边出发往旧金山方向前进.我计划在路上的一些地方停下几次,也许甚至会呆上几个月.所以这不会是一次短暂的旅行,恐怕我会离开家好几年的时间.
这是一场真实的历险记的真实的开始!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Cass Hired
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：卡斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cass
Oh, no! &PCName; asked Cass to come with us! I've never told &PCName; about the fight she and I got into at the MO that night. I don't think Cass remembers me (she was so drunk) because I'm sure she'd be saying something to me if she did, but she's ignoring me, or maybe she's ignoring me because she remembers. I don't know, but I don't want to talk to her after what happened so it suits me that she has nothing to say to me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
卡斯
哦，不！ ＆PCName;你让卡斯跟我们一起走！我从来没有告诉＆PCName;关于那天晚上我和她打了一架。我觉得卡斯不记得我了（她喝高了），因为我敢肯定，她说了些什么，而且她会这么做，（妈的我们苦逼的译者怎么翻译！）但她不理我，也因为她喝高了我。我也不清楚，但我不希望发生什么事情，就算她有没有什么要对我说的我以后也要和她谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Dream
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的日记：梦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bad dream...
I had a horrible, horrible dream last night.
I'm at home in Klamath at our motel, in the courtyard looking toward the main lobby. It's weird though, I seem to be high off the ground, because what I'm looking at is the spot on the wall where the roof meets the building.
While I'm there looking toward the lobby my mom and dad exit the door and come and stand right in front of me. Their heads reach only as high as my feet and they look up at me. They are shouting something, but I can't hear them, and they look angry which makes me very sad and I start to cry.
While I'm looking down at them I see that my legs have rope around them and I turn my head to look at each of my arms and they are tied as well. I'm hanging, crucified to a cross like the ones Caesar hangs people on.
I cry even harder when I realize what's happened to me. I ask my parents why they've done this to me. They shout more and I still cannot hear what they say. They throw things at me (I don't know what they are, but they are little and hurt where they hit me) and they laugh and mock me. I beg them to stop and am crying.
Then I woke up. My heart was pounding and I was still crying. Ugh. It was bad.
ESP.TRADUIT:
噩梦。。。
昨晚我做了一个可怕的噩梦。
我在克拉马斯的汽车旅馆，在院子里看向大厅。这很奇怪，我和地面的距离很大，我能够看到屋顶上的斑点。
我没有去大厅找我的妈妈和爸爸但他们都退出门来，就在我的面前。他们的头只能够着我的脚，他们抬头看我。他们在喊些什么，但我听不见，他们看起来很生气这让我很伤心，我开始哭了起来。
当我低头看着他们，我看到我的脚边上绑着绳子，他们把我挂起来，钉在十字架上，以像那些撒人挂在十字架上。
当我意识到发生了什么事。我问我的父母，他们为什么这样做。他们使劲的喊，我仍然听不到他们说什么。他们向我扔东西（我不知道那是什么，但那很疼，他们打我），他们笑着，嘲笑我。我祈求他们停止，然后我哭了。
然后我就醒了。我的心脏怦怦直跳，我还在哭。唉。这太糟糕了。

ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的泰迪熊炸弹部件

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_GREETING_00045457_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How ya doin'?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_GREETING_00045458_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_GREETING_00049F16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_GREETING_00049F17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_GREETING_0004A22F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're definitely going to work against the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你一定要反对NCR？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0008F25D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you planning to ally with the NCR, is that why you're running these errands for them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为NCR工作是为了和他们结盟吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000A3274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. House isn't asking for much is he? Just kill the entire BOS. I think he's been a machine for so long he's forgotten what it's like to be human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要端掉整个兄弟会，豪斯先生是不是要求太多？我觉得这么久他早已遗忘做人什么是感觉，变的麻木不仁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0008E3F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you like Caesar, but did you have to fix his howitzer for him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你仰慕凯撒，但是你真的要帮他修复榴弹炮吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0009E074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think bombing the monorail is going to send the NCR running back to California, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得炸掉单轨列车就能把NCR赶回加州，你呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0009E367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you had fun. I'm still mad at you. And it'll be a couple of days before I'm done being mad at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望自己你玩的开心。几天前我就在生你的气，现在依旧在生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00074F4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone's story about his wife is so sad. I'm glad you're helping him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩妻子的事是那么令人悲痛，很高兴你能为他做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007BD26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we going to have a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去喝一杯吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0010304C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have my drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有我想喝的东西吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000595D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's depressing here, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里实在太闷了,不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00076C59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish there was something we could do to help out around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们为这里做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00072F87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we're helping these guys out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我们能帮助这些人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00072F89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007354B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys don't seem so bad, huh? They aren't high on chems. They aren't trying to eat us. It could be a lot worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙看上去没那么糟,不是吗?他们的变异程度并不高而且没有打算吃了我们，我觉得挺庆幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is so big.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方真够大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007326C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000A691A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legion made quite a mess here, didn't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团经常骚扰这里，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103052_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! Radiation! Are you set for chems? I might have some extras in my scavenged stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽！辐射！你吃了抗辐X了吗？我的意思是如果你缺这玩意我可能正好有几包。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0006B639_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation. Always good for a few laughs, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射。一如既往的让人郁闷，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0006B636_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is a mess. You doin' okay? Think there's enough radiation around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能搞定吗？觉得在这里的辐射严重吗？这地方真够受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103053_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR as far as the eye can see. You know, I feel right at home here.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR就驻扎在这附近，这让我觉得安心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0010304E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00072F83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe what they did to this town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信他们对这个小镇所做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's such a waste. The whole town just gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是残忍，整个镇子都被夷为平地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00072F8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007382B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like it up here. It reminds me of home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这地方，给人家的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0005EEB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's beautiful up here, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮极了,不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00072F81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we leave soon? I'll be a lot happier when we get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能早点离开吗？我巴不得早点离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00070F85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys make me nervous. Stay close, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们呆在一起,行吗？这些人让我觉得不怎么自在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00070F82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000A326A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Nightkin are amazing! The way they sneak...it gives them such an advantage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓝皮人能隐身！这样潜行能带来多大的优势，真令人震惊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is kind of weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方有点古怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we're back here again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，我们再次回了到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00070F83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how's Lucy today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，露西今天怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00070F84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00073B1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, we got a lead on the guy in the checkered coat! That was a good break, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我们赶上了格子西装先生！这回能好好休息一下了,对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007E5B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job killing that Nipton-destroying Legion scum. I hope you took his stupid hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮，干掉这些摧毁尼普顿的军团败类。我决定你应该拿上他那个狗头帽子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00070F87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! Can I do something for you...or to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！我可以为你做点什么...嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0008BB42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brother, Chuck, wanted to fight for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的弟弟,查克,想为NCR战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007C30A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel like we're walking around inside a tin can in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们就像是在一个铁罐头里绕来绕去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wearing the suit. He's dead isn't he? Good. He deserved it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你穿的这件衣服...唔，那家伙一定是挂了？棒极了。他死有余辜...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000AEB0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Benny's dead. I'm glad. He deserved it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 班尼挂了。唔，棒极了。这真是活该！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000AF0C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it! You killed Caesar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了！你干掉了凯撒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0010305A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you did for Boone at Bitter Springs, it was good. He seems much better now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管在苦泉你和布恩做了什么，都是对的。他看起来似乎好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007DA66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what you did to Boone at Bitter Springs, but he seems worse than ever. Weren't we trying to help him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道布恩在苦泉发生了什么，但他看起来比之前更糟。我们是不是该帮帮他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007DA67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000E0A2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, have you been missing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，想我了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00028632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've never said anything about it. Do you like the presents I've been giving you in the mailbox?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可不怎么流露感情啊，话说你喜欢我给你的礼物吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007AEBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! How's it going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000C0A1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Yawn>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打哈欠>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0005209B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am so hungry! Can we make that meal now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我好饿啊!!!，不如找个地方做点吃的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0005D8D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you didn't mind the big kiss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你不要介意我回赠你一个香吻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0006ED17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, that was wonderful. You were wonderful. I hope we can do that again sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，好极了。你真是厉害，我希望我们能多弄点这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000D6114_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a minute? I have something I want to talk to you about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时间吗？有件事我想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000B4EFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! Can I do something for you...or to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！我可以为你做什么...嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000B63C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000086FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000856F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000D1DB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000D5879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000197B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0001A051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了没？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000197B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00076F51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you've got a plan, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你有计划了吧？对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000AF33B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me what you want and I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你想要什么，我看看能做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0009FC67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next? A little gambling? A little drinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来呢?去赌一把?去喝一杯?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0010304F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next? Gambling? A show? A drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来呢?去赌一把?去喝一杯?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't mind leaving soon. It's kind of quiet up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方静得吓人，我不介意咱们掉头离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is quite a show isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝妙的表演，你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00103054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfft! It's hot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔！好热！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0005EEBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0002AE64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007549A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there, handsome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0007549B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you look gorgeous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来精神十足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000BA897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Bud. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这是怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000AC28A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Hon. What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这是怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000AC28B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you see that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到没？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_00073B18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi lover, need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，亲爱的。需要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_0008DDAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! Can I do something for you...or to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿!我能为你干点什么?或者是....你要"干"嘛?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GREETING_000B302A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [010191EB] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowKylesVoice\AWillowANPC_GREETING_0002C831_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you know, but since Jeannie May passed, I've been keeping an eye on her properties for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你听说了没，珍妮梅死了。所以我一直在照顾她的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANPC_GREETING_0009BDCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪汪汪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANPC_GREETING_00046B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, Sarah. I'm crashing the party. I think we'll have a lot of fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，莎拉，我把派对搞砸了。呃，但我们会玩得很开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0009F030_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica, we have to do something about your outfit. It's tragic. You look like a potato with a face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗尼卡，我们应该帮你弄件像样的衣服。你看起来像一个长了脸的土豆，这真是糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000D5594_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't been doing it very long, but I like to punch stuff too. Maybe not as much as you do, but it is fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怎么擅长格斗，不过挺有意思。当然不如你做的好，但是我喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000A6F3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica, I've heard you guys can shoot lasers from your eyes, is it true?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡，我听说你们兄弟会的人可以从眼里射出激光，是这样吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0005A668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't answered me about the eye lasers. Can you? Can you shoot things with your eyes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没有回答我关于眼部激光的事。你也可以吗？你可以用眼睛射击？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007FFCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica, about the eye lasers. Come on, tell me about them. Please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗尼卡，眼部激光。来吧，求告诉我吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007FFCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica! I've got it! The eye lasers are weapons you carry or wear like helmets! They aren't IN your eyes; that was just dumb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡！我知道了！眼部激光是你随身携带或佩戴头盔一样的武器！他们不在你的眼睛里，我刚刚太傻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000802B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, my name's Willow. What do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我叫维儿。你在这附近闲逛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0005A66B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, I'm Willow. It looks like we're going to be spending a lot of time together. I hope we can be friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好,我叫维儿.看起来我们要一起呆一阵子了,希望能成为朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B80AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was very sorry to hear about your wife, Boone. If you ever feel like talking to someone or ever need anything I'd love to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你妻子的事感到难过,布恩。如果你想找个人倾诉,或者需要任何帮助我都非常乐意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B80AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, I was born and raised in the NCR; in Klamath. I'm guessing you're going to keep quiet and not tell me anything about yourself. Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩,我的家乡在NCR下辖的克拉马斯。我猜你还是会保持沉默然后一句话都不说,对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B80AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're awful good, Boone. I can see why they wanted you in the 1st Recon. Maybe if we get a chance sometime you could give me some tips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在知道你为何能进入第一侦查营了，布恩你真有一手。有机会的话也许你能教我些瞄准的技巧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B80AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, Boone, you are just too quiet. If I confess to you that I hate Caesar and his legion will you talk to me? Because it's true. I do hate him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,布恩你只是有点太沉默了。如果我和你一样讨厌凯撒和他的那些军团你愿意和我聊聊么，因为我真的非常讨厌他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B80AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, tell me about Carla. Where did you meet her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，你是在哪里与卡拉相识的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007CBC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B8958_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You doin okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_000B8957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, I like you a lot, Boone. I was hoping that maybe after we're out of this mess we could get to know each other a lot better. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，布恩。我觉得，生活总会变好的。我们可以更了解对方，你怎么说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007CBD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, you can't blame yourself for Bitter Springs. You aren't responsible for what happened there. You're only one man and you're a good man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管在苦泉发生了什么不管你做了什么。你只是一个平常人，而且你是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007CBDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, have you figured out yet how I feel about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，你想通了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007CBCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, you were very brave to do what you did for Carla. I admire you for it. Not every man could have done that. You're a true hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，你很勇敢。我能理解你为卡拉所做的一切，不是每个人都能含泪扣下扳机。你是个真正的英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HELLO_0007CBD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The new Slave girls are quite beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新来的女奴隶可真漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Praetorian Guard [0015FE22] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleadult09\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AC550_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Degenerates like you belong on a cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些堕落者就应该被绑在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Praetorian Guard [0015FE22] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleadult09\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AC553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren't trusted here profligate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是打算在这里挥霍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Praetorian Guard [0015FE22] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleadult09\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AC551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep barking and I'll feed you to a dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再叫唤我就把你喂狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Praetorian Guard [0015FE22] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleadult09\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AC552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, got any juicy gossip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？有什么小道消息？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_HELLO_0007F9F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I punching too much? I get carried away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不是打得太多了？我有点被头昏脑涨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000D4CEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want...a dress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要...一条裙子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_HELLO_0005A94E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where'd you come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000D4CEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silliest dressed band of raping, slaving marauders you'll see east of California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者会把从那些傻瓜那里抢走的东西卖到东加利福尼亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_HELLO_0007F9F1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。

ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。

ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
