ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000884D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya, later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待会见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_GOODBYE_000B8959_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those ferals are tough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些狂暴僵尸可真够厉害!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076C5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation! Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射!完美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You doing okay? Radiation! What a pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗?有辐射!真是完美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I have a question. Am I starting to glow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我感觉不太好,我身上是不是开始有点辐射荧光了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always wondered what it would feel like to be a ghoul...I think we might find out soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直都在想变成僵尸是什么感觉...我觉得我们很快就能知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate Deathclaws. I peed my pants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨死亡爪.我都快尿裤子了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076C64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm....Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽...死亡爪.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, you can do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题,你肯定能做到.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00093D46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009AC87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's kinda dreary up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有点压抑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00103037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, does that robot cook for us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉的那个机器人可以帮我烹饪吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00094BC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should be ready for anything in here, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我们应该准备好应对一切有可能发生的事,你觉得呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000805A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000805A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are going to think I'm such a coward right now, but I am very scared. This place is so spooky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在肯定觉得是个胆小鬼。说实话我快吓尿了，这地方**太吓人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0005C1D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Screams* What was that? Did you hear that? Sorry, I am so jumpy. I do not like it in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: *尖叫*卧槽,那是什么?你听到没?不好意思我有点神经质了。该死的破地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00062979_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am so glad you're with me. I'd hate to be in here alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很庆幸咱们能待在一起.我可不想一个人在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076C5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am so glad you're with me. I'd hate to be in here alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很庆幸咱们能待在一起.我可不想一个人在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00098E41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate vaults. They are so creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喜欢避难所.每个都太阴森。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00073B1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of all the places you've taken me, this, well, not my favorite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起之前咱们去的地方。这儿，不太和我口味.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00064FF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place seems kind of cruel if you ask me. Well, I'll make an exception for geckos and Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你问我的话，这地方看起来十分残忍啊。你看除了蜥蜴还有死亡爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00102A71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could any woman run a place like this? It's so barbaric?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么会有女人会跑到这个地方来?这儿太野蛮了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0010303E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you noticed Lucy's voice? It's so deep. I wonder if maybe she's really a boy dressed as a girl? That'd be a big surprise for someone, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有留意到红露西的声音么?听起来相当沉闷,我在想她是不是一个男扮女装的男人呢?这对某些人来说可算是个大惊喜.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0010303F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How old do you think Lucy is? Doesn't she seem old to you? She seems old to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得红露西年龄有多大呢?她看起来比你要老不少?不管怎样她定比我老很多.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00103040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucy's hair is a funny color. It doesn't look real to me. I wonder if she puts color on it somehow. I bet she has gray hair because she's so old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红露西的头发颜色可真好玩.我觉得这不是她的自然发色.我想她是不是去染过发了.鉴于她的年龄来看，或者干脆直接是一顶假发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00064FF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will be so happy when we're done running these errands for Lucy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给露西跑完腿,理清一些咱们的关系我会相当高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076F50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaw eggs! She doesn't want much, does she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪蛋！真是狮子大开口，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000958F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to hate ferals until one day I found one with a teddy bear. Now I feel sorry for them. Although, I still hate to get into a fight with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前很不喜欢狂暴僵尸直到一天我看到一只抱着泰迪熊的僵尸,现在我对他们感到同情了.不过我还是依然要爆他们头.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000B0AAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a lot of dead ghouls in here. Hey, you don't think the ferals killed them, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有不少尸体.你觉得是这些狂暴僵尸杀了他们么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00102A6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place hasn't been totally picked over. There's still some good stuff left to take out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方还没有完全被收拾干净,还剩下一些好东西我们可以拿去用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00073B25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope our mystery man turns out to be worth all of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们的"神秘人"能够对得起我们做的这些事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00103039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00073B1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Haversham is crazy. Who'd want to be a ghoul?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙绝对疯了.谁会愿意变成一个僵尸啊?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00073B1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Haversham is crazy. Who'd want to be a ghoul? Ah! Oh, Raul, I'm so sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙绝对疯了,谁会愿意变成一个僵尸啊？啊，劳尔,我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0007CEC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bright is nuts too. It's like we've stumbled into crazy town and he's the mayor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个布莱特也绝对疯了，就像我我们走进了一个疯人院而他恰巧是院长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00073B26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember those guys that took my stuff? This is the place Stan talked about in his note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记得那些抢走我东西的家伙么?这地方就是斯坦笔记上提到的地方.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00080B70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it's just me, but don't you want to walk right up to the Nightkin and stare right at them to see what they'll do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有可能只是我想这么做,难道你就不想走到蓝皮人的面前,然后盯着他们瞧瞧,看看会发生什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0005C4B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope Dr. Henry can fix Rex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望亨利博士能修复雷克斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076F44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Henry is an interesting guy, isn't he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨利博士是个有趣的人,不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076F45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you ever wonder what it was like to come to a place like this before The Great War?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过,在核战之前来到这么一个地方是什么感觉?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00077811_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Invisible Nightstalkers. I wonder if that could ever happen to a human?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个隐身的蓝皮人，我在想这种情况能不能在人类身上发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00077810_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这些女孩没什么意见。但是我在想,如果他们自己也有女儿的话,她们也并不想自己的孩子变成这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00080593_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like these guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这些家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00092EDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is not a gift shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是个礼物店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0005C4B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worst gift shop ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是我见过的最糟的礼物店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00062978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmpf. Who does she think she's impressing with this place? I'm not impressed. You're not, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼,谁觉得她会对她的这个烂地方印象深刻?我可是一不.你也这么想,对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000692FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmpf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009C680_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always imagined a vault would be a terrible place to live. You know, cuz deserted vaults are so creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直认为避难所是一个相当可怕的地方，你知道的那些废弃的避难所看起来相当阴森。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009C67E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's really nice in here. Way better than I'd imagined a vault could be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实这里还算不错，至少比我想象的好多了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009C67F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is enormous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方可真大.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009F1D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不禁想收拾收拾，看起来真是糟糕透顶。要是我看到啥好东西我就偷偷的把它顺出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009EEF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's great to be among NCR folks again. I feel right at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和NCR的老百姓们在一起感觉真好，感觉就像在家一样.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00064FF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a twitchy bunch. I don't trust them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙有点神经质啊，我不怎么信任他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0008059E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like everyone of these guys uses chems. Look at their eyes, their really messed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来这里的每一个家伙都嗑足了药.看看他们的眼睛,真是一团糟.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009EEEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fiends, ugh. I thought they smelled bad outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮,真恶心.我还以为他们只是身上臭呢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009EEEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like vaults. Even when they're crowded like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算再热闹，我也一样不喜欢避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009EEF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这些女孩没什么意见。但是我在想,如果他们自己也有女儿的话,她们也并不想自己的孩子变成这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_001055BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这些女孩没什么意见。但是我在想,如果他们自己也有女儿的话,她们也并不想自己的孩子变成这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00080594_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this is home, huh? I can see why you like to get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这就是我们的家?哦，我大概知道你为什么喜欢这儿了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0005A66A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you stuck one of us in that freezer. That was heartless. I hope I don't have to worry about what you'll do to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信,你居然决定待在自由之城这个烂地方.真是让我伤心，我希望我不担心你会对我做什么不好的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000777F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder what happened here. They must have set up all these traps for a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这里发生了什么.但是这些陷阱肯定不是无缘无故设下的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00102A6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots, traps...I wonder what else we'll find in here? Ooh! Maybe we'll find a safe filled with some really great loot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人,陷阱...我在想我们还会在这鬼地方碰到什么?哦!也许一个装满好东西的保险箱!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00103032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is quite a show, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可值得一看啊,不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard of toilet wine? Inmates make it. I wonder if anyone makes it here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到过厕所酒这个说法吗?囚犯们发明的.我在想谁会把这事弄到这儿来.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0009F795_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you think it's okay to scavenge for stuff in a prison. Don't give me away if I grab something, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你对于在监狱里捡东西没什么意见.如果我捡到什么奇怪的东(fei)西(zao)别把我丢在这儿就跑了么,好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00080B6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't wait to see what we'll find. Do you think it's the treasure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等不及想看看我们能拿到什么了.你认为会是传说中的宝藏么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000881E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder what it will be? Something really exciting I'm sure. Why else would it have been hidden for so long?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道会是什么?但是我至少很让人激动啊.是什么能藏了这么长的时间.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000881E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what this place needs? More Sunset Sarsaparilla lamps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这地方缺什么吗?更多的夕阳沙士台灯.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000881E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The robot, game thing? He gives me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个机器人能玩游戏?这玩意让我毛骨悚然啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000881E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were thorough. It sure looks like everyone's been wiped out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们非常周密啊.看起来所有人都已经被干掉了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000757F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should we be searching for survivors? Maybe somebody managed to hide somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该找找生还者么?也许有人躲在某些地方.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00070F7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We haven't seen any kids. Do you think they took them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也没看见任何孩子.他们把孩子也抓走了么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000993FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I don't think I'll ever forget this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，我觉得我不会忘了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00097701_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, poor guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,可怜的家伙.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0008EF6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you see the car over there on display? It's on display because it has bullet holes in it. My hat has bullet holes in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看家那辆在展示架上的汽车了么?这玩意身上被射满了子弹孔.我的帽子上也有一个子弹孔.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0008F24F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in love with that cowboy robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我突然爱上这个牛仔机器人了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0008F250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oof. It's cold in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,这儿可真冷.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_0007DD1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oof. It's cold in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,这儿可真冷.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000A4F41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take a cave over a vault any day. Caves usually have critters, which are not creepy. Vaults...creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起避难所我更能接受洞穴.洞穴里面一般都会有些有趣的小生物,所以他不怎么让人害怕.避难所....太吓人了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00076C5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take a cave over a vault any day. Caves usually have critters, which are not creepy. Vaults...creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起避难所我更能接受洞穴.洞穴里面一般都会有些有趣的小生物,所以他不怎么让人害怕.避难所....太吓人了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_000A4F42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lakelurks! That sound they make is incredible. Does it vibrate through your whole head, too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 湖沼蟹!他们能发出的声波实在让人难以置信.它是不是也震的你头昏脑涨?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_IdleChatter_00094BBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_000757EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_00096886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_0008B8B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop shooting at me, damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 往哪儿打的你这家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_0008F25C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! You guys are making me so mad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！你的兄弟们让我很生气！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_0008B8B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head. Ha! Eat that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 像一个家伙说的，这简单的不就是在踢球么。哈哈，吃子弹吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_000A4F36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head. Ha! Eat that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 像一个家伙说的，这简单的不就是在踢球么。哈哈，吃子弹吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_000A4F37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_0009E36E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit! Do you need a hand over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的！你这个残废！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_0004CD72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Attack_000743CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raul, we're up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳尔，我们上吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll see you later.

ESP.TRADUIT: 说什么都行
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTacticsC_00003909_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pant, pant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼呼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTacticsC_0000390A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pant, pant
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼呼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你改变战斗方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all ears. What's the plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着呢，快说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTacticsC_000041A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来讨论一下你的战术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTactics_00003908_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶，走吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersLetsGo_000BB410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm glad you're back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我很高兴你回来了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy am I glad to see you. I have been so bored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你回来啦，我都闷死了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersLetsGo_00050110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you had some fun while you were gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好咱能去个好玩的地方
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersLetsGo_00065A54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm glad you're back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我很高兴你能活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersLetsGo_00050111_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I missed you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想念你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersLetsGo_0007549D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersLetsGo_000768AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我已经和敌人交火，否则不要发动攻击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'll just sit back and take it easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行！我就跟在后边酱油
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTacticsC_00022A2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whine>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你在看到敌人那一刻就攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but I do not like being Deathclaw bait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但是你别想用我当诱饵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersTacticsC_00022A2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_FollowersTactics_000768B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I could use a hand over here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,我的手抬不起来啦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_HealthHalf_0004B67D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 唤醒

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Deathclaws!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的死亡爪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Wake_00088131_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, dammit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Wake_0000A69F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh. My head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我擦,我的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Wake_000F539E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that was a nice nap. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这一觉睡得很舒服。现在该干啥？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Wake_00076C63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Groan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_Wake_000757F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_KnockedBack_0000A6A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! Dammit! That...really....hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗷！卧槽！真心很疼啊啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here all by yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一个女孩子在这荒地里做什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have my reasons. I'm not thrilled about being alone, but I wasn't going to sit around in the Mojave Outpost because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有我的理由..虽然我不喜欢自己一个人呆着,但这不会是我跑去莫哈维前哨站的原因
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0000DD25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to carry this for me. Please don't use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你帮我拿着这个,但别用它好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I won't touch it. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,我保证不会碰它的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTrade2_0000983D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you relax here for awhile. I'll be back for you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干嘛不在这儿休息一会?我晚点会回来找你的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll just wander around here and find something to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会在这周围转转找点乐子.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSandbox_0000AC60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to consider this your home and a place to stay here in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你把这里当作你在莫哈维的家.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one has ever offered me a home before. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没人能给我一个家...谢谢你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarker_0009E57A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you mind going back to the house? I'll catch up with you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意先回家去么?我晚点会赶上你的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll see you there later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,咱们晚点见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGoToHomeMarker_0000CBEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure I can't talk you into coming with me? It's going to be really lonely without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就不能说服你一起去吗?没有你的话会好孤独..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGoToHomeMarker_00029A4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please come with me? I think we can think of something to do while we're there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以跟我一起走吗?我想在那儿咱们能想出些事一起做..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGoToHomeMarker_00075493_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but you don't seem injured and you still have your gear. Is this some kind of scam?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但是你看起来没受伤而且你的家当也都在那里。这是某种骗局么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used all my medical supplies on my leg. That's why I'm moving around so well, but it's still sore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用光了所有的药来治腿。所以我现在可以到处乱跑，但是很疼你懂不懂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_00011F0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it's impossible for me to prove I've been robbed. You'll just have to believe me. I am telling the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没法证明我让人抢了。请你相信我，我说的是实话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_00011F0C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait. I found this. They dropped it. The thieves dropped it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎哎哎，等一下。我找到这个。那些逗比们把它扔了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_00011F0C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should have stayed put. Sounds like things didn't work out like you planned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你应该留下来，听起来事情没按照你的计划进行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I didn't plan to lose my favorite rifle, run out of ammo and get injured. I have never been this unlucky on the road before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不能抛弃我的枪，没有弹药而且受了点伤。我从来没这倒霉过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_000124CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you'd like me to help you fix your problem? Give you a weapon and ammo or caps maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我解决问题吗？给你武器？护甲？或者一些瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't need caps, but my pistol is currently useless to me. So, I do need ammo or a different weapon to go after them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不需要瓶盖，但我的手枪快被我打烂了。所以我需要护甲或者一些不同的武器去抓住他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_000121EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't look at me. I have my own problems to handle. It was nice meeting you, but I'm leaving now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样看着我，我有我自己的麻烦要解决。很高兴见到你，拜拜啦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! I have a pistol, but no ammo and I'm still injured.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！我有一把手枪，但是没有护甲而且我受伤了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_000121F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something I can do to help you out of this situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我做点什么才能帮你摆脱这种局面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Look at this. One of them dropped it. I think they'll be going to one of these places. I want to start looking for them at the closest one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！看看这个。他们其中一个丢下了它。我觉得他们会去那个地方，所以我想在那附近开始寻找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_000124D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I have a problem. I have a pistol, but no ammo. That's gone too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我有一个问题。我有一把手枪，但是没有子弹。都让我用光了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_000124D0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you thinking of chasing these guys down alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是打算自己一个人去单挑那些人吗...?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not do it alone, but I will. I want my stuff back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点都都不想去，但我必须去。我得把我的东西拿回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001332E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to GIVE you anything. But maybe we could work out a deal if you want my help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都不会给你的,但是如果你真的想要我帮忙的话..也许我们可以定一个条件

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no caps to pay you, so how about this? After we get my stuff back I'll travel with you for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有盖子，所以这样如何？夺回我的东西，我跟你一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a great shot. I started hunting with my Dad was I was a little kid. Plus, I'm a lot of fun to have around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有瓶盖可以付给你,所以不如这样吧?等把东西夺回来我就跟你一起旅行一阵子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180B1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry. I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉,没门

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. I need to go after my stuff. Maybe I could trade you something for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托了.我必须得把他们拿回来.也许我可以用一些东西交换你的帮助?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001360C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been traveling for a long time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你出门在外很长时间了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nearly two years. Usually I talk my way out of any problems, but these guys jumped me from behind. I didn't get the chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多两年.通常我会躲着麻烦走,但这些家伙凭空就出现了,我根本没有机会...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001332A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I can help you get your rifle back...for a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我可以把你的步枪弄回来...只要你付的起..

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no caps to pay you, so how about this? After we get my stuff back I travel with you for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有瓶盖可以付给你,所以这样如何?等把东西夺回来我就跟你一起旅行一阵子?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in a really tough spot. What can I do to help you out of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在真是糟透了,我能帮你些什么呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go after the guys who took my stuff. They dropped this. Will you come with me? Maybe give me some ammo or a different weapon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去追那些坏蛋,他们把这个丢下了.你会跟我一起来么?也许可以给我一些子弹或者武器....?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BCE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you want me to supply you for this little adventure and come with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你想让我为你这次小小的冒险买单,而且还得拿命陪着?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd love it if you came with. As for ammo I'll say this: I'm crap with a knife and I'm only a little better with my fists. So, it's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你来。至于弹药，我有一把刀，但是用拳头更好一点。因此由你决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm willing to earn what you give me. I'll travel with you for awhile if you like. I'm a great shot and I'm great company. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的希望你能来.至于弹药的问题,这么说吧:用刀的话多半我会切到自己,至于拳头就不好说会打到谁了...所以,你决定吧..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BCB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I didn't see anyone. Are you alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,谁都没看到.你还好么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not alright. They took my favorite rifle and some other stuff. I do have a pistol with me, but I've got no ammo for it and my leg is hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点都不好.他们把我最喜欢的枪和别的很多东西都抢走了.现在只有一把没子弹的手枪和一条瘸瘸的腿跟着我了..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, did you see a couple of guys on the road just now? They robbed me! Bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,你最近有看到一伙人走过这条路么?他们把我打劫了!一帮贱人!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. That sounds good. Let's get the equipment all sorted out and then we can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了,这听上去不错.带上所有需要的东西,然后咱们就可以出发了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, and thank you so much. My name's Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. But, please do hurry. I'm anxious to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,太谢谢你了.另外就叫我维儿吧.很高兴认识你.但,咱们快点出发吧.我真的等不及了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about this? You sleep with me and then I'll do whatever you need to get your stuff back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如这样,陪我睡一觉,然后我就乖乖的去把你的东西弄回来?

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about this? No and goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么酱紫？不,咱们还是白白吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Sleep with me and I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,陪我睡一觉我就帮你.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'll go back to the Mojave Outpost and find someone there. I wanted to do this right now and not waste all that time. But, no and goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我会回莫哈维前哨站找帮手的.我一分钟也不会耽搁了.不,再见吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you agree to travel with me for awhile I'll help you out. I could use the company on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你答应和我一起旅行的话我会帮助你.伙伴总是很有用的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel with you? Okay, after we get my rifle back, I agree to travel with you for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你旅行?好吧,等把我的枪夺回来之后.我答应和你旅行一阵子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00013BDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're telling me the truth aren't you? Okay, I'll help you. But I want something in return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是真的,对吧?好吧,我会帮你的,但我想要一些东西作为回报.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no caps to pay you. So how about this? After we get my stuff back I'll travel with you for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有瓶盖子可以付给你,所以不如这样吧?等把东西夺回来我就跟你一起旅行一阵子?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a great shot. I started hunting with my Dad was I was a little kid. Plus, I'm a lot of fun to have around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个很好的枪手,而且从小就跟爸爸一起打猎了.另外,我还是个很有趣的人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound awfully confident. What if we don't find your stuff? How will you repay me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听上去蛮有自信的.那如果找不到你的东西..你怎么回报我?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I agree to travel with you for awhile whether we find my rifle or not. I'm a great shot and I'm a lot of fun to have around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么不管找到与否我都答应和你一起旅行一阵子怎么样?我是个很棒的枪手而且还很有趣..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need me to supply you in order to follow these guys? Do you also want me to come with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我给你东西然后好去追他们?你也想让我跟着一起去吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I would be so grateful. Maybe I could repay you some way. I don't have caps, but would you be interested in some company on the road?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的!那样最好了.我也许能用别的方法支付你,我没有瓶盖子,但也许你有兴趣找个搭档一起上路?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be willing to travel with you for awhile, take night watch, kill critters, stuff like that. I'm fun to have around. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意和你一起旅行一阵子,晚上站岗,白天杀人之类的..我可会找乐子啦,你说呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll do it. Let's get ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧...你赢了.咱赶紧出发...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. And thank you so much. This means the world to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以叫我维儿.很高兴认识你,而且...谢谢你.你拯救了我的一切.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll agree to that. But what if we don't find your stuff? Then what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我答应帮你...但假如我们没能找到你的东西呢?怎么办?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to consider that possibility. But I'll travel with you for awhile whether we find my stuff or not. That seems fair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不想考虑那种情况.但无论如何我都答应陪你一起旅行一阵子.这样就公平了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000180B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll agree to that. Let's get organized and then we'll get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说定了.咱们收拾一下然后上路吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. My name's Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. And, can we hurry? I'm anxious to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,太谢谢你了.另外我的名字是维洛,就叫我维儿吧.很高兴认识你.但,咱们能赶紧出发吗?我真的等不及了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000197AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And here. You should see this. They dropped it. I'm guessing it's where they're headed. I want to start looking at the closest location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里,你看看.他们把这个丢下了.我猜这里就是他们碰头的地点.我想从最近的这个开始找起.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000197AB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we don't find your stuff? I want your word that you will travel with me either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果找不到你的东西怎么办?我要你发誓无论如何都会随我一同旅行.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to think about that possiblity. But, alright, yes, you have my word. I'll travel with you either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不想考虑那种情况.但是..好吧,我向你发誓.无论如何我都会和你一起旅行的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000197AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want your word that you will travel with me whether we find your rifle or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你保证无论能不能找到你的枪都会跟我一起旅行

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even want to think about that possibility, but, yes, I agree to travel with you whether we find my rifle or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本都不想考虑那种情况....但..是的,无论怎样我都会和你一起旅行的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000197AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了,咱们出发吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Listen! I want to tell you exactly what I lost so you'll know what to look for, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!听着,我要具体的描述一下被抢走的东西,这样你才知道我们找的是什么,好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerLet_0001A052_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know about my rifle, Beauty. That's what I call her. And there are two other things. Chester, a teddy bear I've had forever, and Moira, a doll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的步枪,红颜,我是这么叫她的(原名Beauty,取红颜杀手的意思.译注)..还有另外两件东西,切斯特,我最爱的泰迪熊玩偶.和莫伊拉,一个娃娃
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerLet_0001A052_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we find the toys. I'm embarrassed to admit this and know it sounds stupid, but I do love them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我们能找到她们,虽然我得说这真有些丢人..而且蛮傻的...但我真的很爱她们!再次谢谢你能帮我..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerLet_0001A052_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to see that pistol of yours. I don't know if I have ammo for it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你的手枪,我不知道有没有适合他用的子弹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sure, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然，当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerLet_0001A054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're angry. I'm sorry. Can we start over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉..你生气了..我们能忘了之前的事儿吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I am angry. You were an ass. But since you've apologized and you seem sincere enough, sure we can start over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我生气了.你是个不折不扣的混球.不过既然你道歉了,而且看起来的确很后悔...我再给你一次机会..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerisA_0001A056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, here's the deal. I found this. I've lost a bunch of stuff, including my favorite rifle and I want to chase down these guys and get it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,那么就这样说定了.我找到了这个东西,另外我丢了一大堆的东西,包括最喜欢的步枪.希望能追上这些家伙并把她夺回来.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerisA_0001A056_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need ammo, if you have it, for the pistol I'm carrying and backup if you're interested. So, what do you say? Oh, and my name's Willow, by the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的手枪需要子弹,如果你有多余的并且愿意的话.你说呢?哦,另外你可以叫我维儿.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerisA_0001A056_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it...if you sleep with me. <huge laugh> I'm just kidding. Let's go get your stuff back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我答应你...如果你跟我睡一觉的话.. <大笑>我在开玩笑.出发吧 .

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? And you don't want anything in return from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当真?你不要任何回报?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPlayerisA_0001A05A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want anything from you. I feel really bad about what I said to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我什么都不要.我对向你说过的话感到很抱歉.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. That's very sweet of you. I appreciate it very much. I'd love to leave as soon as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你.你真是太贴心了.太谢谢你了.现在我想尽快离开这里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A05E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't lie. I think you're very attractive. But I don't want anything from you for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想说谎,你真的美极了.不过我不会因为帮这个忙而向你索要任何东西

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you. Your not so bad yourself. Do you think we could leave as soon as possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,谢谢你.你总算还不是那么糟.不过咱们尽快离开这儿好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A05F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do want something from you. But not as payment. Let's just see how things go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确想要一些回报,但不是钱...咱们就看看会发生些什么吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, uh, alright. We'll just see how things go, then. Can we leave as soon as possible? I'm anxious to get my stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,那个,呃,好吧...我们就看看...唔..我们能先离开这里吗?我等不及要把东西夺回来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll help you. Let's go get your stuff. And don't worry about paying me back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,我会帮你的.咱们去把东西夺回来,先别担心回报我的事儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you being so generous? This is a lot to do for someone you don't know for nothing in return. Not that I'm not grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么突然又这么大方了?为一个是谁都不知道也无法报答你的人做一大堆事?怎么都觉得有猫腻呢...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I acted like an ass earlier. I'd like to make that up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才有点精虫上脑,简直像个混蛋..所以想补偿你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I appreciate that very much. Can we leave soon? I'm anxious to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你..我们能赶快出发么?我等不及了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A064_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like you and I'd like to spend more time with you. Even if it does involve chasing criminals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你,而且我想多花一些时间陪着你.即使得去舍命追土匪..

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, thank you, you're not so bad yourself. Can we start chasing those criminals soon? I'd really like to get outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,,你还不是那么坏.我们现在能去追土匪了吗?我真的想赶紧离开这里了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do want something from you, but not as payment for anything. We'll just have to see how things go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确想从你那里得到些东西,不过不是钱,我们等着瞧瞧看会怎么样...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for helping me, but, yeah, we'll just have to see what happens. And do you think we could leave soon? I'm anxious to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢帮助我,但是,恩,好吧我们就看看会怎么样.那个我们能赶快出发了吗?我等不及要离开这里了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A069_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you stay here and wait for me? I'll be back for you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呆在这里别动,我晚点会回来找你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, if that's what you want. But don't leave me here long, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果这就是你想要的。但是不要离开我，在这里长，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A06D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I look at what you're carrying right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你身上现在都带着些什么吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001A06E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you wait here for me? I'll be back for you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,现在不行.呆在这里多等一会

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will, but please hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但请你快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021321_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶,出发
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0001E265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had fun with you and Red Lucy, but I still don't want you to pay too much attention to her, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你还有露西一起很欢乐，但是你这家伙别把注意力都集中在她身上，不然要你好看，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000BA8E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, Sarah is bad at sex! She's as bad at sex as she is with giftshops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，沙拉真是个坏姑娘！居然看得上你这种小白脸,就跟她店里的品味一样差
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000BA8E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure Caesar is going to be very proud of you for killing Kimball. I hope he rewards you well. Better than when you saved his life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定，凯撒一定非常骄傲你杀了金博尔。我希望他能够赏赐你。当然你如果救了他更好一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000A3F8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will be so happy when we're done running these errands for Lucy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给露西跑完腿,我希望咱俩能理清一下关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000AB123_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaw eggs! She doesn't want much, does she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪蛋！真是狮子大开口，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000AB122_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exploding ants aren't as much fun as I thought they'd be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会爆炸的蚂蚁一点都不好玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_CombatToNormal_0009E36F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you're passing bad Intel to the NCR from the legion? Hmpf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你把打算帮军团把这个坏消息传达给NCR?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0009E368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor Kimball. It's too bad the solution had to be so final.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的金博尔,这个结果对他来说太糟糕了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0009E073_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucy's hair is a funny color. It doesn't look real to me. I wonder if she puts color on it somehow. I bet she has gray hair because she's so old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红露西的头发颜色可真好玩.我觉得这不是她的自然发色.我想她是不是去染过发了.鉴于她的年龄来看，或者干脆直接是一顶假发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000AB121_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How old do you think Lucy is? Doesn't she seem old to you? She seems old to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得红露西年龄有多大呢?她看起来比你要老不少?不管怎样她定比我老很多.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000AB120_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you noticed Lucy's voice? It's so deep. I wonder if maybe she's really a boy dressed as a girl? That'd be a big surprise for someone, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有留意到瑞德露西的声音么?听起来相当沉闷,我在想她是不是一个男扮女装的男人呢?这对某些人来说可算是个大惊喜.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000AB11F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Nightkin are amazing when they sneak, aren't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 蓝皮人真的非常擅长潜行,不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0010303B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, sometimes I really miss Boone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道,有时候我真的很想念布恩.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0007DA65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ears for the guy at Camp Forlorn Hope. Heads for the guy at McCarran. The NCR is more bloodthirsty that I thought!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在见识了一线生机营地割军团耳朵的任务,还有麦卡伦营地的"猎头"行动之后,我觉得NCR比我想象的要更嗜血.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_00076F4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe we're getting ears for that guy at Camp Forlorn Hope. It's disgusting. I don't want to carry 'em, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信我们得给一线生机营地的这家伙去割死掉军团成员的耳朵,这实在太恶心了.我可不想做这么疯狂的事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's so cool up here. It's a nice break from the heat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿挺凉快的,是个挺不错的避暑的地方.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0005EEBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe after I've seen the Mojave I'll go back to Novac to live. Wouldn't it be fun to stay in one of those little bungalows at the motel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许在见识完莫哈维之后我会回到诺瓦克去生活,住在汽车旅馆的一间小平房里不是很有趣么.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy at the Mojave Outpost told me there's some horrible nest of Deathclaws near a place called Sloan. We're not going there are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维前哨站的一个家伙跟我说在斯罗恩附近有一些可怕的死亡爪巢穴,我们现在不是在往那里走吧,是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0ABF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if those ants at Boomtown really explode. If it's true, that'd be worth seeing, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想大炮族那里的蚂蚁真的会爆炸么,如果那是真的,那可值得一看啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0007382F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raising that plane off the bottom of the lake was one of the neatest things I've ever seen. Whoosh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那架飞机用充气垫从湖底浮起,是我看过最巧妙的一件事了.Whoosh!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000A1759_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too bad the Fiends are such assholes. I like those scary helmets they wear. I'd love to wear one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮就是一群混蛋.不过我挺喜欢他们那些古怪的头骨帽子,好想也来一个呐~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0ABA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you do right, like some other men do. Get out of here, give me some money too.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000A4F38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How lucky can one girl be? I kissed him and he kissed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000A4F39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How lucky can one girl be? I kissed her and she kissed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000A4F3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0AA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so blue without you, thought our love was true, then you found someone new.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting, watching the stars above. Hoping that I could win back your love.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You loved me so, but let me go. Now I'll never know how our love will grow.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blue moon you saw me standing alone, without a dream in my heart, without a love of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000D80A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000D80A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you do right, like some other men do. Get out of here, give me some money too.
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼哼小调~>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000D80A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000DC28E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *yawns*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0000A69D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0AB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hungry. Oh, that's all I talk about, huh? Food. I guess I should talk about something else once in awhile. But, I like food a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 饿了..呃,我是说,吃的..呃..我想偶尔也应该说点别的..但是.....我要吃的......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0AB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for my present. I'm snacking on it right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你给我的小礼物,我正在消化它呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B187A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to eat the present you gave me. Thanks again for being so sweet to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你给我的小礼物吃掉啦~谢谢你对我这么好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna have a Dog Biscuit, do you want one too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要来块小狗饼干,你要不要也来点?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1878_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold up. I'm thirsty and want a drink. I can't keep up the pace and drink at the same time. I'll fall flat on my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,渴了,让我喝点东西.我不能边走边喝,会洒一脸的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0004A22A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold up. I'm thirsty and want a drink. You look like you could use one too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,我渴了而且我想喝一口水,你看起来也需要喝一杯.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_00074F4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm famished. Do you think we could stop for a campfire and a proper meal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我饿得能吃下一头大角羊了...你觉得我们停下来生堆火再准备点干净的肉怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0005D8D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yawn, I sure could go for some coffee.
ESP.TRADUIT: <困.....>该来点咖啡了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_00005B7C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sleepy. Are we going to stay out all night?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都睁不开眼了..咱们要在野外站一晚上吗.....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_00005B79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're carrying dogmeat on you. I sure hope you don't expect me to cook that for you. Eww, or watch you eat it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你身上带着狗肉.希望你没指望我为你做那个...或者看你吃...。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1E36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, if we run into any geckos I could use some meat. For cooking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,如果我们碰到蜥蜴的话记得弄点肉下来,可以做好吃哒~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000803A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate being stung by those stupid things. It ruins my whole day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌被一堆臭苍蝇一样的破事儿纠缠着,那会把我整整一天都毁掉的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0ABE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hear that? Huh. Maybe I imagined it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到什么了吗?唔,可能只是幻觉..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1081_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you smell that? Ugh, it's awful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你闻你闻!太香了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have I told you about the time that...wait do you hear that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有告诉过你那段日....等等你听到了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0AB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting soaked back here! Were you thinking maybe we'd take a break inside, somewhere? Sometime? While it's raining, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里泡够了,你有没有在某年某月于某时某地想过当下雨的时候我们可以去屋里避一避?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0004A234_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure miss Big George sometimes. He was such a great dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我很想念大狗乔乔.他是一只好狗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you see that? I have never seen two of anything doing that before. Wow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到了吗?我从来没见过任何两个东西可以做那个,哇噢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1083_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow! Dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！该死的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B1085_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oof. It's hot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢,太帅了~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0000A69B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know I want to learn to box, right? Well, I have 4 older brothers who used to beat me up as a kid. I'd love to pay them back when I get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我想学拳击的是不?好嘛,我的四个哥哥曾经把我像个小鬼一样揍.等回到家那天我一定要好好报答他们.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006AD96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only have brothers. Five brothers. Four older ones and a baby brother who's five years younger than me. I always wanted a sister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只有兄弟,五个.四个哥哥和一个比我小五岁的弟弟.我一直都想要个妹妹的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006AD99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you eat Pre-War food? I don't trust most of it, but I can't resist Fancy Lad Snack cakes, or gumdrops, or Junk Food, ooh but Salisbury Steak? Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你吃战前食品吗?尽管我对大多数都不太放心,不过我对蛋糕的抵抗力是0...还有口香糖...还有垃圾食品....还有肉排.......还有...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006AD97_1.ogg
