ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sneaking up behind a gecko, right? And I'm about to break cover when suddenly a Deathclaw runs up and grabs it. I swear I peed my pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我正在蜥蜴背后潜行,就在我要出手的一刹那一只死亡爪跳出来把它一口叼走了.,,.我当时裤子就湿了....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006AD9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you about the motel my parents own, right? My mom does most of the cooking for the guests. She's the one that taught me how to cook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你我爹妈的那个汽车旅馆,对吧?我妈妈主要负责给客人做饭.我的技术就是跟她磨练出来的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006A4FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time, when I was out exploring with one of my brothers, we found some Pre-war dog toys. A couple of them still squeaked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次,我跟我兄弟在外头四处探险,然后我们发现了一些战前狗玩具,其中一部分还能嘎吱嘎吱的响
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006AD98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mom, Coleen, makes the best coffee I've ever tasted. Everybody loves it, not just me. I try to make it, but it's never as good as hers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我妈妈,科伦,煮的咖啡是世界上最好的.每个人都很喜欢,不仅仅是我这么说!我也试着照做过,但永远都没法达到那种程度
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0001EDE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love to collect things. You should see my room back home. It's so stuffed with junk I can't get to my bed. My mom is always complaining about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我超爱囤东西的..你真应该看看我家后面我的屋子.简直连穿过那堆宝贝爬到床上去都是一种挑战.我妈经常抱怨这个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0006A4FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have I ever told you about the time my dog, Big George, cornered a baby molerat and its mom got so mad she nearly killed us both? I sure miss him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有曾跟你提过我的大狗乔乔, 有一回把一只变异鼹鼠和他老娘逼到几乎疯掉结果差点把我们俩都给害死的事儿吗?我真的很想念他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0005C1D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My oldest brother, Val, is a doctor. He tried to teach me some doctoring, but I just couldn't get the hang of it. He says I'm all thumbs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大哥,瓦尔,是一个医生,他曾经尝试过教我一些医疗技巧,结果我从来都没有掌握过诀窍.他表示我的妹妹不可能这么呆萌.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C439_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brothers, Sam and Dean, once hunted down a giant Gecko that was terrorizing the Grazing Grounds in Klamath. They got a big reward for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的兄弟,山姆和迪恩,曾经在克拉马斯牧场猎杀了一只特别特别大的蜥蜴.为此他们还得了一大笔的奖赏.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, one day this lady runs into Val's clinic yelling her head off that her baby's sick. Val unwraps the blanket and inside he finds a baby Molerat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有次,一个女孩跑进瓦尔的诊所喊道:她的宝宝生病了!他立刻收拾好东西和她一起,过去了才发现原来是一只鼹鼠宝宝!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuck told me that he once kicked a guy so hard in the head that his helmet flew up in to the top of a 50 foot tree and got stuck there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克告诉我:有一次他非常用力的踢人脑袋,结果那可怜的家伙的头盔飞了大概有50英尺高,而且还卡在一颗树上了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someday when I have kids I want to have five or six. I love my big family. There's always so much going on. It's never boring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果哪天我打算想要养孩子,那我打算养5个或者6个,我喜欢一个大家庭.总有那么多有趣的事.永远都不会无聊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When my friend Bethie and I were little we used to go visit this old lady named, Madame Zelda. She lived with nine molerats!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我小的时候我和我的朋友贝茜有时候会去拜访以为名叫塞尔达夫人的老奶奶.她和9只鼹鼠一起生活.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madame Zelda made potions and she would read our palms and tell our fortunes. Her predictions came true a lot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞尔达夫人会做一些药水还会通过看手相来预测未来.她的预测不少都成真了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C43F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madame Zelda once told me that I'd travel to New Vegas and meet the love of my life there. Interesting, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞尔达夫人告诉我我会旅行到新维加斯并且在那儿遇到我的至爱,很有意思,不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I tell you that Brian played the guitar? Because Madame Zelda once told us that Bethie would marry a guitar player.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要告诉你布莱恩会玩吉他?因为塞尔达夫人告诉我们贝茜会和一个吉他乐手结婚.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's quiet in the Mojave.You know, some places you go it's noisy; there's more birds, plants, animals and they all make noise. I like the peace here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在莫哈维还是有些安静的地方的,有些你去的地方实在太吵了；这里有很多鸟,植物,动物他们都在发出声音.我喜欢这里的宁静.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_0008C442_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it? Do you see something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咋了，你发现啥了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAlertWeaponOut_000B07BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAlertWeaponOut_000B0A9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring it on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAlertWeaponOut_000B0A9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have Moira.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有莫伊拉

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm thrilled to have Moira back, but I'd still like to find Chester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真高兴能把莫伊拉找回来,可我依然想把切斯特也找到
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFoundMoir_00021324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know where Chester is, we've followed the trail we had. Do you have any ideas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道切斯特在哪儿,线索就到这里了.你有什么主意么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, well, yeah, I do, actually. It's kind of embarrassing. I think the guy I was traveling with might have him. He was helping me carry my stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,好吧,没错.我还真有,实际上,这有点丢人.我想他可能在那个跟我一起旅行的家伙那里,他是帮我背东西的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021606_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We parted ways at the Mojave Outpost. He was the big, strong quiet type. Great for carrying stuff, but not a lot of fun. He didn't talk much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在莫哈维前哨站分开了.他是个超级人肉木头桩子.很擅长背东西,但是一点都不好玩,甚至他都不怎么说话的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021606_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have an idea where we might find him. He wouldn't say much about himself, but he did talk a little bit about where he was going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个办法也许能找到他.虽然他不怎么提起自己,但他的确多少说过一点他要去哪里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021606_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We didn't go to both places listed on the note. We can keep going if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不用把笔记上列出的这俩地方都走一遍.如果你喜欢的话咱们就继续追下去吧.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a good idea. But, I've been thinking about it, and, although, this is very embarrassing to admit, I don't think I had Chester with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这主意不错,但是我想过了.而且..那个,这事儿的确够丢人的,我手上没有切斯特
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021607_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the guy I was traveling with might have him. He was carrying some of my stuff for me. We parted ways at the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那个跟我一起旅行的家伙拿着他呢.他帮我背一部分行李.在莫哈维前哨站我们分开了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021607_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the big, strong quiet type. Not much fun, but great for carrying stuff. I didn't get many details out of him, but I think I know where he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个人肉木头桩子.很擅长背东西,但是一点都不好玩,我不太清楚他的背景,但我想我知道他在哪里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021607_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about Chester, but I need to get on with my business now. Maybe we can look again later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于切斯特我很抱歉,但我需要去处理我的问题了,也许我们可以晚点再找他?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might not be interested, but there's something I want to tell you. I don't think I had Chester with me when I was robbed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你不会感兴趣,但有些事我得告诉你.,被打劫的时候切斯特可能并不在我身上
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I left him with the guy I'd been traveling with. I put Chester in with his stuff. It was a joke. I think I forgot him there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把切斯特塞在那个和我一起旅行的人的行李里了,那是个玩笑,但我恐怕忘了把他取出来了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021608_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel stupid I made such a mistake and do still want to find Chester. If you ever change your mind I'll be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得自己真是笨笨,但我还是想把切斯特找回来,如果你改变心意了的话我们就马上行动吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021608_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you suggesting we track him down to get Chester?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是建议我们一路追踪他去把切斯特夺回来?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, yeah, I am. If you decide you're interested, I'll tell you everything I know about where he may be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,是的.没错.如果你依然有兴趣的话,我会告诉你有关他所在的一切线索
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0002160A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So maybe we shouldn't bother looking anymore and just find this guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们也许只需要在多麻烦一点找到这哥们就好咯?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't swear he has Chester, but he was carrying him at one point. It was a joke and then I forgot he had him. I just can't remember for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能保证他肯定带着切斯特,但他毕竟一直背着我的小熊.那只是个玩笑,而且后来我都忘了这事儿了.所以我现在也不太确定
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0002160C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound so uncertain. I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听上去一点都不确定,我得考虑一下

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but I'm willing to talk about it again at any time. I still want to find Chester very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,不过我随时都愿意继续下去,我真的很想把小熊找回来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0002160E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should try looking at the other location and then decide what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们应该试试另一个地点,然后再决定下一步怎么做

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00021610_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Chester. Where is this guy you were traveling with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说切斯特的事儿,那个跟你一起旅行的人现在在哪里?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wouldn't say much. Mostly when I asked him something all he'd say was,"Not your business." But, I did get a few details out of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的话不多,当我问他问题的时候,他的回答多半都是"跟你没关系".但是,我还是知道了他的一些事情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_WLPChesterTalkA_00021613_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he has a brother, or maybe it's a friend, who's a ghoul, who came here to join some cult. The Bright Followers or something. Near Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然他有一个兄弟,或者是朋友,呃,是僵尸族,曾经跑到这里试着加入一些诺瓦附近的团体.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_WLPChesterTalkA_00021613_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's going there to find the brother, or friend, to take him home again, I guess. That was all I could get out of him. He wasn't much of a talker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他要去找到这个兄弟或者朋友,带他回家?我猜.那就是我知道的全部了,他真的不爱说话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_WLPChesterTalkA_00021613_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] I don't have Moira. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎]我没有莫伊拉,抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe you. I think you have her. We will not be traveling together long if you plan on lying to me very often.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信你,你肯定有她.如果你总想这么骗人的话咱们就不用再一起旅行了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000232C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, okay. You caught me. I do have her. Sorry about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,好吧,你赢了.我的确有..抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were an ass earlier and now you've lied to me. Lie to anyone else, but not me. I don't like traveling with someone I can't trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你就是个混蛋,现在又骗我.随便你爱糊弄谁去,但是别指望能骗我.我不喜欢跟一个我根本不信任的人一起旅行
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000232D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for now, while we are traveling together, if you wouldn't mind, I'd like to keep looking for Chester. I've had him since I was a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于现在,鉴于我们还在一起旅行,如果你不介意的话我想继续寻找切斯特.当我还是个小女孩的时候他就是我的朋友了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000232D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't lie to me. Lie to anybody else, but not me. I want to be able to trust the person I'm traveling with, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请别骗我.随便你爱糊弄谁去,但是别指望能骗我.我不喜欢跟一个我根本不信任的人一起旅行,明白?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00023890_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm still very interested in looking for Chester. Can we make time for that in our travels? I've had him since I was a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是想找到切斯特,我们能在旅途中分出点时间做这个吗?当我还是个小女孩的时候他就是我的朋友了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00023890_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] No, really, I don't have her. You're wrong. I wouldn't lie to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎]不,真的,我真的没有.你错了.我不会对你扯谎的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. But if you do have her, and I find out for sure, I won't just forgive and forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会补偿对你的怀疑.但假如你真的有她,而且被我找到,别指望我会简简单单的原谅然后忘掉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000232D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Give her back! I can't believe you took Moira from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿!把她还给我!真不敢相信你想把莫伊拉从我身边抢走!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDGrabsMoir_000232CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别客气,维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promised I would travel with you if we found Beauty. So, should we talk about this? Iron out some details?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证过如果我们找到红颜就和你一起旅行,所以,我们要不要谈谈?弄清一些细节问题?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDBeautyHir_00025DD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk? What is there to talk about? You're going to follow me around and do whatever I say, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈?谈啥?你得跟我走,做我说的一切,懂吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, no. I have no intention of doing that. We definitely need to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,不.我对那个没兴趣.我们绝对需要谈一下
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, your teasing me, aren't you? That was a good one. Yeah, you got me. Right? That was a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,你在调戏我,是么?给你加一分,好极了,你得到我了,行不?别闹了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260B8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure. Whatever you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,当然.无论你想怎么样

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm trying to be serious here. We should probably get some things cleared up before we hit the road. I want us to get along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,都严肃点!在上路前有些事恐怕得说清楚,我想我们能和平相处
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's do this. I'd like to be very clear about how we're going to do things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,就这样吧,我喜欢把话都讲明白

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,很好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything in particular you want to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么是你特别想谈的么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I can't fight with anything other than a gun. I'm lousy at anything else. Okay, I can fight with my fists if I'm cornered... by a radroach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩!我没法用枪械之外的东西作战.完全的小白..所以,要是把老娘惹急了我也能用拳头的,,比如我嗑药了..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd love to learn more, and would be willing to study, but for now I'm pretty useless. I just wanted to be really clear about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很愿意多学一点,也很想这样,但是现在我真是一点用都没有啊.我只是想把这事儿说清楚...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, don't expect me to fight with anything other than a gun. Okay? I won't do it. Not with my skills the way they are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以,别指望我能用枪械以外的东西作战好吗?我不要..至少现在不要....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. What if we trained you somehow? Is that possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,那么如果训练你一下呢?有戏没?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I read books and magazines about Boxing to learn what I can. But, they're hard to find. I've only ever found a couple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔,我能读拳击方面的书和杂志来学到一些有用的东西.但是他们很不好找.我也只能找到一点点来看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I can read enough of them I figure eventually I'll get good enough to be able to use better weapons and kick some ass in a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果能读得足够多的话估计我肯定可以使用更好的武器踢爆一堆坏人的屁股~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢!哇噢!哇噢!你知道那应该会更好?如果能找到什么人来教我呢!你的技术怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260BE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. I don't really care. I prefer guns myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题,我不怎么在乎.我自己宁可用枪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm glad you don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我很高兴你不介意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I read books and magazines about Boxing to learn what I can. But, they're hard to find. I've only ever found a couple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔,我能读拳击方面的书和杂志来学到一些有用的东西.但是他们很不好找.我也只能找到一点点来看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I can read enough of them I figure eventually I'll get good enough to be able to use better weapons and kick some ass in a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果能读得足够多的话估计我肯定可以使用更好的武器踢爆一堆坏人的屁股~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢!哇噢!哇噢!你知道那应该会更好?如果能找到什么人来教我呢!你的技术怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not happy about this, Willow. What else won't you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对此不是很满意,维儿,你还能做些什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, what seems like the best plan? I could fight with my fists if you asked me to, probably getting really hurt in the process and doing you no good
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔..什么样的看上去才是最好的计划?如果你坚持的话我可以用拳头打架,但我不保证到底会打到谁...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: or since I'm a great shot, I can use a gun, and effectively protect myself and you. It seems silly for me to use anything but a gun right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我是个很好的射手,我可以用枪很有效的保护我自己还有你.目前来说用枪之外的东西显然很蠢..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, if you only travel with people who can use a knife or their fists then, yeah, I'm not your girl. Unless you're willing to train me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,如果你只是跟一些会用拳头和匕首人一起旅行过的话呢,好吧,我不是你的类型.除非你愿意教我
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260C3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Train you? How would I do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 教你?怎么教?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me any books or magazines you find about boxing I'll read them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要把你找到的拳击杂志和书给我就好啦,我会去读的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually I figure I'll learn enough to use better weapons and be able to hold my own in a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我终归是会能用一些更好的武器在战斗中保护自己的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢!哇噢!哇噢!你知道那应该会更好?如果能找到什么人来教我呢!你的技术怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260CF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want to worry about training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,忘了我说的那些.但我不会用枪之外的方式战斗的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, forget I said anything about it. But I won't fight with anything but a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，忘掉我说了什么。但我不会与任何东西打一架除非带着枪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000260CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found Beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到红颜了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFoundBeau_000260CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have Chester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到切斯特了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for helping me. It means the world to me that you took the time to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你对我的帮助。谢谢你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFoundChes_000BC545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you find Moira or Chester?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有找到莫伊拉或切斯特么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDMoiraForc_000263AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have something to tell you. I will ask you to carry items I don't want you to use or touch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些事情得告诉你,我会要你帮我带一些我不想让你碰或使用的东西

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's no fun, I can look at them can't I? Alright, I'm willing to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,这一点也不可笑,我至少能看看他们吧,是不?好吧..我愿意帮你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的啥不？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have something for you. It's a radio. My dad got them for me. One for me and one for whoever I was traveling with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些东西要给你,是一个步话机.我爸爸给我的.其中一个给我,另一个给和我旅行的人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was worried about me going out on my own and thought this might make me that much safer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很担心我自己一个人在外头跑,所以想也许这个可以让我更安全一点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're broken now and can only receive messages, but since you have that computer with you we'll be able to use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们现在有毛病了,只能接受信息.不过既然你有那个电脑所以也许你可以使用他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be able to talk to me because of it. I met someone else with one of those and it worked great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以通过它和我说话,我碰到过其他一些带着这玩意的人,看起来工作的好极了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, if that's everything I guess we should consider ourselves partners on the road for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,如果这就是全部,我想我们可以在路上考虑一下彼此的合作伙伴关系

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't think of anything else, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可想的了,走吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000263B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. I don't want you back that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了他吧,我不想让你背太多

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I figured as much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,我也是这么想的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFiredRehi_000C0A0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,走吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm not coming back with you. You sent me away and said you didn't want to be with me any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不会再回来了,你把我赶走还说再也不想跟我在一块了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFiredRehi_000C0A0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if you want me back you're going to have to do something to prove to me you want me back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,如果你想的话你就得去做一些事情证明自己
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFiredRehi_000C0A0C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, sorry I can't train you. I don't have the skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,抱歉我没法训练你.我没那个技术

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well, maybe we'll find someone else who can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,好吧.也许我们可以找别人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00028ED3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do have the skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,我的确能教你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's great news!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是个好消息！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00028ED2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found Beauty and you helped me so much! Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到红颜了,你帮了我那么多,真是太感谢了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDBeautyFG_00029D2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有什么别的建议?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forgot to ask. What's your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我忘了问。你叫什么名字？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCNameFG_0002DC4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm good. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我很好。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_000A073E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done. Do you have anything to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，有啥别的要说的没？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_00064162_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_000743C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们走
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_0006416A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，我们出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_00064168_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hit the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们上路吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_000086FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say, boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你说什么，老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_0009C681_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,回头见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDAdiosPLAY_000E23F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 白~

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I talk to you about something for a minute...
ESP.TRADUIT: 能占用你几分钟时间说点事儿么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDDoSomethingEls_0003326E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done. Is there anything you want to talk to me about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了,你有什么要说的吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm good. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我很好,谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAdiosPlayer_00033278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still interested in me giving you some hand-to-hand combat training?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有兴趣让我教你一些徒手格斗的技术么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Can we do it now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!我们能现在就做吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCTrainca_0003858F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do that training now. Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们开始训练吧,准备好了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!绝对好了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCtrainRe_00038591_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, we'll have to do it later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉,晚点吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, alright. But don't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,好吧,可千万别忘了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCtrainLa_00038590_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sure, we can do it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,当然了.现在就做吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCtrainRi_0003858E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Willow? You want to talk about Unarmed training?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咋了维儿？有什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how you've been helping me learn to fight better with my fists? Well, I think I'm good enough to do it for real now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你对我的拳术学习帮助有多大吗?恩~~我想现在已经完全可以实战啦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDUnarmedFG_000393E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And look what I've been saving to use someday. So, I can fight now, any time with them. Pretty exciting, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等着哪天我就会用上他们挽救世界的,哼~我现在可以格斗啦,随时随地的~是不是很酷嗯?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDUnarmedFG_000393E5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a boxing magazine. Do you want to read it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有本拳击杂志,想读读看么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,谢了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDMagazine_0003D8B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a book about boxing. Do you want to read it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到本拳击教材,有兴趣读读看吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,谢了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSkillBook_0003D8B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me what you've stolen from Willow and I'll let you walk away from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你从维儿那儿偷得东西交出来,然后我就放你走

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get lost!
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩蛋去吧!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [010191EB] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowKylesVoice\AWillowANP_AWOAKyleGreetin_0003E709_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stopping to talk to me was a big mistake...it makes you a better target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拒绝和我谈话是个大错误....这让你变成了一个很好的靶子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来啊!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [010191EB] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowKylesVoice\AWillowANP_AWOAKyleGreetin_0003E70A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the guys who took my stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这家伙拿了我的的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDSpotsKK_0003E70E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might have. What did they look like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能有,他们是什么样的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. They looked like regular guys. There were two of them. One had very bright red hair and the other one was wearing some kind of helmet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道.都是些大众脸的家伙.其中有俩人,一个有一头非常亮红色的头发,另一个带着某种头盔
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0003ECCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you alright? Did they hurt you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗?他们伤到你了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should stop traveling together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想分手的时候到了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? You want to stop traveling with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当真?你不想再跟我一起旅行了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiring_0003F28B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no, that sounds very final, doesn't it. Forget I said anything. Stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃不.这太扯了,忘了我说的吧,都是屏幕外面的那个家伙干的(不要打破第四面墙).别离开我...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I will. Are you messing with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会的.跟我在一起会困惑么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringNo_0003F28C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I want you to leave. It's not you. It's me. I need my space.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我想让你离开.不是你的问题,只是我需要点空间

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll go find someone else to travel with..are you sure this is what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧.我去找别人一起旅行...最后一遍,你确定吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYes_000C0A02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll go find somebody else to travel with..I don't need you. Are you sure this is what you really want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧.我去找别人一起旅行...我不需要你.最后一遍,你确定吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYes_000C0A03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I want you to leave. It's not you. It's me. I need my space.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你走吧。我需要冷静一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you please go back to the Suite at the Lucky 38 and wait for me there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能回Lucky 38的套间那里等我去吗拜托?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without you? Alright, but it won't be any fun. I don't like it there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不一起?好吧,不过那可真够无聊的,我一点都不喜欢那里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYesSuite_0003F28E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me what you've stolen from Willow and I'll let you walk away from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你从维儿那儿偷得东西交出来,然后我就放你走

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别在意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkNeverm_00041D8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Do you see that giant, uh, gecko, whatever that is, over there? Can we go see that? I bet you can go inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢!你看到那个玩意..呃..是个大个蜥蜴吗,不管那是个啥,就在那儿?我们能去看看吗?我打赌它可以一口吞了你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Novac_00042626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, it's a Sunset Sarsaparilla mug. Do you like it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，这是夕阳沙士徽章。喜欢么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you mind keeping watch here for awhile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意在这里继续警戒一会吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can do that. No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,没问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGuardAlert_00044008_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard about the ghouls outside of Novac. I know where they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说过那个诺瓦镇外面的僵尸族人,我知道他们在哪儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have? That's great. Can we go there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有?真是个好消息啊,我们能去那里么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004400B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bright Followers aren't there any more. Well, most of them that I know about anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱特的追随者们早不在那里了.好吧,至少是我知道的大部分人

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think that matters. It doesn't mean that he hasn't gone there looking for his friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为那有什么关系.这并不意味着他没有来这里找过他的朋友
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004400D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go find your friend. What's his name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们去诺瓦克吧.我们可以问问那片的僵尸族们有关你朋友的事儿,他叫什么名字?

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name. Yeah, well, I just call him The Big Guy. He never told me his name in all the time we were together. Weird, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字..恩..好吧,我一直管它叫大个子. 我们在一起那么久了但他从来都没告诉过我他的名字,古怪吧,是不?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004400F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I guess you'll need his description. He's very tall, and he wears a cowboy hat with a feather. Oh, and he's a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我想你需要他的描述。他非常高大，他戴着牛仔帽，羽毛。哦，他是一个食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004400F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for filling me in. We'll check it out if I get the time to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢告知,如果路过诺瓦克附近我们就停下来查查看

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, alright. I hope there's something to find when we finally get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,希望最终我们到那里的时候还有什么可以找得到的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. We can go there and look for Chester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我们可以去那里找切斯特.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can? Right now? Well, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能吗?现在?哇噢,出发吧!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044014_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and you'll want to know who you're looking for, right? He's a big, tall ghoul and he always wears a cowboy hat with a feather in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,另外你一定想知道咱们到底在找谁,对不?他是一个很高很大的僵尸族,另外他还戴着一顶插着羽毛的牛仔帽
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044014_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know his name, if you can believe it. I just called him The Big Guy the whole time we were together. He has a dog with him named J.T.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他的名字,如果你能相信的话.在一起的时候我一直叫他大个子而已.他有一只叫J.T的狗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044014_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually. We'll get there when we get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等最终到那的时候我们就到那儿了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I understand. I'll try to be patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我能理解..我会试着耐心一点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044015_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. I think we should go there now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意,我想我们应该立刻去那里

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了,走吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044017_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and you'll want to know who you're looking for, right? He's a big, tall ghoul and he always wears a cowboy hat with a feather in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,另外你一定想知道咱们到底在找谁,对不?他是一个很高很大的僵尸族,另外他还戴着一顶插着羽毛的牛仔帽
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044017_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know his name, if you can believe it. I just called him The Big Guy the whole time we were together. He has a dog with him named J.T.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他的名字,如果你能相信的话.在一起的时候我一直叫他大个子而已.他有一只叫J.T的狗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044017_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's true. But he's probably left by now. There's no need for us to rush to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,但他现在可能早离开了.所以我们没必要催命一样的....

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I sure hope there's some trace of him when we finally get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,希望等我们到那儿的那天还有些他的线索可查
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no threat. I'm not feral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有什么威胁,我也不凶
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaFirst_00044E7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I can see that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是,我看得出来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底为什么来的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaFGRes_0004544D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Can you answer some questions for me? Wow, you have unusual hair for a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好,你可以回答我一些问题么?哇噢,对一个僵尸来说你的头发还真是稀罕

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take great care of my appearance. I was a performer on The Strip for quite a long time before I came her to be with Jason and the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很在乎形象的.早在我变成"她"并和杰森还有那帮追随者们在一起之前的相当长一段时间里我都是个演员
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044E7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back then, my looks kept me employed...and busy...and near the bright lights and interesting people...but I shouldn't go on about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再之前,我的脸蛋让我得到了一份工作...而且很忙...而且很靠近聚光灯和兴趣盎然的人群,但我真不该继续下去的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044E7E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just say, thank you, as a lady should. I really think it's my best asset after my smile. Don't you agree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只能说,谢谢,以一位女士所应有的礼节.我觉得这真的是我笑容背后最大的财富.你同意吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044E7E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, absolutely. I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,当然,绝对的.我正在找一个人,有见过一个个子很高戴着一顶牛仔帽的僵尸么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: <laughs nervously> Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: <谨慎的笑> 有见过一个个子很高戴着一顶牛仔帽的僵尸么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say your hair is your best asset, since you're asking. I don't see the charm in rotting teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得说你的头发就是你最好的财富,既然你问了.我没在一堆烂糟牙里看到什么魅力

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, your manners aren't the best, but you're honest. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,你的方式差了点,但你很诚实.我能为你做些什么
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00044E83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean Jefferson isn't here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在说杰佛森对嘛?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him that Jefferson had gone out into the Mojave, as other Followers have done before him, but that he had never returned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟他们说杰佛森跑进莫哈维沙漠里去了,在其他的追随者们之前.但他再也没回来过
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045162_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We assumed he had died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都只当他已经死了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045162_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know why he keeps coming back everyday if Jefferson is dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他死了的话你知道为什么杰佛森每天都会回来转转吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't know why he keeps coming back. But, I like seeing him so I haven't tried to make him stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不知道他为什么一直这样.但是,我想见他,所以我一直都没有阻止他这样
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045168_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When do you expect him today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们今天在哪里见面?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really don't know. Some days I don't see him until three or four in the afternoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不知道.有些时候直到下午三四点我才能看到他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004516A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do know he stays out at that camp by the gate. There's a bed. He sleeps there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道他在大门外宿营,那里有张床,他就睡在那里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004516A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, thanks. Why are you here? Why didn't you go off in the rockets with Jason and the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,谢了.但你为什么在这里?为什么不进城去和杰森还有其他的追随者呆在一起?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I missed the launch. I was away in the Wasteland and I don't know, really, what to do with myself...now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想念火箭.我在废土里游荡,我不知道,真的..我真不知道现在我还能干什么..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045449_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to go with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟他一起走
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045449_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know if he'll take me. I haven't the courage to ask him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不知道如果他是不是愿意带上我.我没这个勇气去问
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045449_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, thanks. What is this place? Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,谢谢.这是什么地方?你怎么在这儿?

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the home of the Bright Followers. Jason Bright is the leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是布莱特的追随者的家.杰森布莱特是领袖
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004544B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of Jason, and this place, and the Followers and would love to run away with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够杰森了,还有这个地方,还有那些追随者.我宁可躲着点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004544B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I don't know if he'll take me I haven't the courage to ask him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,我不知道他是不是愿意带上我,我没那个勇气去问
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004544B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, thanks. Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,谢了.再见

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045450_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个人.有见过一个带着牛仔帽的高个子僵尸吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, he comes by everyday to see me. Well, not me, he's looking for that Jefferson fellow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,他每天都会来看我.好吧,不是我,他是在找杰佛森的追随者
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045737_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I like to think he's looking for me. I have such a crush on him. He's so big and tall and handsome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我喜欢这么以为,我有点迷恋他,他是那么高大英俊..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045737_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个人.有见过一个带着牛仔帽的高个子僵尸吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like me to talk to him for you? I can ask him to take you with him when he leaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我代你去跟他谈谈么?我可以问问等他离开的时候是不是愿意带着你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that would be wonderful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,那样太好了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045454_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for your help. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助,再见了

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045738_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, what's your name? I'll be sure to ask him when I speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,你叫什么?当我跟他说话的时候一定会问的

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Jessica, and thank you for helping me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰茜卡, 谢谢你的帮助
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00045456_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaAdios_0004573A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so very much. I must get ready to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实在太感谢你了,我必须准备好离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaAdios_0004A53E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, thanks. Why are you hanging around out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,谢谢.为什么你会在这里晃荡?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of Jason, and this place, and the Followers and would love to run away with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够杰森了,还有这个地方,还有那些追随者.我宁可躲着点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004573E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I don't know if he'll take me I haven't the courage to ask him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,我不知道他是不是愿意带上我,我没那个勇气去问
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004573E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good dog!
ESP.TRADUIT: 乖狗狗!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANPC_AWLPJTAdios_00046E39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a good looking fella, aren’t you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个棒小伙子,是不?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pant, pant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼呼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANP_AWLPJTResponse1_00046E37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I had a dog biscuit for you, buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望我能有块狗饼干给你,哥们

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pant, pant, pant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼呼呼~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANP_AWLPJTResponse2_00047123_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whine!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANP_AWLPJTResponse2_00047124_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like a dog biscuit, boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要块狗饼干吗小伙子?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid mutt, you don't know what I'm saying, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢货,你根本不知道我在说什么,是不?

ESP.ORIGINAL: growl...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANP_AWLPJTResponse3_00047126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAtWakeUpGreeti_00049F0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there's nothing better than a good night's sleep in a comfortable bed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，啥都比不上在一张舒服的床上睡个安稳觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAtWakeUpGreeti_00049F10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some coffee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些咖啡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAtWakeUpGreeti_00049F11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have it? Will you give it to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有吗?可以给我点吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that girl, Jessica, the Bright Follower? The one that waits to see you everyday?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个杰茜卡,布莱特的追随者?就是每天等着见你那个?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_00049F22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's madly in love with you and wants to run away with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她已经爱你爱的痴狂了,想和你一起私奔呐

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might want to consider asking her to go away with you. I think she likes you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许可以考虑问问她是不是愿意跟你一起走了,我想她很喜欢你

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She does! And she's so pretty. She's got that great smile and that hair! You should go for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的确是!而且她很辣!瞧瞧那迷人的笑容和那秀发吧!你还犹豫什么呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的对,我得上...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So are you going to take her with you when you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你离开的时候会带上她吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you're looking for a man named Jefferson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你在找一个叫杰佛森的男人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_00049F2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's pretty certain he's dead, right? So you must have a pretty good reason for staying here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但很明显他已经死了不是吗?所以你还呆在这儿一定是有一个好理由

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow told me you wouldn't say much. She was right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿告诉我说你不怎么爱说话,还真是

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, he's dead. You're wasting your time. Are you going to keep standing here hoping he'll show up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,他死了.你在浪费时间.所以你还打算继续戳在这儿等着他出来么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I am. What of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,没错.有问题?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw the note. You must be desperate for the money to keep hanging around like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到笔记了,你肯定是特别缺钱才会在这里逛荡个没完没了的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00049F38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I wasn't wondering that. He would have been asking about ghoul activity in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我一点都不惊讶.他会一直在这里打听僵尸族在这片的活动情况

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that. Lately there's been talk of ghouls just a bit west of Novac up in the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,那个.他们曾说过那些僵尸族就在诺瓦偏西一丁点的一座山上
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBrisc_00049F48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat been in here asking questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾有过一个带着牛仔帽的高个子僵尸族来这里问过问题么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but he didn't buy any souvenirs if that's what you're wondering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,但他什么纪念品都没买,如果你是想问这个的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBrisc_00049F47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did a big, tall ghoul in a cowboy hat come in asking about the ghouls up at REPCONN?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是一点点,他来这里问到其他的僵尸族,那些在Repcon机器人公司的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleOld01\AWillowANP_AWNPCJeannieMay_00049F4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did a ghoul in a cowboy hat with a feather come and ask you some questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾有过一个戴着一顶插着羽毛的牛仔帽的高个子僵尸族来问过你什么问题吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who sent you? I ain't talking. They tried to get me to talk before, but I didn't say nothing, and don't aim to now, by gum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁派你来的?我不会说的.他们也曾试着让我开过口.但我什么都没说.所以也"别打此时此刻的主意",这是伟大的高姆说的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : No-bark Noonan [0008CD23] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleOld02\AWillowANPC_AWNPCNOBark_00049F4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不禁想收拾收拾，看起来真是糟糕透顶。要是我看到啥好东西我就偷偷的把它顺出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCRStatio_0004A231_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCRStatio_000A4F40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, J.T. How ya doing, ya good dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,J.T,怎么样啊乖狗狗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDConvoJTx1_0004A514_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pant, pant, pant
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼呼呼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowANP_WLPJTWillowResp_0004CA93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] She says the Bright Followers want you to leave here. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎]她说那些追随者们想让你立刻离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A51E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave. It would be the best thing for everyone involved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开.这对每个牵涉其中的人来说都是最好的情况

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开玩笑吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A520_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't want you here. She doesn't want you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不想让你呆在这里,她也不想

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is with you? Just give it up already. Jefferson's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿得是什么?放弃吧.杰佛森已经死了

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're probably right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A526_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you telling me you won't go? She's asked me to take care of you if you won't agree to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想告诉我你不打算走么?她说如果你不打算离开的话就让我好好关照你

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A528_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time for me to do something about you since you are being so uncooperative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么不合作的话我想是时候对你做一些必要的事情了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A52A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you some time to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给你点时间让你好好考虑一下

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A52D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know about the reward for taking him back, but he's dead. You're never going to see that money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道把他带回去有悬赏,但他死了.你这辈子都甭打算看到那些钱了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A534_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've given it your best shot. You've done everything you could. You should just leave now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经尽了最大的努力,也做了所有你可以做的,但现在你应该离开了

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的,我应该这样
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A537_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've talked to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟他谈过了

ESP.ORIGINAL: And?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaRetur_0004A539_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed him? Well, fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了他吗？好了，你他妈的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A53C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says he'll take you with him when he leaves. Great news, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他愿意带着你一起离开.好消息恩?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A53D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, please, take this. It's not much, but it's all I have. I'd like to give it to you as a thank you for what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，请在此。这不是很多，但它是我的一切。我想给你，感谢你为你做了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0004A53D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you two headed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们俩在哪儿见?

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're headed back out to where he came from; some place in the NCR. I hope everything turns out okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他来的地方.NCR的某处.只希望每件事都会变得顺利起来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried to talk him into going back to New Vegas with me or maybe settling down in the Mojave somewhere but he wasn't interested so off we go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着劝他带我一起回到维加斯去或者就在莫哈维沙漠里的某处也可以,但他不是很感兴趣
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On your bedroll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 躺到你的铺盖卷上去

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAASleepHereBed_0004C7B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't think we'd ever find you. Do you still have Chester, my teddy bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真没想到我们还能再找到你.切斯特还在你身上吗,我的小乖熊?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_WLPTBGWillowtoT_0004E181_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTBGChesterto_0004E183_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's quite an outfit you're wearing. Does that offer you much protection on the road?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你穿的那个真不赖,能在路上给你提供更多舒适保护吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all I had when I left the Bright Followers. It's one of the outfits I used to wear when I performed on The Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我离开布莱特的追随者之后就只剩下这个了.这是我还是演员时穿的服装之一
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaLeave_0004E742_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, he likes the way I look in it and I've got him to keep me safe. What more does a girl need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外,他喜欢我选的路,而且有他保护我的安全,对一个姑娘来说还有什么可追求的呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaLeave_0004E742_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿干什么呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're hanging out here for a little while before we move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开前我们在这里最后怀念一会..
