ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_WLPJessicaChatP_0004E746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] He doesn't want anything to do with you. I tried to get him to change his mind. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: [撒谎] 他根本不想理你.我试着说服他改变心意了,抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for trying...can you leave me alone now? Just go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的努力...可以让我独自呆一会吗?请离开吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jessica [01044B98] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowJessicasVoice\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00051AD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go back to sleep. Sorry I woke you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去睡吧,抱歉把你弄醒了

ESP.ORIGINAL: <yawn> No problem. See you in the morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: <打哈欠> 没事...拜拜....早上见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSleepGoBacktoS_0005209F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, sleepyhead, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起了,懒虫.该出发啦

ESP.ORIGINAL: <yawn> I'm coming.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSleepGetupNow_0005209E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, if you ever want to borrow Beauty from me, feel free, because I can use these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,如果什么时候你想借红颜用用的话请随意,反正我可以用这个....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDUnarmedFG_000531D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, I've been thinking about it, you know, now that I'm trained to fight up close, I think I could handle a knife or a something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外我想了想,你知道的,既然搏击没什么问题,估计匕首这类的玩意现在对我也没什么难度了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDUnarmedFG_000531D1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kyle [010191EB] (mod) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowKylesVoice\AWillowANP_AWOAKKyleGreeti_000531EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want a rocket souvenir too! For my collection!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想要个火箭纪念品嘛...好不好 -。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RocketSouven_000531EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I borrow Beauty for a while, Willow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以借你的红颜步枪用用吗,维儿?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, of course. Take good care of her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，当然。要照顾她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDBorrowBeauty_000531F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would! Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的!谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDBorrowBeauty_000531F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want Beauty back? I'm done with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想把红颜要回去吗?我用好了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember you promised to travel with me whether we found Beauty or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还记得不,你承诺说不管能不能找到红颜步枪都会跟我一起旅行的,对不?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am traveling with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在跟你旅行呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk to you, again, about traveling with me, properly, without Beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你说点事儿,呃又一次.有关跟我旅行的事,大概..红颜步枪得缺席了..

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought we covered this? I am traveling with you. What more is there to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为咱们这事儿咱们解决了?我已经在跟你旅行了啊,还要说什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTravelWOBeauty_000531FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still don't have Beauty and nothing's changed between us. We need to solve this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是没有找到红颜步枪,而且咱俩之间的关系一点都没变化.不能这样下去

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Let's solve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,咱们把这事解决了吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTravelWOBeauty_000531FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I mean, really travel with me. Working with me cooperatively and everything...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我是说,真正的跟我一起旅行,和我在每件事上采取积极的配合态度

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not being cooperative?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还不够配合?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000531FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could be more cooperative. You promised you would be even if we didn't find your rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以更配合一点.你保证过如果找不到步枪的话也会跟我好好旅行的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you even trying to find Beauty for me or did you just think since I agreed to come either way you wouldn't even try?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你是有真的找红颜步枪了呢,还是因为我答应过无论如何都会旅行,所以压根就不打算找呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053202_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did say that, it's true. But we haven't been looking all that long. We can talk about this again soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确是那么说过,没错.但是我们根本就还没怎么找呢.我们早晚还得扯回这个问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005E475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could be more cooperative. You promised to work closely with me if we didn't find your rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以更合作一点的,你承诺过即使找不到你的步枪也会跟我紧紧在一起工作的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. You're fine. I just want you to know I'm looking forward to when that happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,你真行.我只是想让你知道这事儿总得有点盼头

ESP.ORIGINAL: To when what happens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 盼头?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053203_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To when we find Beauty and everything works really well between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们找到我的步枪,咱们就会紧紧的在一起融洽的合作了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,好吧,谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053205_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you don't have Beauty yet, but I'm not happy with our situation. I want more from you, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你还没得到枪,但令我不开心的是现在的状况.我想从你那得到更多,马上!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to give up looking for Beauty. I think if you get what you want we won't look for her anymore. So, no. I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没打算放弃寻找我的枪,估计如果你得到了你一直盘算的东西也就不会再去找她了,所以,不,现在不行
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053207_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You promised me. It bothers me that you are breaking that promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你向我承诺过,现在你打破了这个诺言让我实在很困扰

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but I have my reasons for acting this way. Just give me more time, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉,但我这么做有我自己的理由,就在给我多一点时间吧好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053209_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't we make this work for both of us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就不能达成共识么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, probably not. Not unless you have Beauty behind your back and you're just playing games with me for some reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,大概不能.除非你能把那把枪重新背在背上,不然你只是出于某种理由在玩我
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005320B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you have no intention of fulfilling your promise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你不打算再实践你的诺言了是吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't say that. I just want to keep looking for a while longer before I commit myself to anything, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没那么说,我只是想在说服自己放弃前再多找一阵子而已
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005320D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want you to know that I understand why you are holding back right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想告诉你我理解你现在为什么这么裹足不前

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005320F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. You think if you give it all up right away I won't look for Beauty. So, don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然.你以为假如你放弃的话我就再也不会去找那把枪了.所以,别担心

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something has to change. I'm very unhappy with this arrangement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些事情必须改变,我对这种辩论实在很不爽

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to find Beauty, and, I want to find her more than I care about breaking my promise to you. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找到红颜枪,而且,那比遵守诺言的感情还强烈,抱歉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053213_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to change the way things are without my rifle. You can say what you like about me and my integrity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算改变我对步枪还没找到这件事儿的看法.你可以对我和我的诚信问题随便怎么说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053213_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay. We'll go find Beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧,我们会去找你的枪的..

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will? You mean it? I didn't mean to lie when you first found me. I really meant what I said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会去?你当真?第一次见你的时候我没打算撒谎的.真的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053215_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry if I've been terrible to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果惹到你了我很抱歉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053215_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liar. I'm done with you. Go back to the Mojave Outpost and find somebody else to travel with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骗子,我跟你完了.回莫哈维前哨站去找别人旅行吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053217_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you happy with the way things are between us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对咱俩现在的情况满意吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not happy. But I'm more unhappy that I don't have Beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,但枪还没找回来这事儿更不
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've mentioned that you have a collection. What do you collect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾说你有收藏癖来着,你都收集点什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I scavenge for stuff to sell I look for special little things that I might like to keep. I have a collection of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在倒卖东西的时候会专门留意保存一些特别的小玩意,我就喜欢收藏这些小东西
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkCollec_000534FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't shown them to you because, well, a girl likes to have some privacy, and besides, not everyone I've traveled with has understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没向你展览,是因为每个女孩子都想要有些隐私.另外不是每个我一起旅行过的人都会有共同品位的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkCollec_000534FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some personal questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你点私人问题么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不介意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkPerson_000534FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why were you alone when I found you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我找到你的时候是自己一个人?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hadn't been in the Mojave long. I'd arrived at the Mojave Outpost a few days before and had already split up with my last travel companion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在莫哈维废土独自一个人很久了.几天前我曾到过前哨站,并且和我上一个旅伴说再见了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053501_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried to find a new companion but couldn't, so I packed up and headed out. It was very unlucky that I got into trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着找一个新搭档,但没成功.所以我就打包自己上路了.结果很不幸我陷入麻烦中了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053501_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been on the road for almost two years now and that was about as bad as it's ever gotten for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都在这条路上走了两年了,这是曾发生过得最遭的情况了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053501_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I did lose my dog, Big George, on the trip. He was killed by geckos. That was my worst day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外我还失去了我的大狗乔乔, 该死的陷阱.他是被一群蜥蜴干掉的.那是我最难过的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053501_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What got you interested in traveling?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在旅行中发现什么有趣的东西么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up in Oregon. My family runs a motel that lots of caravans and sometimes travelers come through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在俄勒冈长大的,我的家庭经营着一个汽车旅店,那里有很多大篷车队和一些旅行者来来往往
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053505_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I spent my childhood listening to stories of life on the road. I can't remember a time when I didn't want to leave and live out those stories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以,我的童年时间就是在各种废土的传奇故事中度过的.我不记得生命中有哪怕一刻我不想离开那里去远行,或是曾听不到这些故事的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053505_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you from the Mojave? Will you be able to fill me in on details as we travel around or are you a newcomer like me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是莫哈维本地的么?也许你可以填补我的一些空白,还是说你和我一样也是才到这里不久?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053505_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you support yourself on the road?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在路上怎么维持给养呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned a lot about trading and bargaining from the caravans and traders that stayed with us while I was growing up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从那些伴我成长的车队那里学到不少交易和谈判的技术,并且也和他们做生意
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053507_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I scavenge things of value as I go and when I meet someone to trade with I bargain for the best prices I can get. I do pretty well that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给东西一个合适的价钱,当我遇到某个人的时候呢就可以用的谈判技术把它以最好的价钱卖出去,这方面我很强的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053507_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What haven't they understood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们还有什么不理解的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: That it's fun to find pretty or interesting things and keep them and a couple of the people I've traveled with have made fun of me for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到有趣的小玩意并留在身边是一件很开心的事儿,但有那么一些曾经的旅伴却因为这些玩意而拿我取乐
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053509_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't collect anything, but why would I make fun of you for doing it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我不囤什么..但我干嘛要拿你的这个爱好寻乐子?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't keep anything? You don't even keep things like the glasses your favorite grandmother wore?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都不囤?甚至连老奶奶带的眼镜吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005350B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe the outfit you wore during a significant event, or a cigarette lighter that somebody gave you? Nothing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者某些特别的纪念品呢?要么某人给你的雪茄点烟器呢?什么都没?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005350B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to collect things too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也喜欢囤东西

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so excited you collect stuff too. What's your favorite thing to collect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊我太激动了,你最喜欢些什么玩意?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005350D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I just pick up stuff to sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,只是捡一堆玩意然后卖掉...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005350F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a collection of junk that you haul around with you? What's the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对被垃圾山活埋上瘾吗?图什么呢你...?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妙极了..忘了我说的吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053512_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Armor and weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弹药和武器

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some good stuff at home. I don't pick those up on the road. They weigh too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在家有些好玩意.但我不会把他们带出来的,好沉..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005351B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Teddy Bears and Toys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰迪熊和小玩具

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so you collect toys like I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,这么说你和我一样都喜欢收集玩具咯?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005351D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Miscellaneous Items. You know, your basic junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杂七杂八的玩意,你懂得,就是你的那些最简单的破烂们

ESP.ORIGINAL: Junk? I love junk. I have a spork in my collection and I love coffee mugs. I have to keep myself from picking them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 破烂?我就喜欢破烂..我有一堆小叉子,还喜欢各种咖啡杯,所以我得不断的管住自己别再去四处划拉这些玩意..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005351F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things I think are special. If an item catches my eye and it interests me I'll keep it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢的东西都很特别.如果有什么东西吸引了我的眼球,那就非得留下不可了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those are my favorites too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些也是我最喜欢的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00053520_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that you've asked me to pick I favorite I can't. I think I like to collect everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要非说让我分出哪些是最喜欢,哪些是更什么的...饶了我吧...我很博爱的..

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's funny. It must be hard for you to not get overloaded most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣,多数时候你是不是都因为装不下而犯愁?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005351A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, now that we're friends, are you willing to change your clothes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,现在既然我们是朋友了,准备好换换你的衣服了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with what I'm wearing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我穿的有问题么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkClothe_000679EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a Nuka-Cola for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的益达。哦不，这是你的核子可乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaurant_000595D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I didn't get one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我这里没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, maybe next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，下次吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaurant_000595D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see your collection again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能再看看你囤的小玩意吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTrade4_000BC263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the legion sitting here in Nelson. It's too close to Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不希望军团驻扎在纳尔逊。离诺瓦克太近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNelson_000881EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the legion out of here, Novac should be safer, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是军团滚蛋了，诺瓦克就安全了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNelson_000881EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to save the troopers? I felt terrible when we couldn't help the people in Nipton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法能挽救这些士兵吗？不能帮助尼普顿的人我觉得很难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNelson_00080886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to save the troopers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法挽救这些士兵吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNelson_00080887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, I agree with you. I want to save them too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意你的想法，布恩。我也参加拯救大兵任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNelson_000AD98D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow and I are traveling together and we've tracked you down to see if you have her teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿一直和我在一起,我们费这么大劲追你的目的就是想知道她的泰迪小熊还在不在?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_0005A501_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was nice of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1SnufflesHeal_0005A661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that settles that. Mr. House is definitely not a computer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,那就解决了。豪斯先生绝对不是一台电脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1MrHouseSeen_0005A663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and not too fussy either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我不强求什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0005A666_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really very boring. You'd get better stories out of a Freeside junkie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很无聊。你最好从自由城杂货商那里找个更好的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\AWillowANP_ANPCaTOwChatter_0005A66D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure that's not true, but, maybe you'll feel more like talking if we meet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定那不是真的，但是，如果我们再见面，也许你会觉得更像是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1ResptoArcade_00061783_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, a good one! Something elegant and classy, you know? But still stylish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈，好极了！既优雅又漂亮，你知道吗？而且还很时尚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp4_0005A950_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp05_00061784_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does everyone always say that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么每个人都这么说?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANP_ANPCVeronicaGen_0005A956_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ya think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANP_ANPCVeronicaGen_0005A957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That bad, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真糟糕，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANP_ANPCVeronicaGen_0005A958_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you planning to sleep with her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算和她翻云覆雨？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RedLucyBRfir_0005AC39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I know you don't like her, but what if I wanted to? Would you have a problem with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我知道你不喜欢她，但是如果我想，你还有啥问题么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I mean no. I mean...we're just friends, but I definitely don't want to watch you having sex with her. I'm going home. I'll see you there, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我的意思是不要。我的意思是......我们只是朋友，但我绝对不希望看着你和她共度良宵。我要回家了。在那里见吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RedLucyBRfir_0005AC3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'd have a problem with that! What are you gonna do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我有问题！那你要去做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RedLucyBRfir_0005AC3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I know you don't like her, but I want to do this. Are you going to have a problem with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我知道你不喜欢她，但我想这样做。你有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um...no?
Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! I'm so glad to hear you say that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！我很高兴你能这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't be like that honey. What if we took her to bed together? I think you'd enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不要像那个可爱的家伙一样。如果我们把她弄到床上来？我想你会非常欢乐得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you'd enjoy it. You wouldn't ignore me and just pay attention to her would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好能好好爽一把。你不会光顾着享受把我给忽略了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lady Killer] I won't ignore you, I promise. But maybe you'd ignore me some, huh? What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: [师奶杀手]我不会不理你的，我保证。但是，也许你会不理我，是吧？你怎么说

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,你这个油嘴滑舌的家伙,我会这么做的.说不定对我们两个人来说会很有趣呢.我希望你知道我只会为你一个人这么做.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cherchez LF] I love you Willow, how could I possibly ignore you for another girl? Will you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [你是百合]我爱你维儿，我怎么会因为别的姑娘忽略了你？你会这吗

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,你这个油嘴滑舌的家伙,我会这么做的.说不定对我们两个人来说会很有趣呢.我希望你知道我只会为你一个人这么做.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait. I don't want to. Let's get out of here together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等下。我不想干这事。咱们一块离开这里吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我喜欢这主意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll see you at home later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。一会家里见吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我喜欢这主意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, it's not like we're married. I'm free to do what I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿，这不意味着我们结为夫妻了。我有做我想做的事的自由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You're right. We're not married. I understand now how things are. I thought you loved me, but I guess I was wrong. Have fun. I'm going home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧。你说得对。我们没有结婚。我现在明白了这是怎么一回事。我还以为你是爱我的，但我想我错了。享受你自己的生活吧。我要回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I didn't think about how you'd feel. Don't leave. I'll come with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉。我没有考虑你的感受。别离开我，我会伴你左右的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! I'm so glad to hear you say that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！我很高兴你能这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want my freedom. I'm going to sleep with her. If you don't like it you should go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要我的自由。我要去和她睡觉了。如果你觉得不爽，你就应该回家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'm going home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，我这就回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005AC51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sarah wants to have sex with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莎拉一直跟你调情,我吃醋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1SarahWeintra_001055C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the NCR might be upset about a dead ambassador.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得NCR应该为那个的大使闹心着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1CrockerDead_0007E5B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because it's true?
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这就是事实？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FFCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We made it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们做到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That dam holds a lot of water. More than I've ever seen in one place at one time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这大坝水真多。比我见过的任何地方都多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedHooverDam_000881E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedHooverDam_000B0D8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: singing in the shower
ESP.TRADUIT: 在洗澡时唱歌
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How are you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！你今天过的咋样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoHowsitGo_000AC54E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoHowsitGo_000AC54F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you say something about Star Bottle Caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到有什么有和星星瓶盖有关的了没?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Star Bottle Caps. Do you believe in the treasure? I do and I think it's out there waiting for someone to find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，星星瓶盖。你相信有宝藏？我相信有，因为我认为宝藏就在那里等着别人来发现它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_0005AC66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think it's out there waiting to be found. I think it's just a story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不认为有什么等着我们去发现。我认为这只是一个故事罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? But it could be something exciting that hasn't been seen since before The Great War. I can't even imagine what that might be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？也可能是一些战前的东西，我想象不到究竟会是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0005AC68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you even a little curious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道一点都不好奇？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0005AC68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if it exists or not, but we can look for it together if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道它的存在与否，但是如果你想的话咱们可以一起找找看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woo-hoo! We are huntin' for treasure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇呕！我们是宝藏猎人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0005AC6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] I don't have her. I really don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: [欺骗]我没有啊,我真没有!

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, since you don't have her, we'll keep looking for her then, right? And I want to keep looking for Chester too. I've had him since I was little.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,既然你没有,我们就继续找吧.好不?而且我想接着找切斯特.我还是个小孩子的时候他就是我的朋友了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0005ADAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, yes, I do have Moira. You can have her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,是的,我的确有莫伊拉,你可以把她拿走了

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得出发了!这就是我们的新家,我想是时候做一些改变了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，没问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW_0007C004_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发，这就是我们的新家。我觉得是时候做出一些改变了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great news! I love the bungalow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,我没什么意见,这地方看上去蛮好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW_0005D8D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It reminds me of home so much. I know I'll be very happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我想起了家里。呆在这儿我会很高兴的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW_0005D8D1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great news! I love the bungalow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个好消息！我爱这个小房子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW_000A663C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? I'll miss the bungalow. Is this a permanent move or will we go back to the bungalow someday?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啥？我会想念小房子的。我们要永远离开还是将来某天我们会回到这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW_0007C003_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发！这是我们的新房子。我觉得是时候做出一些改变了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错,咱们干吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll set it up right here. You might want to back up a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,我要把这个立在这里,你最好后退一点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterCampfir_0005D8D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you grab something you can eat while we're on the move. I don't want to stop right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么咱们前进的时候你就不敢随便先抓点什么吃呢?我现在不想停下来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I can do that. Maybe we can do the big thing later?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧..就依你...也许我们可以晚点再去办重要的事?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterCampfir_0005D8D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I don't have my favorite snack right now. I guess I can make do or wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我现在没有最喜欢的小点心啊...没关系我可以忍....也许不会死的嗯....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterCampfir_0007EF96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you set up a campfire right here? This is a good spot, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以升一堆营火吗?这地方不错,你觉得呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's a great spot. I'll set it up right now. You might want to back up a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错,的确很棒.我现在就弄起来.你最好后退一点
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterCampfir_0005D8DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I draw my weapon, draw yours, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维维,能帮我一个超...大的忙吗?当我举起武器的时候你能不能也照做嗯..?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦..如果那样你开心的话..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDWillowAlertWhe_0005D8DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,如果你想让我再做一次的话,告诉我就是了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDWillowAlertWhe_0005D8E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can stop taking your weapon out when I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以不用总和我一起拔枪了,我玩够了..

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gorgeous here! This may be the most beautiful place I've seen. In all my time on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里太棒了!恐怕这是我在废土上行走了这么久以来所见过的最美的地方了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRedRock_00042623_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys look tough...really tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙看起来很硬朗。。。真的很硬朗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRedRock_00070F8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just so you know, I plan to scavenge while we're here so don't give me away if you see me go for something. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像你知道的，我要开始搜刮这里的东西了。一定要制止我当你看到我去找什么东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRedRock_00073B24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRedRock_0009886F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCottonwoo_0007C305_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion and their slaves...this place gives me the creeps. They have slave pens here. Cages...for people! Ugh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团和他们的奴隶们......这个地方让我浑身起鸡皮疙瘩。这里有围栏。卧槽，笼子...居然跟关畜生一样关着人！卧槽卧槽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCottonwoo_00075DD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMcCarran_00098870_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You loved me so, but let me go. Now I'll never know how our love will grow.
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMcCarran_00098871_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you get homesick when you go into an NCR held location? I sure do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你踏上NCR管辖的区域你会想家吗？我确信我会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMcCarran_000AD998_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think we'll run into anyone you know while we're here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们会在这里遇见熟人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMcCarran_000AD996_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was so glad to see the NCR troopers when I first got here. I felt right at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我第一次走过这里看见那些士兵的时候,我真是觉得宾至如归呀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_00103038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was trying to figure out how they built those two giant statues. I can't even imagine how they did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着去弄明白那两个大雕像是怎么建造的，真不知道他们是怎么把这俩家伙给盖起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_001055B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The view up here? It's gorgeous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？华丽丽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_001055B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不禁想收拾收拾，看起来真是糟糕透顶。要是我看到啥好东西我就偷偷的把它顺出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_00073B21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_00098872_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting, watching the stars above. Hoping that I could win back your love.
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedMojaveOut_00098873_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think he likes me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他不喜欢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRespPraGuardMe_000AC554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got my back, right, if he tries anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是他偷袭的话你会掩护我，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRespPraGuardMe_000ACDF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmpf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRespPraGuardMe_000ACDF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope your hungry. I've made us something to eat and I've set the table.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你饿了，我做了些东西就放在桌上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTentTableSet_000A803E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is horrible. How can the NCR treat its troop like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方太可怕了。NCR怎么也这样对待他们的部队呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_00103041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmpf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_000881F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's so depressing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里真压抑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_00072F88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep my hands to myself while we're here. Even if there was anything good to pick up, I couldn't do it. They need everything they've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我会管好自己的手.就算是一个好东西孤零零的躺在那儿我也不会顺走他它,他们需要一切可以利用的东西.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_00076C5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we're helping out around here. This is one of the saddest places I've been. The NCR has really let these guys down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能在这里帮上忙.这是我来到的最悲伤的一个营地了.NCR真的让他们的兄弟们失望了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_0007C306_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe anyone would be so low that they'd steal medical supplies from the other troops here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不能相信,居然有人会没道德到这种地步,在这里来偷窃这些受伤士兵的药品.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCampForlo_0007C307_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would so love to add a Dinky souvenir to my collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很乐意给我的收藏里增加一个小纪念品..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAsksForDinky_0005E193_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would so love to add a Dinky souvenir to my collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很乐意给我的收藏里增加一个小纪念品..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAsksForDinky_000CBF17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible. I am stashing that somewhere safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这小东西真精致。我把那个藏在安全的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAsksForDinky_000CBF18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a Dinky the Dinosaur for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个小恐龙纪念品给你..

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news, Willow! I have one for you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个有趣的小恐龙纪念品送给你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible. I am stashing that somewhere safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦唔,谢谢!这东西很棒.我会把它好好收起来的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDDinkyForWillow_0005E195_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. I won't stop you looking for it, but I'm not going to help either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不会的。我不会阻止你找它，但我不打算帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, be that way. I'm going to keep looking for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是这样。我将继续寻找它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0005E8C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, okay, maybe a little. What if we look for it together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，也许吧。咱们干吗不一块找找？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼，开干吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'd love to have a Nuka Cola.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！我喜欢核口可乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaraunt_0005EEBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I could use a drink, but I don't want Nuka Cola, I want...whiskey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！我可以喝饮料，不过我不想喝核子可乐，我想要......威士忌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaraunt_0006416C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have my usual...whiskey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里倒是有。。。威士忌
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaraunt_000A175A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we don't have time right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们现在没时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, maybe next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，下次吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsrestaurant_0005EEBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you sleep here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚你睡在这里好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, where exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,哪儿呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAASleepHere_000232C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're here! I'm so excited. This is the first time I've been to a trader since I was at the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到了!我真的很兴奋.这是我第一次和商人交易,自从在莫哈维前哨站那时候开始.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQgsFG_0006182C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I keep magazines with me wherever I go. I have ones about trading or negotiating. You might find the ones about trading helpful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的,我一般随身都带着一些杂志,我有一本关于交易和谈判的,你可能会觉得关于交易的这本帮助非常大.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQgsFG_0006182C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't read them much. I mostly study the negotiating ones. Here, you can have one of the trading ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不经常读它们.我一般就用谈判的这本.给你,你可以拿走那本关于交易的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQgsFG_0006182C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should probably just sell the trading ones I have, since I don't read them, but I keep thinking I will and then I don't. Ya, know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大概会把这本交易书卖了,既然我不读它,但是老是告诉自己我会读它但是我又老是忘了读,这个,你懂吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQgsFG_0006182C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the last one! I've been trying to decide how to thank you for taking me to all the traders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最后一个了！我一直想着怎么感谢你陪我购物
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQcrimsoncarav_00061831_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would be great if you could have a hat like mine. You know, it brings me good luck with traders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得如果你能有一顶像我这样帽子就太好了。你知道，这能给我带来好运
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never have to bargain very hard to get great deals, it's really no work at all. It's my hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讨价还价什么的我最擅长了，虽然这个没什么用，只是我的帽子而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you mind cooking something for me? (you use campfire crafting menu in dialogue)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意帮我做点吃的么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not at all. As long as you have the ingredients I can make whatever's on the menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,没问题.只要你有原料,无论点什么我都能做出来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookForMe_00061B19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do it. You have what you need, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这么干吧.你的东西都备齐了,对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookForMe_000A0239_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you mind cooking something for me? (you use campfire crafting menu in dialogue)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意帮我做点吃的么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm ready. May I see the menu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对,我准备好了,我能看看菜单吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I just need a minute to get my stuff together. Hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,给我点时间让我把需要的东西准备好,稍等~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookForMeYES_00062975_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have everything I need, but I'll come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还缺点东西,等等我马上就回来啦~

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookForMeNO_00062974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to talk about Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想谈谈豪斯先生吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, what did you think? I don't like him. How do we even know he's human?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你是怎么想的？我不喜欢他。我们怎么知道他是人类？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQMrHouseFirst_00064FE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is going on with you and Red Lucy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和露西到底怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what you mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你什么意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRedLucyQS90_00064A13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This bed seems like a good choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张床看起来很不错

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. It looks good to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,看上去对我很合适
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAASleepHereAdH_00064BEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. It looks good to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,看上去对我很合适
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAASleepHereAdH_000DBCC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sending me off to bed alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是让我自己一个人睡么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAASleepHereAdH_00064BEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, in this bed. You can change into your nightwear, as well, if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿,睡这张床.你可以换上睡衣了.如果你想的话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to talk about Caesar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想谈谈凯撒么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I want to know what you think about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想知道你怎么看他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQCaesarFirstT_00064FE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not really interested in putting any time into the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我对这所小房子并不怎么感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestN_000B1453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bungalow? What about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小房子？怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it, don't get me wrong, but it could use some improvements, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱死了，别误会我的意思，但它可以进行一些改进，你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuest1_00064FEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could go collect some plants and transplant them into the planters. Maybe go find a mailbox and put it by the door?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以去收集一些植物，它们种到花盆里。也许去找一个邮箱，把它放在门口？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuest1_00064FEC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, and maybe we could keep our eyes open for something special to put outside. Are you interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，也许我们可以把我们的眼睛睁得大大的找一些特别的东西放在外面。你有兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuest1_00064FEC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legion wants to see you? That's serious business. We need to be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团想要见你？这可是件大事。我们必须小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQLegionTheStr_00064FE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ambassador, huh. Think maybe we should go talk to him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大使，呵呵。想也许我们应该去和他谈谈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFNCRMQTheStrip_00064FE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a Whiskey for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这瓶威士忌送你啦

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFtopsRestaurant_0006416E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky you! I've never found a robot in a closet who offered to help me take over the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可真幸运，我可从来没见过哪个机器人能把快死的人从地里挖出来想办法救活他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQx1YesMan_00064FEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That has got to be a wig!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那肯定是假发!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1JessicasWig_00065768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've cooked something on the campfire if you want to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在营火那里做了一些东东，如果你想分享一下的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookingCampfir_0008088C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. Do I really have to wear this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，我一定要穿这个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFactionLegionA_0006576C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListEt_00065A57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListEt_000DC288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListEt_000DE211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListEt_000DE212_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: blah
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: blah
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was fabulous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太美妙了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFTBcloser_0009648A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we going to celebrate? Do I get a present or something special from you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是不是该庆祝一下?我能给你一份礼物或者什么特别的东西么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you do. So the first present is I made you a sweetroll to celebrate. But I'd also like to do something for you from now on as your friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错,我的确有礼物给你.是一个甜蛋卷.是我特别为你做的,因为我们是最好的朋友,而且我想让你知道我有多么喜欢你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTCooking_0006770B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can cook you for, you know? Anything you want. You'll need to bring the ingredients, but I'll do the rest. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你烹饪任何你想要的。只需要带些食材，其余的由我来做。怎么用？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have some strong opinions about the Legion considering you just got here. Want to tell me why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对军团把你派到这里来有强烈的意见，你得给我合理的解释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want the short answer to that or the story-of-my-life answer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要它的答案，或者是我生活的故事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFBackgroundPoli_000684FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Definitely the story of your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对是你生活的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so, I grew up in the motel that my parents run, right? Well, my dad loves the guests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，所以，我在我的父母经营的汽车旅馆长大的，对不对？好吧，我老爸招待客人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_000684FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He sits around the fire at night with the caravaners and asks them for news from along their routes. He's always done it since I was a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚上他和云游商人一同坐在营火旁，我老爸向他们打听沿途的新鲜事。他总是这么做直到我渐渐长大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_000684FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mom and oldest brother, Val, they love it too and the three of them and the guests will sit up late into the night talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妈妈和哥哥，也像我父亲一样。总是和客人聊到深夜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_000684FC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And arguing. They love to argue about the NCR and what it does or doesn't do and whether the legion is evil or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们也会争论。他们喜欢争论NCR做什么或不做还有就是军团到底是好是坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_000684FC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll talk and argue about just about anything, but their favorite subject is politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会谈论任何事情，但是他们的最喜欢的是政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_000684FC_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever get involved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有参与？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was there, but I didn't say too much. I just wanted to be close to my dad. As I got older I helped my mom more and more and saw him less and less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾在那里，但我并没有说太多。我只是想靠近我的老爸。当我长大了，我帮我妈越来越多，和他越来越疏远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00068500_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I wanted to be with my dad I'd have to grab time with him at night when he was with the guests. I fell asleep more often than not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我想接近我的老爸只能靠晚上他招待客人的那点时间，很多时候他认为我睡着了，其实没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00068500_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, you know, I was awake often enough to learn that Caesar leads a group of brutal, killing slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，你知道，我是清醒的足以得知凯撒领着一群暴徒残杀奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00068500_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the short version.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要短篇的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dad. He and the caravaners would talk about news from along their routes and I heard what they said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的爸爸。他和云游商人会谈论者他们路途上的所见所闻，我能听见他们说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00068504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd talk about Caesar and the legion so I've heard enough about them to know I don't trust them and I know they're brutal, murdering slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们谈到凯撒军团的时候我早已经受够了，我不信任他们，我知道他们是残忍的，嗜血的暴徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00068504_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like almost every time we go in there you say something snide about her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎每次我们去那里你说些什么挖苦她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's interested in you, I know it! And I don't like her...at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她对你有兴趣，我知道！我不喜欢她,哼,一点都不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRedLucyQS90Res_000687EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really like what you're wearing and want you to wear something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我实在是不怎么欣赏你这套衣服,所以想让你穿点别的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah? Well, I like it. This jacket means a lot to me and I'm going to keep wearing it. For now anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哼?好吧..我倒挺喜欢的.这件夹克对我来说意义重大.所以我要继续穿着~至少目前如此
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006883F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, I just want to see you naked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么.我只是想看看你傲人的裸体

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Did you really just say that to me? Go find a picture of a naked girl to look at. I'm not taking my clothes off for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啥?你当真的吗?找本猫爪(也就是辐射位面的花花公子)什么的看看吧孩子..我可不会为了你就光着屁股到处晃
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00068841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, maybe someday. Not today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,改天再说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00068843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要介意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000695DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇呕
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQx1MrHouse_00069646_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course he's human! Mr. House isn't just a man. He's a great man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然他是人！豪斯先生不仅仅是一个人。他是个好人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, even if he is, he seems awfully full of himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，就算他是，他似乎非常自以为是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's interesting that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很有趣，这是肯定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be interesting to know if he's human or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他到底是不是人类？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't. And without seeing him we can't be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也不知道.眼见为实嘛.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Maybe we can do something about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯.也许我们该做点什么.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006994D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's rich and powerful and he's been running things for a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有钱有权，他控制维加斯很久了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? Because he has a lot of money he gets to tell people how to live? That doesn't seem fair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？因为他有很多钱，他会告诉人们如何活着？这似乎不公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's more than that. He's smart and he cares about New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比那些更多的。他很睿智，他关心新维加斯的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seems kind of like a bully to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎是欺负我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006992B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow! I respect Mr. House!
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿！我尊重豪斯先生！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006992E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not a bully. He's more like a father who wants to protect and care for New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是欺负。他更像一个父亲愿意照顾和保护新维加斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! When you explain it like that he doesn't seem so bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！当你给我解释这些的时候我觉得他似乎并不是坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069932_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, but he's not a bully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没关系，他可不是恶霸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if he's not a bully, what's he doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果他不是一个恶霸，那么他做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069930_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's trying to keep New Vegas safe and functional. He has its best interests at heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想让维加斯安定繁荣。伟大的蓝图都在他心中酝酿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll take your word for it. But he's not my favorite guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我相信你的话。不过我不太喜欢他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069947_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be respectful. He's earned it. He planned ahead and protected New Vegas and is still protecting it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要学会尊重。他预料到了战争，而且从战争中保护了维加斯的大部分，一直到现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sorry. He's smart. But he's only one guy trying to tell everyone else what to do. So, why isn't he a bully?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧抱歉，他的确很睿智。但是他自己一个人对着别人发号施令，难道他不是个恶霸？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00069937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he has the best interests of New Vegas at heart. This is his home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他心中有维加斯的未来，这是他的家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's human, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他是个人类，维儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. I do like his casino. Maybe we can avoid HIM in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。我喜欢它的赌场。也许我们以后可以躲在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006994B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't plan to have much to do with him so we don't need to worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算为他工作，所以我们并不需要担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. That settles that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，那就解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006994C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing. I'm not going to do anything. You should trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。我不会做任何事情的。你应该相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry honey, I'll try. It's hard not to be jealous you're just so wonderful I think everyone wants you as much as I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起亲爱的，我会尽力。这很难不吃醋，我很怕失去你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowDia_0005AC55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I liked him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? Huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的？嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like what he has to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我挺欣赏他的风格

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, he's a killer, no better than a raider...worse. He and the legion wipe out entire tribes. They torture and maim. They're slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，他是个杀人犯，比大路上的强盗好不到哪去......更糟糕的是。他和军团消灭87个部落。他们折磨和残害奴隶，野蛮的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006A4DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he's a killer. And look at how he treats women! Do you honestly think you're different from the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就是个凶手。而且看他如何对待女人！你真的认为你和别人不一样高人一等吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he has reasons for why he does the things he does. I admire him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他有理由能够为他所做的事情负责，我很佩服他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow. So you are seriously considering getting involved in this war. Against the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦。所以你再考虑加入战争。推翻NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006A4E1_1.ogg
