ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm seriously considering it and I want you to stay with me even if I decide to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我正在认真考虑，我希望你能留在我身边，即使我决定这样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Why would I want to do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我为什么要这么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0006A4E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LadyKiller]Because, we're destined to be together. You've known it since you first saw me, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: [师奶杀手]因为，我们注定要在一起。维儿你懂得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right...I can't leave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧你赢了，我确实离不开你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，我不是来打仗的我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [BFF]Would you really walk out on your best friend? I mean more to you than the NCR, don't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: [挚友]你真的要离开你的好朋友？我的意思是你比NCR重要得多，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, of course you do! You're right. I'll stay with you no matter what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你说得对。不管咋样我都会和你呆在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来新维加斯是为了看看玩玩不是来打仗的，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Romanced]Do you really want to fight over politics? We mean more to each other than that, don't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: [浪漫]你真的想参与政治？我们俩彼此更重要？不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! You're right! I love you! I'd die for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！你是对的，我爱你！我可以为你去死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争的，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'm carrying this legion stuff to be helpful, right? You're not gonna make me wear it, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我背着的这个军团的东西是有别的用，对不对？你不会让我穿上它，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFactionLegionA_00102A68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Yawn> I'm going to bed. Goodnight.
ESP.TRADUIT: <瞌睡> 我要上床了，晚安啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. I hate him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，我讨厌他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRespPraGuardCr_000ACDF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMSoB_000AC547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, big fella, how ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，大家伙，你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMSoB_000AD6A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, how ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMSoB_000ADF62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't cook anything. We don't have what I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是什么都能烹饪的啦.我们手头没有材料啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHouseCookingAl_0008088B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sloan? Ah! This is where the Deathclaws are! We should leave. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯罗恩?啊!死亡爪就盘踞在附近啊!我们应该马上撤,就现在!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Sloan_0005C4B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you noticed that no one's talking about you killing all those fiends? Isn't that weird? Should we tell someone about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否注意到没有人在谈论，你杀死的那么多恶魔帮？好奇怪啊难不成他们还没发现?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000B0AB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't understand a thing Mean Sonofabitch says.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直不明白婊子养的是什么意思
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000881E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sure are worried about the Fiends around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们肯定会是非常担心附近的恶魔帮
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000B0AB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're farmers! Maybe we could get some fresh vegetables from them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是农民!也许我们能搞到些新鲜的蔬菜呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000B0AB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we go shopping sometime soon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最近能去转转超市吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000B0AB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're going shopping, I'm gonna need some caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要去购物的话,我可需要点瓶盖.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_000B0AB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blue moon you saw me standing alone, without a dream in my heart, without a love of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_00098868_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_00098869_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedWestside_0009886A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is a dump.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方是个垃圾堆
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000B0AB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ick, rats!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,大耗子!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000B0DA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're so close, can we go to The Strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 都走到这么近的地方了,咱们能去赌城区转转么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000B0DA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it just me, or does it seem like we're always getting into situations like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是我，或者看起来我们总是陷入这样的情况？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_001055B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we could go to the Wrangler sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以去原子牛仔逛一圈
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_00064FF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like The King. Maybe he should run things in The Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢猫王.也许他应该不止呆在自由之城而是去莫哈维转转.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_00103034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like I'm not the only one who's happy you took care of Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来我并是不唯一一个庆祝凯撒死了的人.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_0007780D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet Rex would like to go see The King while we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌雷克斯想去见猫王。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_00075DD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000A2F86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000A2F87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You loved me so, but let me go. Now I'll never know how our love will grow.
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000A2F88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedFreeside_000A4F3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was just what I needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDEatinOut_000B07BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, that was good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这很好。可以走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDEatinOut_000B0A9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you're hungry, the food's all done. I put it in the oven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你饿了，饭菜都做好了。我把它们放在烤箱里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHouseCookingAl_00080B6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoFortMelo_000AC54B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, how are you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奈特少校,你今天过得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoFortMelo_000ADF5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is pretty special. It deserves a special name. I'm gonna call it Boomtown from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方很特别。它需要一个新名字。从现在开始我要称之为“砰砰镇”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_00070F89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much are we going to have to do for them? To get them to trust us I mean. Pfft. Probably a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要为他们做多少他们才能相信我们？我的意思是，可能还需要很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_0006AD9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a walk walkin' and I'm walkin' some more, I'm walk walkin' and I'm walkin' some more cuz this place is enormous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走啊走，走啊走，走啊走。。。因为这个地方太大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_0005A374_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mural they have about their history, it's pretty, but I think I'll pass on the story next time. It's hot in those little huts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把自己的历史画成画，真漂亮，不过下次我会从下面边走边看，因为他们的小木屋实在是太热了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_0007382E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exploding ants! We can't miss that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸的蚂蚁！我们可不能打歪了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_00070F8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不禁想收拾收拾，看起来真是糟糕透顶。要是我看到啥好东西我就偷偷的把它顺出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_00073B23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raising an airplane off the bottom of a lake seems like a big job! Why are we the ones that always end up doing this stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把飞机从湖底下弄上来似乎是一项艰巨的任务！为啥到最后这种事老是要我们干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNellis_00077DFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, guys. I've only ever heard about what the legion does to towns. This is horrifying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你瞧。伙计们。我只听说过军团会对城镇什么。这可真是可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNipton_0006AD9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've only ever heard about what the legion does to towns. This is horrifying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只听说过军团对城镇过什么。这可真是可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNipton_0005A371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should go tell Ghost at the Mojave Outpost about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要和莫哈维前哨的游骑兵苟思特谈谈这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNipton_00070F8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNipton_0007E5B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I don't think I'll ever forget this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，我觉得我不会忘了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNipton_0008EF6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know! I've seen them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道！我见过他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoNoBark_000AC54C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I'll be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢啦，我会小心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoNoBark_000AD698_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, NoBark, how ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，别叫，你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoNoBark_000AD699_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: blah
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a lot of food with you. Do you cook for yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带的粮食还真不少.是自己做饭吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I really enjoy doing it too. I can set up a campfire anytime. Just ask. I'll want to cook regularly to keep up my supply of food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错!而且我也真的很享受.我可以随时生一堆营火,只要你说一声.我想会做些传统的东西好储备些干粮
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B918_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you cook?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会做饭么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B918_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a difficult question to answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这问题可不好回答啊,维儿.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why's that? It's seems easy enough to me. Either you're from here and you know the Mojave or you're not and you don't, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为啥?对我来说看上去很简单.要么你来自莫哈维而且很了解这里,要么就不是.不对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B91C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said, it's difficult to explain, Willow. I took a shot to the head doing my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被人在脑袋上轰了一个洞,在那之前我有份工作并且很了解这里,之后吗..说不好

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's terrible. Who shot you? Was it an accident?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太可怕了。谁开枪打你？这是意外吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B91E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it wasn't an accident. He shot me, buried me and left me for dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,不是.他朝我开了一枪后就把我给活埋了

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, why? That's so cruel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，为什么呢？这就是这么残酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B920_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a courier and he wanted what I was carrying. It was robbery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾是个邮差,而他想要我寄送的货物.我也被打劫了

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how did you survive a shot to the head that damaged you so badly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,你到底是怎么活下来的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B924_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happened in Goodsprings and the doc there patched me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇的医生救了我,但他没法修复我的记忆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know who shot you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是谁干的么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B92B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's too bad about your dog. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的狗真可怜,抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I miss him a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,我真的好想他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to tell me what happened to your dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿意告诉我你的狗发生什么事儿了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got ahead of me on the trail and got the scent of the Geckos. I'm not sure exactly what happened because he was ahead of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在我前面探路,结果就掉进了蜥蜴的陷阱.我实在不知道具体怎么发生的,因为他在我前头探路呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B92A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I heard a yelp and I came around a bend in the trail and he'd fallen off the edge of a little precipice. The Geckos were below with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我听到了哀叫,所以我顺着他的痕迹追了过去.他从一个小悬崖上跌了下去,周围全是些大蜥蜴
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B92A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the time I got down to them and shot all the geckos he was dead. He'd broken one of his legs in the fall and he couldn't defend himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我来得及跑下去赶到他身边射死那群混蛋的时候他已经死了.摔下来的时候一条腿断掉了,所以他根本没办法保护自己
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B92A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I buried him as best I could and slept there that night with him and then, the next morning, I said goodbye and left him forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天我尽可能的给他举行了一个火葬,并在那里睡了一晚.第二天早上我向他告别,并且永远离开了那里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B92A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and I'm going to pay him back for what he did to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,而且我要血债血还

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help all I can. What an asshole. Him, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽我所能帮助你的.真是个混蛋啊...呃,不是说你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B933_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,他死定了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B934_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but I don't want to talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,而且我把所有要做的事儿都做到了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B936_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm still trying to figure that out. You'll be with me while I do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我还在找.而且你得帮我一起来

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help you any way I can. What an asshole thing to do to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽我可能帮你的.这简直不是人干的事儿啊
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B935_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about this guy at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有听说过这么个家伙么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B935_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也没

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case can I have your scavenged food? I'll give you a list of ingredients for my favorite recipes and you'll know what I need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样的话,我能拿走你全部的小零食吗?我会给你列一张我的最爱的单子的.....哦?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B938_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I guess that means I assume you scavenge. You do, don't you? Doesn't everyone? And then, if we set up a campfire I'll be able to cook my food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...我猜这意味着我也得把你当作一只什么都吃的小猪了,是不是,嗯?那么好吧,等什么时候我们扎营点火了,我就能烧点东西出来了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B938_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I could do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我能办到

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Here's the list of ingredients. I'll be happy to share the food I cook with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了,给你单子,我很乐意跟你分享我做的好吃的~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B93B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want to do that. Why can't you scavenge your own ingredients?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不想这么做.你干嘛不能收集你自己的材料去?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I can do that, I suppose. I don't know how much I'll be able to find following you around. There is an advantage to you sharing though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,自己办就自己办..不知道在你附近跟着能找到多少..这简直就是大冒险啊
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B93C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll share what I cook with you, if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你分享所有我做的吃的,如果你愿意的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B93C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll do it. If I find ingredients you want I'll give them to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧,我答应你.如果我找到什么你要的东西了我会给你的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Here's the list of ingredients. I'll be happy to share the food I cook with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了,给你单子,我很乐意跟你分享我做的好吃的~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B93E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I am not interested in doing that Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这种事儿没兴趣.维儿.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B941_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do while you're following me and don't have much freedom to scavenge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 假如你一直跟着我而没什么自由时间去到处乱跑的话,你会怎么办?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done different things in the past with different companions. With people who like to stay close together I expect to find less stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟不同的伙伴我会有不同的情况.对于总喜欢让我粘的很近的人类家伙来说就别指望我能有多少收获了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm with you I'll keep my eyes on the ground and look for caps, small things we can sell or cooking ingredients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我跟你一块的时候我会留意路上的任何瓶盖,能出售的小玩意和烹饪材料
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B943_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'm lucky I might find a small, special item here or there to add to my collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我够幸运的话也许能在某地找到些可以被添加到收藏里的小东西
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B943_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCh_0006B947_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCh_000DC287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCh_000DE213_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCh_000DE214_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCC_0006B946_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCC_000DC286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! I need to buy a few things. Here's my list. If you could give me three or four things off of it that would be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨!我需要采购一些东西.给你单子.如果你能给我其中的三到四样就太妙了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCC_000DE215_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi! How ya doin' today? Here's my list. What have you got for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 您好！今天生意咋样？这里是我的清单。这些东西你们有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingListCC_000DE216_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you about something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你点别的事儿么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006B94B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you say something about trading?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么话想告诉我的吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to do some trading. Do you think we could do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想交易点东西,你觉得咱们可以么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingPlease_0006BC2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, where do you want to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题,如果顺道的话.你想见谁呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was at the Mojave Outpost I talked to Major Knight about where I should go. He game me three names.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我还在莫哈韦前哨站时，我和奈特少校谈过哪里值得一去。他给我三个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006BC33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want to take you shopping. That sounds very boring to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门,我可不打算带你购物去.无聊杀死猫啊

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it means I'm cooking more food to share with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使那意味着我可以做更多的更好的好吃哒和你分?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006BC37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, even then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼,是的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, it's your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,随你怎么想..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006DBDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, when you put it like that I should say yes. Who do you want to go and see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,呃,谁说不愿意陪你去购物了!谁说的?再给我看看那个单子来..

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! It has been too long since I've been to a trader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!我都好.....久好久没有去逛过商店了!这样..我估计某些人得做好在关键时刻挽救我苗条的小钱包的准备了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006BC41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Willow, that's very sweet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,维儿,这真太贴心了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good. It'll be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,很好~那会很不错的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006DEBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I like you too, Willow. I'm glad we're friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,维儿,我也很喜欢你.真高兴我们能是好朋友

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, one day, we'll be more than friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许,有一天,我们会不仅仅是朋友..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006DEBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Great. I might take you up on that sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩..好啊..到那时候我也许会答应的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. I hope you decide to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,好的,希望你下定决心了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006DEBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, the...the crosses. Should we help those people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天，那些十字架。我们应该帮帮他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Nipton_00070F7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you wanted to go shopping. What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为你想去购物来着,怎么了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I borrow 20 caps? I can't go shopping. I'm broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 借我20个瓶盖好么...我兜里光光啦 - -
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDImBroke_0006E75B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some gecko meat for you. I know you like to cook with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些蜥蜴肉给你，我知道你喜欢拿他们做饭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! How many do you have for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！你给我带来了多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_00098177_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! How many do you have for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！你给我带来了多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_00098179_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some gecko meat for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些蜥蜴肉给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! And I love having all the meat, but the best part is it feels like you've been avenging Big George's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！这些肉我都要了，这让我觉得就像是在报复那些杀死大狗乔乔的蜥蜴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_0009817F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found a couple of things that I'd like you to have as a thank you for what you've done. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收集了一些小玩意,希望你喜欢。在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_0009817F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I've finally brought you enough gecko meat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我给你带来足够多的蜥蜴肉了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! How many do you have for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！你给我带来了多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_0009AC78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some gecko meat for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些蜥蜴肉给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. I'm glad to hear you can build us a campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,你能给咱们弄个营火可真不错

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll be fun. We can cook together over my campfire. If I have the ingredients I cook something whenever I set it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会很有趣的.咱们可以在我的营火上一起做饭.如果我有原料的话随时可以做掉的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to see what I use the most? Those are the ingredients I use for my favorite recipes. Maybe we could trade stuff we don't use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想看看我最喜欢用的东西么?那些是用来给我最喜欢的食谱准备的.也许我们可以互相交换一些用不着的玩意?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you be willing to do that? I'm happy to give you things that I don't use. Would you do the same for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意那么做吗?我倒是很愿意把用不上的东西给你,你也愿意这么做么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes. It's not something I go out of my way to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候吧.但这不是我的常态

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's too bad. I like it so much I cook something whenever I have the ingredients and can set up my campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,那可太糟了.只要能把火生起来,材料也足够,我就会做一堆好吃的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you don't like it too much, what if I gave you my list of ingredients?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你不怎么喜欢这样,那么我把我的原料表给你怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, when you're scavenging, if you find some of them, you could give them to me, instead of doing something else with them. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧,你到处翻腾的时候如果碰巧遇到了其中一些,能不能给我呢?那可以做很多别的东西出来.你说呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0006EFFB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be interested in buying J.T. from you for 250 caps if you'd be willing to discuss it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意谈谈看的话,我想花250个瓶盖从你这里买走J.T

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_0006F2DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would he follow me and obey my commands?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会跟着我并且听从我的指挥吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00070FA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me take him, huh? He knows Willow and she likes him. He'll be happy with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我可就带走了?他认识维儿,而且她也很喜欢他.他跟我们在一起会很开心的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0006F2E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0006F2E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the money with me. I'll have to come back to pay you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上带的钱不够,等下我马上就回来

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know about Jefferson and the bounty you've lost. You can use the money. Let me have him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道杰弗森的事儿,还有你丢掉的赏金.拿着这些钱,只要你把他交给我

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0007041E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0007041F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the money with me. I'll have to come back to pay you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上带的钱不够,等下我马上就回来

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have Jessica now, you don't need J.T. any more, right? Let me take him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在有杰茜卡了,所以你不再需要J.T了,对吧?让我带走他把

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00070420_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00070422_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to return to pay you. I don't have the caps with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会回来付钱给你的,现在没带钱..

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the money with me to pay for J.T.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带钱来买JT了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_0007041D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, I have a present for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿，我有一个礼物要送给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? A present? I love presents!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的?一个礼物?我喜欢礼物!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_00070701_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A present? What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个礼物?会是什么呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_0008CF56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no, I didn't. I'd like it if we could be more than friends one day. (Romance Quest)
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦不..不是.当有一天我们比朋友更亲密的时候我愿意那么做(浪漫任务)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to take that step yet, let's just see how things go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好迈开那一步,咱们还是顺其自然吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00070705_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm flattered, Willow, but I'd like to stay friends with you. (Be friends with Willow. No Romance.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,偶尔这样没关系,但我不想让你把这事儿变成一种习惯了,好么?(跟维儿成为朋友不是浪漫关系)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll be sure to save all my affection for special occasions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的.我会把我的心意留到每一个特别的时刻的..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00070706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: smooch. That's a big hug and a kiss thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天呐..亲的好大一口..谢谢你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowLik_WLPWillowtoPChu_00070708_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! I have a question. Are you planning to kill those officers for that Legion guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下！我有一个问题。你打算为了那个军团的家伙杀死那些军官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFx1vDeadSea_0009E362_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. I don't want to do this afterall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了他吧,我根本不想这么干

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚点见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_00070FA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I don't have either of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,俩我都没

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't have them? Are you sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们没有?你确定?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00070FAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I need that! I use it all the time. There are some loose pages you can read if you want, but hands off the book, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,我需要那个!我一直在用来着.这有些散落的书页你可以读读看,但别碰这本书好么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeThatJourn_00070FAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me that back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 还给我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeThatJourn_00070FB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are such a tease!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太爱捉弄人了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeThatJourn_00090011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I took your Cooking Supplies. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我拿走了你的食材

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I need that! It's going to be difficult for me to do any cooking without it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿!我需要那个!不然我都没法正常做饭了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeThatCooki_00070FAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you teasing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在挑逗我么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeThatCooki_00070FB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I have your Cooking Supplies again. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我又拿了你的烹饪用品。抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted some coffee? I have one to share. Do you want it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要点咖啡?我倒是有一些可以分给你,想要么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's coffee! Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇,是咖啡耶!谢谢你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCoffee_00070FB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coffee? Oh, thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咖啡吗？哦，谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCoffee_00075492_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk to you about your singing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你的歌,我想谈谈恩...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you hate it don't you? I know, I'm a terrible singer. I do it to pass the time. It keeps me occupied. It's fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,你快抓狂了对吧?我知道的,我杯具的歌喉唉...我经常爱这么消磨时间,这让我有一种充实感,而且,蛮好玩的~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSinging_00070FB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, do you have a request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你有什么要求吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSinging_00064D00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk to you about your singing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你谈谈关于唱歌的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为啥？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSinging_0007A05E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk to you about your singing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你谈谈关于唱歌的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, they're colored pencils. I thought you might like them to use in your journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喏，他们是彩色铅笔。我想你可能会喜欢用他们写日记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're amazing! Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们简直不可思议，太谢谢你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, it's a Magic 8-Ball. I think it will answer questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，这是魔法8号球。我想他能回答你的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，它很特别。我非常喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been unusually quiet. Everything okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直出奇的安静。一切都还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I don't know, I just haven't felt much like singing lately, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我不知道，我只是不想唱歌，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSingingToggleL_0007A05F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that sounds like fun. I'm happy to share with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,那听上去是挺有趣的,真高兴能和你分享

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000726B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not too interested in sharing. Why don't you plan to take care of your own needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我没兴趣分享,你干嘛不先管好自己的事儿呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000726AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you happy to have J.T. along with us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意让J.T一直陪着我们么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am! I missed him after The Big Guy and I split up. Thank you so much for buying him for us. I don't miss Big George as much when he's around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,当大个子和我分开之后我的确很想J.T,但这和拥有自己的狗狗根本不一回事,他现在终归是属于你的啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDJThired_00072990_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have ten pieces for you! Do I get something special for that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你十块！那我能得到一些特别的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *laughs* I don't have anything special right now, but keep the meat coming and maybe I'll find something good, you never know!
ESP.TRADUIT: *笑*我没什么特殊的现在，你得保持食物原料的来源，也许我会找到一些好的东西，你永远不知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_00072994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks! Hey, let's have gecko for dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢啦！咱们弄点蜥蜴当晚饭吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_0007A060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's ten pieces for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你十块！

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name's &PCName;
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名字是 &PCName;

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, again, for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDPCNameFGR_00072C56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no intention of working with him if that's what you're worried about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意与他一起工作的，如果这就是你担心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to hear it, but I didn't think you would. So, what did you think of him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能听到这个,虽然我知道你不会为他做事的.那么你对他有什么看法呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We work well together. I don't want to lose you over a political difference of opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应当好好地交流。我不想因为政治上意见不合失去你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is more than politics! The legion treats women like dirt and they're slavers! They take whatever they want without consideration for anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是什么政治!军团对待女人就像畜生一样而且他们奴役人们!他们可以随意拿走你的任何东西,甚至你的性命!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd never feel safe is we were spending time around them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们在一起的时候我从来都不觉得安全.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F5D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, because he's impressed with what I've done. I don't think he's lying about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他对我所做的事印象很深刻。我觉得他不需要为此撒谎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right. He's a lying killer! Did you see any women in charge? All I saw were female slaves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?他只是个撒谎的冷血杀人犯而已!你在营地里看到过任何正常的女人吗?我只看到了一营地的性奴而已!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you want me with you while you follow him? Why would I do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想让我一起帮助你和凯撒?我为什么要这么做呢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I am. Deal with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，想办法解决掉它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you telling me I have to accept Caesar and his legion if I'm going to stay with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉我:我必须跟着你一起协助凯撒和他的军团?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [CherchezLaFemme] Because we're destined to be together. You've known it since you first saw me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [你是百合]因为我们注定要在一起，你懂得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right...I, I can't leave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的...我,我没法离开你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来到新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. You can follow me and shut up about it or leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,你可以跟着我但是你的闭上嘴或者你可以直接走人.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you're talking to me like this, but if you're interested in following Caesar I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢相信你对我这么说话,不过鉴于你和凯撒有这么多的共同语言我觉得我也不用感到意外.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I have no intention of shutting up about this. We can talk about it or I'm going to leave. Choose now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着,我一点都不想闭嘴,我们可以讨论一下这个或者我直接走人，随你便吧.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave then. (Willow leaves your game forever; good riddance)
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你离开吧.(维儿会永久性的离开莫哈维)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Fuck you. I am leaving and we are never, ever, ever getting back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的.我马上就走，另外你这辈子再也别想见到我了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你离开吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: <kiss> I'm glad you found me that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: <亲亲> 真高兴那天你遇到我了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTCooking_00072C75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, calm down. Let's talk about this. (negotiations commence; Willow will stay with you)
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,冷静点,我们来聊聊这事吧.(开始谈判:维儿还会跟着你)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but why do I want to get involved in this war, and why on the side of the legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,但是我为什么会参与这场战争,而且还是站在军团这一边.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072C7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to work with him, but he was much more reasonable than I expected him to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会和他一起工作，但他比我想象的更明白道理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right? I expected him to be a slobbering, yelling maniac, but he wasn't so bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，对吗？我以为他是个流口水，大喊大叫的疯子，但他还算不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, he didn't win me over. He just wasn't as bad, or scary, as I expected him to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会我，他并没有赢得我的信任。他并不像我期望的那样糟糕或残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F59_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's smart and articulate. It was interesting to talk to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很聪明而且善于表达。跟他说话很有趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting. I didn't expect that. Smart, yeah, but I expected you to tell me he's a raving monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思。我没有想到他说的有那么一点道理，但我还是希望你能告诉我，他是一个疯狂的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a bossy motherfucker, that's for sure. I'd like to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个专横的混蛋，这是肯定的。我想杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a great idea! You'd be a hero!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意啊！你会成为英雄！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Strength] I'll protect you. You have nothing to be afraid of while I'm with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [力量]我会保护你的。我和在一起，有什么可害怕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll trust you to keep me safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你的确让我有安全感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来到新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Intelligence] And the NCR doesn't "take whatever it wants without consideration for anyone?"
ESP.TRADUIT: [智力]难道NCR没有做掉“任何它想不想考虑人吗？”

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can you say that? They aren't like the legion. They don't turn people into slaves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能这样说？他们不像军团。他们不把人当成奴隶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe not. But they came into the Mojave and took what they wanted. They weren't invited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许不是。但他们来到莫哈韦吞并他们想要的东西。没人邀请他们来豪取强夺。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand. How is coming into the Mojave the same as making someone a slave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。怎能把奴役他人和进入莫哈维相提并论？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR have forced themselves onto the Mojave. The Mojave didn't choose. Just like a slave doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在莫哈韦沙漠安定下来。莫哈韦没有选择。就像一个奴隶也没有选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never heard anyone compare the NCR to slavers before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没听说过有人拿NCR和奴隶作比较。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So will you stay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你会留下来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's see how it goes. I like you a lot, and I'd rather be with you than argue about politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，让我们来看看会发生什么。我还是很喜欢你的，我宁愿跟你争论政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我来到心维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争所以我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I will. I love you, and I'd rather be with you than argue about politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会的。我爱你，我宁愿与你争论政治
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007A61F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我来到新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007A61F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, stay with me because you like me. That's more important than politics any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿，和我呆在一起因为你喜欢我。这比政治重要得多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I do care more about friendship than politics and I don't want to fight about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的，比起政治我更关心友谊，我不想闹得不愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_00072F6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我来到新维加斯是为了看看玩玩，不是来参加战争，我不想和军团有半点关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to hear more about where you grew up, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿，我想知道更多关于你在哪里长大的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trees around Jacobstown remind me of home. You already know about the caravans, but hunting's a big thing in Klamath too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雅各布镇的森林让我想起了我的家。你知道关于商队的事情，但是在克拉马斯打猎也是件大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFBackgroundHome_00072F8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mind. It was fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不介意,没事儿的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00073DA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, yes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说是的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes! Absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的！绝对正确！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutineAtHo_000B7050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes! Absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的！绝对正确！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutineAtHo_0007321F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not right now, honey, I'm not really in the mood. Soon, though, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，现在不行，亲爱的，我真的没有心情。很快，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutineAtHo_00073220_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你想要的，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, yes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说是的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes! Absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的！绝对正确！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutine_00080F25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes! Absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的！绝对正确！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutineNotH_0009D4E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not right now, honey, I'm not really in the mood. Soon, though, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，现在不行，亲爱的，我真的没有心情。很快，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutineNotH_0009D4E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你想要的，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is just temporary, Willow. We'll go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是暂时的，维儿。我们会回去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW0_0007C012_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you have fun going through my stuff? I hope so, but I need these things back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 翻我的东西很有趣吧?我希望是,但我想你最好把他们都交出来..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeMyStuff_00075499_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you teasing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在戏弄我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeMyStuff_0005FD1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to follow me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能跟着我

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTRehireAfterF_000768C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to consider this your home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你考虑一下这是你的家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTHouseMarker_000768C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTHouseMarker_00077CF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're moving, J.T. This is our new home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发J.T。这是我们的新家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's for me, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了,维儿?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have another present for you. I found it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有另一份礼物给你,我找到的哦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPresent140_000779F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd love to hear how much you liked it, or didn't, so come back and tell me, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想知道你有多喜欢他,还是正好相反?记得回来告诉我,好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPresent140_000779F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to know how I liked my present?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我有多喜欢我的礼物?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,快告诉我
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPresent140resp_000779FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I loved it! Thank you. Those exploding Teddy Bears were great. Do you know how I can get more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太喜欢了!谢谢你,这些毛乎乎的小熊太棒了.你知道哪儿能搞到更多吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd like those, aren't they fun? I didn't tell you the scariest part. I made them! I thought you might not use them if I told you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你喜欢他们,难道他们不可爱么?我还没告诉你最劲爆的部分呢,这些都是我亲自做的!我以为如果我告诉你的话你就不会用他们了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can give you this so you can make them and I'll keep looking for the parts you'll need. Oh, and I wanted to ask you something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把这个给你,这样你就可以制造并且寻找必要的部件了.哦,另外我还想问你点事儿
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to finally see my collection? I keep talking about it but I still haven't shown it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你愿意看看我的收藏品吗?我一直在说,但从来没给你看过
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A02_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't like it at all. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不感兴趣,抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I got it that wrong. Hmm. Well, I have something else you might like. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,是我错了,恩好吧,我还有些别的你可能会感兴趣的东西,瞧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么现在你愿意看看我的收藏品么?我一直都在说却从来没让你见过
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You definitely chose the right kind of thing. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你绝对选了最合适的东西,谢谢你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm so glad you liked it. I have something else I found that I think you might like too. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,真高兴你喜欢他.这儿还有些别的你也许会喜欢的东西,看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么现在你愿意看看我的收藏品么?我一直都在说却从来没让你见过
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything better to give me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么更好的东西可以给我吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't have anything better to give you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,没了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Willow? Is this about us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for us to be more than just friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以比朋友更进一步了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now? Now's a terrible time! But, I want to! We'll have to do it later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在?现在是个多扯淡的时间啊!但,我愿意!我们晚点再作那个..

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I've been waiting for you to come to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了!我一直在等你主动来找我!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm here now. I have a surprise for you and would love some privacy. Should we do it here or go some place else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼,我在这儿了.我要给你一个惊喜,但我需要一些隐私.我们是在这里呢还是另外找个地方?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在这儿吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so excited. I've been planning this for awhile. I hope you like it. Stay right there and don't move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真是太兴奋了,你不知道我已经计划了很久了.我希望你能喜欢他.呆在那里,别动
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to do something for you and then to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要为你,做一些东西,然后给你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想去别的地方

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way, Lover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路,亲爱的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00077A0D_1.ogg
Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbChatter_00077A15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's do it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了,就在这里吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so excited. I've been planning this for awhile. I hope you like it. Stay right there and don't move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真是太兴奋了,你不知道我已经计划了很久了.我希望你能喜欢他.呆在那里,别动
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbReturn_00077A17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to do something for you and then to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要为你,做一些东西,然后给你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbReturn_00077A17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we're best friends do we have some things to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们是挚友了,有什么要说的么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, absolutely!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkBestFr_0007B64C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to go home for awhile...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你回家一段时间。。。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候分开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTFireJT_00077CFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to go home and wait for me there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你回家等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTGoHome_00077CFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to go to the suite at the Lucky 38 and wait for me there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你去幸运38的总统套房，在那里等着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTGoL38_00077D00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, there's nothing bad waiting for you. No punishment. You're a good man. You deserve peace of mind and a good life. That's what you deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，之后就没有什么意外了。你是个好人。你应当拥有宁静的生活。这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB4thRe_00077D04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no! Bethie got killed by Geckos!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不！贝茜被蜥蜴给杀了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, only Big George got killed by Geckos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，只有大狗乔乔被蜥蜴杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000780AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what did happen to Bethie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，告诉我贝西发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's almost time to go. Let's talk now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，差不多该走了。如果你想听的话我们可以现在谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you worried at all about dying? I'm worried about you and me too. It's scary to think both of us might not make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在担心死亡么?我也在担心同样的事,我害怕我们中的任何一人可能没法撑过这次.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic010_000780B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some more work to do before we'll go to The Dam, can we talk later?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些准备工作要做在我们出发去胡佛大坝之前,晚点再聊?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我喜欢这主意.
