ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic011_000780B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not too worried about it. I think we have the advantage of strength on our side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不怎么担心,我认为我们这边的力量有明显的优势.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you're feeling confident about our chances, and you must feel committed to your cause to be risking your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你对自己选择如此自信,而且你一定愿意为你的事业而赌上上你的性命.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course! It's scary as hell! But we'll be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!虽然那里现在就像地狱一样!但是我们会挺过去的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道我对你的感觉,如果我们没能撑过这次的话.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been a great friend to me, like the sister I never had and I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我最好的朋友,就像我一直想有的姐姐一样,还有我爱你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic016_000780BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道我对你的感觉,如果我们没能撑过这次的话.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been a great friend to me and I love you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我最好的朋友,而且我非常爱你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道我对你的感觉,如果我们没能撑过这次的话.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when it occurred to me that you might die I got so sad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道你有可能永远离我而去我就非常伤心.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic018_000780BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you so much. I was thinking, if we both make it through this maybe we could talk about making our relationship a more serious one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常的爱你.我在想如果我们俩都活过胡佛大坝的战斗,我们也许该给这一段友情一个正名了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic018_000780BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we could talk about staying together forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以考虑一下永远在一起的事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic018_000780BD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But for now, I want you to take this and wear it. Maybe it'll keep you safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是现在我想要你穿上这个.这也许能保护你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic018_000780BD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it as my promise to you that I'll love you forever no matter what. Because I do and I will. I'll be wearing one too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这个看成我爱你直到永远的承诺吧,因为我是这样并且也会这么做的.而且我也会穿上同样的一件的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure you know I love you very much. You've been a wonderful friend to me. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道我非常非常的爱你.你是一个非常好的伙伴.谢谢你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic018_000780BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do! Thanks for the ones you've given me so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错!多谢你现在能给我.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic020_0007AEC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're spoiling me Willow. It's too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你快惹毛我了,维儿.这有点过分了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want me to stop? I will if you want me to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我停止么?我会停下如果你这么想的话.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic021_0007AEC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that would be best. (turns gift giving in the mailbox off)
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,那样最好.(关闭邮箱的赠送礼物选项)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我喜欢这主意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic022_0007AEC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, please don't. It's a lot, but I like it. (Willow will continue to leave gifts in the mailbox)
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,请别这样.我还是蛮喜欢这个的.(维儿会继续留一些礼物在邮箱里)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我喜欢这主意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic023_0007AEC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we're best friends are you willing to change your clothes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然现在我们是挚友了,你愿意把衣服给换了吗..?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I don't know what all this fuss is about, but yes, if you're tired of seeing me in this outfit, I'm willing to change it. Happy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,真不知道他惹到你哪儿了,没事,如果你看烦了的话我就换件好了,开心了嗯?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkClothe_0007B64E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have five pieces for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有5块蜥蜴肉可以给你.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_0007B651_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted to talk after we left The Fort. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想在我们离开要塞之后聊聊么.那是什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to know how committed you are to Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要知道你对凯撒有什么打算.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQTumorKillCae_0008E3E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to talk before you do anything to Caesar, but we can't talk here. Please talk to me before you do anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须聊聊在你对凯撒做任何事之前,但是不是在这儿.在你做任何事之前请务必和我聊聊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQTumorKillCae_000AB408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can. Let's find whoever's in charge around here and ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以。让我们找到这儿的负责人问问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'd like that. Things are a mess around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了!我喜欢这个选择,这儿都一团糟了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007C006_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All mine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 包在我身上!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCBoonecombat_0007C311_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么?!

ESP.ORIGINAL: The memorial reminded me of my brother, Chuck. From the time he was little all he wanted to do was join the NCR and become a Ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个纪念碑让我想起了我的兄弟,查克.他从小的理想就是去加入NCR然后成为一名游骑兵.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dad wouldn't let him do it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸不怎么同意,不过.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wouldn't your dad let him do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为啥你爸爸不让他这么做呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't want Chuck to die fighting for the NCR. Dad wanted him safe at home, which it turns out he didn't get after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不想让查克哪天死在NCR无休止的战争上.爸爸希望他安全的呆在家里,虽然这事最后也没实现.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuck's a caravan guard now. He loves it. I think he thrives on danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克现在是个商队护卫了,他应该喜欢这份工作.我认为他还是挺危险的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He almost died a few years ago in a fight, but he has this big scar to show for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年之前他差点在一场战斗里死去,但是他还是活下来了,虽然留下了一条巨大的伤疤.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The thing is the scar's left him dangerous looking and he knows it so he plays it up and acts tough. He's a handful, but girls love him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条疤痕让他看起来是个狠人,他知道这点所以他就表现的像个硬汉.他虽然一看就不好惹,但是还是有不少女孩喜欢他的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C30E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Willow you didn't stay home safe either!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿,维儿,你自己不是也没有乖乖呆在家里么.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're right. My dad did mention Chuck when I told him what I wanted to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,是的,不过当我告诉我爸爸我要出去旅行的时候,他的确提起了查克这事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C310_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can understand why he wanted to protect Chuck. It'd be hard to lose a child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解为何他会这么保护查克.失去自己的子女一直是一件痛苦的事.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and if I ever have a baby, and I want to someday, I hope he or she won't do the crazy stuff Chuck and I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊,如果我哪天有了一个孩子,我也不希望他做我或者查克做过的这些疯狂的事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C316_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd worry myself sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样我会担心死的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C316_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your dad should have let Chuck go fight. There's honor in fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的父亲应该让查克去战斗.这是一件相当荣耀的事.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? And death? If I ever have kids, and I'd like to someday, I'd want to keep them safe too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?然后怎么样?死去么?如果我有孩子,我希望他们永远安全
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0007C318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my strong suit, but okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的强项,但是也凑合了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp01_0007C8DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe some other time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 些许下次吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp02_0007C8DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno, couldn't hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道,无所谓了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp03_0007CBC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm met Carla while I was at the Strip on leave. She said I looked lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在赌城区见到的卡拉,在我休假的时候.他说我看起来像个输家.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp04_0007CBC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pointless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无意义.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp05_0007CBC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I do best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可就是我最擅长的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp06_0007CBCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能完成那个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp07_0007CBD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我想.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp08_0007CBD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,抱歉.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp09_0007CBD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能完成那个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp10_0007CBDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got bad things coming to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有不好的预感.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp11_0007CBDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something going on between you and Boone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和布恩之间发生了什么问题么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not at all. I'm just being nice to him because he's so sad and tortured. Poor guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,没什么啊,我只是尝试安慰一下他而已,他现在既伤心又痛苦,真是个可怜的家伙.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFBoonieJealous_0007CBE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something going on between you and Boone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和布恩之间发生了什么问题么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I do like him a lot. He's brave and handsome. I feel so sorry for him. He's so tortured. I just wish I could help him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额,我的确非常喜欢他.他既勇敢又长得帅.但是我对他的事情感到抱歉,他现在非常痛苦,我只希望能帮帮他.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFBoonieJealous_0007CBE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's do it. The bungalow could use some work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,让我这么做吧,平房还需要更多的修整.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestY_0009E36D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here...take this. I can't say it outloud. You're..you'll have to read it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个...拿着这个.我不能说出来,你应该读一下这个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQEndgameLegio_000B1732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFNevermind_0007EE5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp06_0007F9FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我靠.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp06_0007FA02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我不会的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp07_0007F9FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp08_0007FA04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,当然.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCwTowResp09_0007FCEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does everyone always say that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么每个人都这么说?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCwTowResp10_0007FFC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCwTowResp11_0007FFCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. More or less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,差不多了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCwTowResp12_0007FFD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could you know, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会知道呢,不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCwTowResp13_000802B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, that was wonderful. You were wonderful. I hope we can do that again sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢,那真是太棒了.你太厉害了.希望我们什么时候能再来一次
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbPostChat_00080F1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you can count on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错,你完全可以相信那个

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm glad to hear that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,真高兴听你那么说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00080F22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, I'm not interested in doing it again. I hope you understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿, 我对在那么干一次一点兴趣都没了,希望你理解

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. We won't then. And as far as I'm concerned, we are nothing more than friends from now on, I hope you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我们不会的.但我想了很多,你是个好人,所以从现在起我们只做好朋友好吗?你能理解我吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00080F23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, I want to make love to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,亲爱的,你现在是不是有一些奇妙的心绪?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbRoutine_0009D4E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with all the pencils? You've got about ten of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞这么多铅笔干嘛?你都快凑出一个球队了

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like pencils.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢铅笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like pencils?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢铅笔?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do write in my journal. But, have you noticed when you need one it's never there? Well, if you have ten, or more, there's never a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些是写日记的.但,你有没有碰到需要他的时候却总不在手头的时候?那么,假如你也有十根,或者更多,这就不是问题噜~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I notice you have a lot of dog biscuits too. Why so many of those?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现你的狗饼干也不少,这又是为啥?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love them! I made up the recipe for Big George, my dog, but they're so tasty I carry a bunch with me all the time. They're my favorite snack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可爱吃了!这里好多本来是给大狗乔乔准备的,可惜它不在了...但是他们太好吃了,所以我就带着,偶尔当小点心吃....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're good, huh? Can I try one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们看着还不错呃?我能尝一个吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, please do. We can always make more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我们总可以再做更多的出来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Think I'll pass on the dog's food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吖..还是留给狗狗吃好了....

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? I cook them properly. I make them with Gecko meat, Blamco Mac & Cheese and flour. It's not like I make them with Salisbury Steak. Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为啥?我可是很严谨的做出来的.我用蜥蜴肉,起司,还有面粉一起烤出来的.这可不像我用肉饼做的....呃.....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, that's alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,没事,我很淡定的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might want to consider a name change for them. Dog Biscuits isn't so appetizing, is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许可以考虑给他换个名字,小狗饼干之类的实在是让人没胃口的名字,不是吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll leave it for now. In remembrance of Big George.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时我不会考虑的,这是为了纪念大狗乔乔.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00083A2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a teddy bear. I hope you like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是一只泰迪熊,希望你喜欢他

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do, thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,谢谢你!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00084B66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a garden gnome. Don't you think he'll go nicely with Moira and Chester?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一个花园矮人,你觉得他能跟莫伊拉和切斯特玩到一块去么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do! Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,当然!谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00084B6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a Nuka Cola Quartz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是瓶石英型核子可乐

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! I'm going to drink that right away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢!我现在就喝了它
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00084B6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Change mind] Um, oops, I guess I don't have something to give you after all. I'm sorry, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: [更变主意]嗯，哎呀，我想我没有什么给你。对不起，维儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00084B77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-oh, am I in trouble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呦嗬,我这是有麻烦了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: May I please have my Lucky Figurine back? You know, I didn't show you my collection so you could ransack it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把我的幸运雕像拿回来吗?你知道,我不给你看我的收藏品就是怕被你抢走...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGimmeMyLuckySo_000856ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I keep it? Please? I'll take good care of it. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以留着吗?拜托?我会好好照顾她的,我发誓!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you know, you can have it. I got it from a trader and it's never been especially dear to me. Maybe you'll like it more than I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,好吧,你可以拿着她.我是从一个商人那里买来的,但从来都不怎么太重视.说不底你比我更喜欢呢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000856F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just curious about it. You can have it back now. Where did you get it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是有点好奇.你可以把她拿回去了,不过你是在哪儿找到的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got that from a trader. I don't find everything I have. Moira came from a caravaner who used to stay with us in the motel, but she was a gift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从一个商人那里.我不能把每样都记住. 莫伊拉是住在汽车宾馆的商队送给我的礼物
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000856F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, the lighter? I definitely want that. It was my grandfather's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,打火机呐!?我很需要那个.那是我祖父的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000856F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there's our tent! We should camp there some night. I'll cook us dinner. It'd be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那是我们的帐篷！我们可以住几个晚上。我会做晚餐。这会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTentComments_000A6BF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look! It's where you first found me! It looks so boring for such a special place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看！这是你第一次找到我的地方！尽管是这样一个特殊的地方但是看起来依旧有点无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTentComments_000A6BF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some to share. Here, have one of mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些东西要分给你.这儿,拿一个去

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000856F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds good. I don't want to stop right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那听上去很棒.我现在不想停下来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000856FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I want you gone. (This choice removes her from your game forever in prep for removing mod)
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我希望你离开。 （选了这个她就从游戏里消失啦。即可删除mod）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, goodbye. I don't know what else to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，再见了。我不知道应该说些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYes3remo_0008790A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许迟些时候.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'd like that. Things are a mess around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了!我喜欢这个.这里的情况非常糟糕啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic000_0008790C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, Willow, I don't want to help the NCR troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,维儿,我不打算去帮助NCR的士兵.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, it's up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,随你吧.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic001_00087910_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know exactly what you want or do you plan to just wander around? The Mojave's a big place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我们要去的地方的确切的位置么或者你有相应的计划么?莫哈维可是个不小的地方

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know what I want and where we should go to get it. When I was at the Mojave Outpost I picked up a NCR pamphlet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我当然知道我要什么而且上哪里去找.当我还待在莫哈维前哨站的时候,我顺走了一本NCR小册子.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic028_00087EDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It talks about the flora and fauna of the Mojave and where to find stuff. It's very informative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本册子详细介绍了莫哈维的动植物,还标出了哪里能找到这些玩意.真是非常详细呢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic028_00087EDE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've planned our little mission based on what I've read in the pamphlet. Hopefully it won't send us on a wild goose chase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我基于这本子小小的计划了一下我们的行程,希望它能带我们找到我们想要找到的东西.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic028_00087EDE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first place we're headed to is Ruby Hill Mine to get a couple of Banana Yucca plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去的第一个地方叫做露比希尔矿井(Ruby Hill Mine),在那里找到一些大土蕉种子.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic028_00087EDE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the Banana Yucca plants. Where to now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们弄到大土蕉了.现在怎么办?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next place on my list is Silver Peak Mine. It's up the road a ways. We should find Xander Root plants there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去的下个地方是银峰矿洞(Silver Peak Mine).路程不近呢.我们应该能在那里找到一些山德根种子.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got the Xander Root Plants. What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到山德根了。下一步呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been thinking I'd like to have some Cave Fungus inside the bungalow where it'd be all glowy. The pamphlet says there's some in Charleston Cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我需要一些洞穴蘑菇，它会点亮的小房子。这本小册子说有一些生长在在查尔斯顿洞穴(Charleston Cave)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the Cave Fungus. Where are we headed to now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到洞穴蘑菇了，那么我们进行到哪里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going after Broc Flower plants. It's quite a long way; south of a trainyard according to the pamphlet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要去找锦缎花，这是一条很长的路。更具小册子说它们生长在火车站南边(south of a trainyard)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad we can't grow our own pinyon nuts, huh? That'd make life easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏消息是我们没法让我们的松子生长，嗯？不用照顾这植物也许能让日子更省心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we going to be carrying much else? Those broc flower plants are big.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还要在带一些吗？那些锦缎花可真大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's it for plants. The last thing I want is a mailbox. You never know, if we have one, maybe we'll get some mail!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，就是这样的植物。我想的最后一件事是一个邮箱。你永远不知道，如果我们有一个，也许有人会给我们寄信呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that probably sounds really silly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那听起来有点逗比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when I was little me and my friends would leave each other notes and presents in our mailboxes. I can't imagine having a house without one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，当我小的时候我和我的朋友们互留书信，并说出我们的邮箱。我不能想象有一个房子没有一个邮箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EE9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the pink bird! We have to take that, don't you think? It would look great next to the planters!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看粉红色的鸟！我们一定要带走的，摆在花盆边上会很很好看的，你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I got the pink bird for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那我给你弄来粉红色的鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that's it! I'm not sure we could carry much more than this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是它！我不知道我们可不可以以弄来更多的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanna go back to the bungalow now? We can get everything set up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想回小房子吗？我们可以把一切都建立起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EF3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the cave fungus! It looks great, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这些洞穴蘑菇！它看起来很棒，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFFreeformQuestS_00087EF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I got the pink bird for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我给你弄来了拿到了粉红色的鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this it? Do you think this is the treasure? Disappointing, right? Don't get me wrong, the gnome's cute, but its not what I'd hoped we'd find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这个?你认为这个就是传说中的"宝藏"?真失望,不是么?别误解我了,这个矮人是很可爱啦,但是不是我想要找到的那种"宝藏'.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087EFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, you know, the trip doesn't have to be a total waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过,你知道的,这段旅程并不是一无所获.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087EFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you pick up a couple of those badges and bring me some duct tape I'll turn them into something we can wear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你拿上几个这种徽章还有一卷胶带,我可你为你做出一些能带着玩的东西.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087EFB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能这么做?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I stuck the flower on my hat and it's stayed there for months. So, if you're interested bring me two badges and a roll of duct tape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,这个带花的帽子就是我自己做出来的,如果你有兴趣的话可以带给我两个夕阳沙士徽章和一卷胶带.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087EFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are the badges and duct tape. Can you make us badges now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了徽章和一卷胶带.你能帮我改造一下这个徽章吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! This is so easy to do I can do it right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!这很容易,我现在就能搞定.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087F01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll just take me a second, so hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我一下,这需要个几分钟.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFStarBottleCaps_00087F01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no! J.T.! No! He's dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,不! J.T.!不!它死了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDJTDied_000881E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp12_000884D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's a great idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,那是个不错的主意.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000884D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I want you to have it Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我想你留着它维儿.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,谢谢你!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000884D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you know I had a sweet tooth, boss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老大,知道我喜欢甜食的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\ghouluniqueraul\AWillowANP_ANPCRaulSweetGi_000887B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去不错

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will be. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去的,我保证
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbWeAreDoingI_00088A8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two months? That long, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个月？那太久了，嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been together for two months now! I got you a present to celebrate. It's in the kitchen on the counter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经在一起两个月了！我给你带了礼物来庆祝。就在厨房的柜台上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversarySix_00089BEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to know. I love you very much. More every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你知道，我非常爱你一天比一天爱你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversarySix_00089BF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd really like my beret back, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很喜欢我的贝雷帽，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_ANPCbTowResp13_0008C156_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it, Willow. I can handle Red Lucy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心维儿,我能处理好露西的事.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure? I don't trust her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？我不相信她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRedLucyQS90Res_00064A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, come on Willow it'd be fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧维儿这会很有趣！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want to join you in a threesome with her! What I want to do is go home. I thought you loved me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我可不会加入你和红露西一起玩3P!我要回家.我还以为你爱的是我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0008DB3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know there are girls here, right? Ones you can pay for sex. You wouldn't do that would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你还没忘了我在这儿,当你听到回报是啪啪啪的时候.你不会这么做的对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Prostitutes_0008E3DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't have a problem with that would you? It's not like we're married.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这个没什么大意见吧?我们还没好到结婚这个地步诶.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You're right, we're not married. Go ahead and keep sleeping with whoever you want, you should be happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,你是对的!我们是没结婚!去吧和随便那个你喜欢的男人一起睡觉去吧!你TM应该很开心不是么!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic002_0008E3E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just, you know, I thought we had something special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是...你知道,我以为我们两个的感情是不一样的呢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic002_0008E3E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like my freedom, Willow. You should go on home,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想一个人待会儿,维儿.你应该回家去.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'm going home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧.我会回家呆着
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic003_0008E3E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, I didn't realize it was so important to you. I don't need anyone but you. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿.我不知道这对你来说这么重要.我不想要任何其他人但是除了你,行吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为啥？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he's evil and if the legion wins the war they'll destroy everything that's good in the Mojave. You can stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他很邪恶啊,还有如果军团赢得了战争他们会杀光莫哈维所有反对他们的人,你可以阻止这种事情的发生啊
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic029_0008E3E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you kill Caesar now you will destroy the legion. You have to consider it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你现在杀死凯撒，你会毁掉军团 你必须考虑它
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic029_0008E3E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想都别想!

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the best option for the Mojave. The legion will destroy everything here. You know that's the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫哈韦沙漠的最佳选择 军团将摧毁这里的一切 你知道这是事实
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic030_0008E3EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember that chatty robot in the closet in Benny's room? He offered to help you take over New Vegas and make it your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住，斑尼房间里的衣柜里有个健谈的机器人？ 他提出帮助你接管新维加斯，并让它成为你自己的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic030_0008E3EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the Mojave. You'd be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这样做，你可以为新维加斯和莫哈韦沙漠做好准备 你会成为英雄
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic030_0008E3EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the best option for the Mojave. The legion will destroy everything here. You know that's the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫哈韦沙漠的最佳选择 军团将摧毁这里的一切 你知道这是事实
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic030_0008E3EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the Mojave. You'd be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这样做，你可以为新维加斯和莫哈韦沙漠做好准备 你会成为英雄
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Why would I do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Caesar won't destroy the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了凯撒并不代表军团会分崩离析.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, maybe it won't destroy it, but it will weaken it, and you can leave them, and if you must fight in this war fight it another way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许它不会消灭它，但它会削弱它，你可以离开它们，如果你必须在这场战争中战斗，那就以另一种方式来对抗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic032_0008E3EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember that chatty robot? The one in the closet in Benny's room? He offered to help you take over New Vegas and make it your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住，健谈机器人？ 在斑尼房间里的衣柜里？ 他提出帮助你接管新维加斯，并让它成为你自己的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic032_0008E3EE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the entire Mojave. You'd be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这样做，你可以为新维加斯和整个莫哈韦沙漠做好准备 你会成为英雄
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic032_0008E3EE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, maybe it won't destroy it, but it will weaken it, and you can leave them, and if you must fight in this war fight it another way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许它不会消灭它，但它会削弱它，你可以离开它们，如果你必须在这场战争中战斗，那就以另一种方式来对抗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic032_0008E3F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the entire Mojave. You'd be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这样做，你可以为新维加斯和整个莫哈韦沙漠做好准备 你会成为英雄
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Caesar won't destroy the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀凯撒不会摧毁军团

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, time for more fighting, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，我知道，有更多的战斗时机
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\ghouluniqueraul\AWillowANP_ANPCRaulcombats_0008F259_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it! You've gone too far! I should tell you to leave and never come back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了!这太过分了!我应该让你离开并且永远别回来!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sorry! Don't make me go! I love you! I take it back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对不起！ 别让我走！ 我爱你！ 我把它收回！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic033_0008F540_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sorry! Please, don't make me go! I take it back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对不起！ 请不要让我走！ 我把它收回！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic033_0008F54B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gone too far and you're going to pay the price! (kill her)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做的太过分了,而现在你将付出代价了!(杀掉她)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic034_0008F541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会考虑一下这个的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic035_0008F54A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so unhappy, just go. I do love you, but this will be better for both of us. (leaves forever)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可真是不讨喜啊,离开我吧,虽然我爱过你,但是你离开对我们两个人来说都更好. (永远离开)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. You know, I could never leave you on my own, but, you're right, it's probably for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的. 你知道，我永远不会离开你，但是，你是对的，这可能是最好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic036_0008F547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的爱你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic036_0008F547_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. You know, I could never leave you on my own, but, you're right, it's probably for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的. 你知道，我永远不会离开你，但是，你是对的，这可能是最好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic036_0008F54C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been a great friend to me. I'll miss you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直是我的好朋友. 我会想念你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic036_0008F54C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so unhappy, just go. I do love you, but this will be better for both of us. (leaves forever)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很不开心，就去吧. 我爱你，但这对我们俩都会更好 （永远离开）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't take it back. It's over. Just go. Now. (leaves forever)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这句话你可不能收回去了.这一切都结束,我现在就会离开这儿!(永远离开)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, fine! But I don't want to hear any more about killing Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,就这样了!但是我不想再听到任何关于杀掉凯撒的话题了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise, I won't mention it again. I'm so sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证，我不会再提及它。 我很抱歉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic039_0008F549_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，新的徽章已经完成！

ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，哪一个？

ESP.TRADUIT: 我想用你亲密的时刻做些事情

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersWillowTr_000AB11B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take off your intimate moment things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请摘下你亲密的时刻

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need any time to think about it! I'll stay with you forever if I make it through this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要时间来想了!如果我成功活了下来,我想和你在一起,到永远.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! Oh! I love you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊! 哦! 我爱你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic041_000962B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, Willow. If I get through this, I'll think about what you've said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢,维儿,如果我成功了,我会考虑一下你说的事.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic042_000962B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want you to use your mask when we are in irradiated areas (she won't put on her mask).
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们在辐射地区的时候不要带上你的防辐射面罩(维儿不会带上面罩).

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，行
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersWillowTr_0008FCC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好没问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_FollowersRadiatio_00093D45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use your own mask when we're in irradiated areas (she'll use her mask)
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们在受辐射照的区域时使用自己的面具（她会使用她的面具）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay here, please, and don't attack anything. Take cover if you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呆在这儿,拜托.不要攻击任何东西,能躲就赶紧躲起来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it. I'll stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得到它了 我会留在这里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatWaitHere_000908B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说对了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatWaitHere_00093970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for waiting here, but I want your help now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您在此等待，但我现在需要您的帮助

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, follow me, but don't attack anything, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,跟着我,但别攻击任何东西好么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I don't need to be a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不需要成为英雄
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatFollowNo_000908B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to leave now and get to safety. Go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你离开这儿,找个安全的地方呆着,快!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Stay safe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的 注意安全！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatClearOut_000908B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I've got your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我已经收到你的回信
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatClearOut_00093973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go now. I want you back by my side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在走吧 我想让你回到我身边

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no place I'd rather be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有我宁愿成为的地方
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatClearOut_00094D99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go now. I want you back by my side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在走吧 我想让你回到我身边

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to fight again. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你继续战斗!立刻!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I've got your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的 我支持你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatRELEASEf_00091FA2_1.ogg
Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookForMeMENU_000972DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, I just thought you might like to talk about your problems. Willow warned me you were quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么,我只是觉得你可能想谈谈自己的困难.维儿有嘱咐过我你不爱说话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_0009396E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about what you do for me when we fight together, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们谈谈共同作战的技术问题,好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatWillow_000947C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you trying to tell me something? You've been flirting with me for awhile now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在试着告诉我些什么东西么?你可是扭扭捏捏的跟我不清不楚各种暧昧很久了

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's true, I have been flirting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我一直在调情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are not making this easy for me! You know I want you, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把这个弄得更复杂了!你知道我想要你,对吧!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I know. I feel the same way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的我知道 我有同样的感觉
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must know by now how much I like you. And if you don't know, let me say it again. I do like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须明白我现在有多么喜欢你,不然的话,就让我说清楚吧,我.喜.欢.你.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? I'm so glad. You'd said so before, and you've done so many nice things for me, that, I'd hoped you still did. But, I wasn't sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做？ 我很高兴 你之前说过这样的话，你为我做了很多很好的事情，所以我希望你仍然这样做 但是，我不确定
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do know, as soon as you give me the ok, I'm going to be all over you. And I mean, ALL over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗,自从你那个同意和我一起走的 .行.字出口以来我的脑袋里就只剩下你了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Maybe we should do something about that. Soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦 也许我们应该为此做点什么 不久
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How soon Willow? Now? Because I want it to be now. Come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多快维儿?现在?因为我现在就想要那个,过来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon is good, but I want you to be ready. I'll be here when you decide to come to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快就已经很好了,但我想让你准备好.我会在这里等着,直到你下定决心来找我为止

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll come to you when I'm ready, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好后我会来找你的，我保证
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I still do like you. Will you come here and let me show you how much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我依然很喜欢你.你想过来一下好让我告诉你我有多喜欢你么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! I've been thinking about this for a long, long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是! 我一直在考虑这个很长很长的时间
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And because I've been thinking about it for so long I've had time to plan something special for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我一直在想这件事，所以我有时间为你设计一些特别的东西
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to do it somewhere private. But, you choose. Should we do it here or go somewhere else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在私密的地方做 但是，你选择 我们应该在这里做还是去其他地方？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do still like you, a lot, but I want you to come to me. Whenever you're ready I'll be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的确依然喜欢着你,非常非常.但我想要你来找我,当你准备好的时候我会在这里的

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll come to you when I'm ready, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好后我会来找你的，我保证
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we going to do something about it or are you going to keep flirting forever?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是打算就这么永远骚动下去,还是把这种骚动变成更真实点的东西?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready yet. When I am I'll come to you, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没准备好 当我是我会来找你，我保证
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00094AB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Let's do something about it. Come here and let me show you how much I want you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,咱们做点什么.过来...让我告诉你我有多么想要你..

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go somewhere else. Come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们去别的地方,来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way, Lover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 情人，带路
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_00095ECF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you dance for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿你可以为我跳支舞么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, for you, anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，对你而言，任何事情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbDanceYes_0009646F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you skip the dance, Willow? I don't want to wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能直接跳过跳舞那部分么,维儿?我不太喜欢等待啊.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, honey, whatever you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，亲爱的，无论你想要什么
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDftbDanceNo_00096472_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you sing more often?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能经常唱歌给我听么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! I'd love to!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！ 我喜欢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSingingToggleM_00097BB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好没问题
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSingingToggleM_0006D29D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to sing less often.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要经常唱歌

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are going to get tough around here, Willow, really Hardcore. Be prepared.(Set Essential)
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们的处境不太妙,维儿,这是场真正的考验,准备好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDisHardcoreEsse_000B1E3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh...okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDisHardcoreEsse_00098135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself. Things are going to get tough around here, and you could get hurt.(Set Unessential)
ESP.TRADUIT: 看你自己 事情会变得很棘手，你可能会受伤 (不重要的)

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a special present for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一份特别的礼物给你.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? A present! I love presents!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会怎么做?一份礼物!我爱的礼物!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFpreforWillowTe_00098876_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called A. Tom McTed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是一只特殊的泰迪熊.叫做泰迪熊汤姆麦克泰德.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,谢谢!这是一种高质量的收藏品
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic045_00098B55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called Bearly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额,又一只特殊的泰迪熊.她的名字好像叫美人.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,谢谢!这是一种高质量的收藏品
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic046_00098B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called Cy Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有找到了一只不一样的泰迪熊.他叫泰迪熊Cy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这是一个质量收藏
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic047_00098B59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called Pvt. Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一只泰迪熊,他好像还是个士兵.他叫泰迪熊PVT

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这是一个质量收藏
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic048_00098B5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called Golf R. Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一个不一样的泰迪熊.他的名字是:泰迪熊Golf R.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这是一个质量收藏
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic049_00098B5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called Plush E. Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个挺不同的泰迪熊,他也有个名字.好像叫做: Plush E.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这是一个质量收藏
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic050_00098B61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a very special bear. He has a name. He's called S.W. Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个挺特别的泰迪熊,他好像还有个名字,好像叫:泰迪熊S.W.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！这是一个质量收藏
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic051_00098B63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to rent the deluxe bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想租一间豪华版的房间.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I think that's a fine idea. I'll give you a good flat rate, and you can stay as long as you like. Least till the busy season comes. Sound good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我认为那是个好主意 我会给你一个很好的统一费率，你可以在你喜欢的地方停留多久 直到旺季来临。听起来不错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleOld01\AWillowANP_AWNPCJMBungalow_0009BDC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 150 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿是150瓶盖.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you can stay with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你能和我们住在一起
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleOld01\AWillowANP_AWNPCJMBungalow_0009BDC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford 150 caps right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在拿不出150瓶盖.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's nothing to be ashamed of. We all have money troubles from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么没有什么值得惭愧的 我们每时都有钱麻烦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleOld01\AWillowANP_AWNPCJMBungalow_0009BDC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just come on back when you can afford it, and that room's all yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你负担得起的时候你就回来了，那个房间都是你的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleOld01\AWillowANP_AWNPCJMBungalow_0009BDC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦 好吧，好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to rent the deluxe bungalow on the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想租那间在尽头的豪华房间.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a great idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意啊
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBunga_0009BDCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 150 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是150瓶盖.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Here ya go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了!这是你的了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBunga_0009BDCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford 150 caps right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在还拿不出150瓶盖.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还需要别的什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBunga_0009BDD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别介意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还需要别的什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff Briscoe [0008CD27] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleAdult06\AWillowANP_AWNPCCliffBunga_0009BDD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, are you coming on to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,你想到我上面来么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I..yeah, I guess I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我..耶，我想我是
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDMakinTheMoveAG_0009C8CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I want to help him every way I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我想尽全力帮助他.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just can't get over it. That you believe in him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是搞不懂,为什么你这么相信他.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic000_0009E076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting tired of you complaining about it. Why don't you leave already?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对和你一起的旅途已经深感厌倦了.你为什么就不离开我呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want me to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你,你想让我走吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic001_0009E078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, forever. (Willow leaves your game. You can't get her back).
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,而且是永远.(维儿离开莫哈维.你再也没法找到她了)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Fuck you. I am leaving and we are never, ever, ever getting back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好!另外fuck♂you.我马上就离开另外而你这辈子再也别想见到我了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic002_0009E084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, go home. I'll catch up with you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,回家去吧,我晚些时候会和你会合.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll see you there later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,咱们晚点见
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic003_0009E07D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but I could stand less complaining from you about the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,但是我不想听到你老是抱怨军团.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I did tell you I wasn't thrilled about being involved with Caesar. Don't forget I love you, okay? It's why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉,我告诉过你我并不是很想和凯撒打交道.别忘了我爱你,行吗?这是我现在在这儿的原因
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic004_0009E080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I want you to stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我希望你和我呆在一起.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want that too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正好也是这么想的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic005_0009E081_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I do. Follow me, follow him. That's the way it's going to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我的确这么打算.你跟着我,我跟着他.这就是未来的计划.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, don't forget I love you. That's why I stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,但是别忘了我爱你,这才是我留下的原因.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic006_0009E07F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to have anything to do with that. It's one thing to kill people who are trying to kill us, but to go in cold...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想与此有任何关系 杀死试图杀死我们的人是一回事，但要冷静下来......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic007_0009E366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna sit this one out. I'll be waiting for you at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算暂时退出这个任务.我会在家里等你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic007_0009E366_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic008_0009E365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狩猎?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, geckos, mostly. That's why my dad taught me to shoot as soon as I could handle a weapon. He was looking to train us to be hunters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,大部分是蜥蜴.这就是我爸爸在我刚刚能拿起武器的时候就教了我如何射击.他希望能把我们训练成猎人.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0009E650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't really like doing all the hunting for the motel himself so he was looking for help from us kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不想一个人把旅馆的打猎的事情全包了,所以他希望我们这些小孩子能帮上他的忙.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0009E650_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't like hunting all the time though, I preferred hanging out and working with my mom in the motel so that was my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实不是非常喜欢打猎啦,我更喜欢呆在旅馆里帮我妈妈做事,所以这就很自然的成了我的工作.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0009E650_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad got his wish though, two of my brothers really took to hunting. That's Sam and Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我爸爸的想法最后还是实现了,我的两个哥哥山姆和迪安把打猎的事情包了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0009E650_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about your other brothers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你其他的兄弟们呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Val's a doctor, Chuck's a caravan guard and my little brother, Bobby? He's probably running around still being useless most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓦尔是一名医生，查克是一名商队护卫，还有我的小弟弟鲍比？ 他可能在大部分时间都处于无用状态
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFWillowTop_0009E652_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you ever get lonely traveling by yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己一个人旅行的时候曾觉得孤独过么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do, even though I'm rarely alone. I had hoped to meet someone special. Maybe someone who would want to come with me on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，尽管我并不孤单，但我确实 我曾希望遇见特别的人 也许有人想在旅途中跟我一起来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0223_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe someone would like me enough to want me stay with them. But even though I've met and traveled with a lot of people in the last two years,
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，也许有人会喜欢我，想让我和他们在一起 但即使我在过去的两年中与很多人见过面，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0223_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have been unlucky in love and friendship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在爱情和友谊方面一直不走运
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0223_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I'm sure it will happen for you someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉.我确定有一天那些都会来到的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? I hope so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？ 但愿如此
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you'll get lucky sooner than you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许运气来的比你想得还要快呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Ya, think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是嘛?你真这么想?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Sorry, I got distracted by something over there behind you. You were saying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃?抱歉,远处有什么东西在动..你刚才说什么??

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, nevermind. I was just rambling. It wasn't important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没关系 我只是散漫 这并不重要
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你客气了

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're serious about having me stay here in the Mojave with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你认真的让我和你一起留在莫哈韦沙漠吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A022C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I am, very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,非常认真

ESP.ORIGINAL: This means a lot to me. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我来说意义重大 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This means a lot to me. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我来说意义重大 谢谢
