ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A620_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱平房 这让我想起了家 我知道我会在这里很开心
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A620_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I am, very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我非常

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. If you want to stay that would be fine with me. I'm happy to have you share my house with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,如果你想留下的话也没问题.我很乐意有你分享我的屋子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0231_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A621_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱平房 这让我想起了家 我知道我会在这里很开心
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A621_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. If you want to stay that would be fine with me. I'm happy to have you share my house with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然 如果你想留下来，我会很好 我很乐意让你和我分享我的房子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having you here will make things easier for me while we're traveling together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你在身边陪着一起旅行真是轻松了不少呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦. 非常感谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱平房 这让我想起了家 我知道我会在这里很开心
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_0007A622_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having you here will make things easier for me while we're traveling together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们一起旅行时，在这里你会让我更容易

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to mind coming back here at all. But if I'd been shot, and buried, and left for dead somewhere I don't think I'd go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎并不介意回到这里 但是，如果我被枪杀，埋葬，并在某处死去，我不认为我会回去
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000A0234_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to show me where you were buried? Oh, sorry I could have said that better. I'm just really curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要告诉我你埋在哪里？ 哦，对不起，我可以说更好 我只是很好奇
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000A0236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to go see Chet and do some shopping while we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想去看看切特，并在我们来这里时做一些购物
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000B0AC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're gonna go see Chet, I'm gonna need to borrow some caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要去见切特，我需要借一些帽子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000B0AC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to take me out for a drink or a bite to eat in the Saloon? What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想把我从堆满食物的沙龙餐桌旁拉开?你最好有个好理由
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000B0AC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanna go by the Saloon for a drink? I bet Sunny'd like to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想去沙龙里喝一杯么?桑妮肯定会喜欢这么做的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_00075AD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a nice little town, but you know what it needs? A motel. Everything's better with a motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个不错的小镇,但是你知道缺了什么吗?一个汽车旅馆.在旅馆里一切事情都会更好.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_00070F88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting, watching the stars above. Hoping that I could win back your love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待，仰望星空 希望我能赢回你的爱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_0009886C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_0009886D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so blue without you, thought our love was true, then you found someone new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你我是那么的忧伤，我们的爱是真实的，然后你发现了一个新的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_0009886B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_0009886E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像一个家伙曾经说过的，那不是一脚踢在脑袋上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedGoodsprin_000A4F3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He buried you in the cemetery. Ouch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他把你埋在墓地里 哎哟
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDBurialSite_000A0238_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't be the only one wondering if we're going to come out of this okay. We could end up dead. Or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿我可不想一个人游荡.我可能会因此死去,或者更糟.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_0007C303_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. Well, if this camp is any indication, Caesar's the monster I've always heard he is. Look at this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼,如果这个营地展示了什么的话,那便是凯撒的兽性,我一直听说他是简直是一只野兽.看看这地方啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_0007C304_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those poor girls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些可怜的女孩
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_000A023B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I like how they treat their women around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很难说我喜欢他们对待他们夫人们的方式
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_000AD416_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not taking anything out of here...these guys and their crosses? I'm not messing with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这我可不会"拿走"任何东西....这些变态还有钉在十字架上?我可不想惹到他们
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_000743CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_000743CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be nice to get back out on the road again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要规规矩矩的忍受一会,我就能离开这儿回到大路上了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_0007E5C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow! Look at those legs! Ugh! But he's just a slaving s- I can't wait to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！ 看看那些腿！ 啊! 但他只是一个奴隶 - 我迫不及待要离开这里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_0007E5C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, if I ever build a fort, the first thing I'm going to put up is some crucified bodies. They're just so...welcoming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的,如果我要造一个要塞,那我第一样要布置的东西就是十字架和钉在上面的死人.他们是那么的"热情好客"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheFort_0007E5C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A month? That long, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个月?有那么久了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! We've been together for a month now and I have a present for you to celebrate!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是! 我们已经在一起了一个月，我有一个礼物给你庆祝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversaryThi_000B4525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's been a month since we sealed our friendship! And I have a present for you to celebrate! I hope you like it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们已经封锁了友谊已经有一个月了！ 我有一个礼物给你庆祝！ 我希望你喜欢它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversaryThi_000A4964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's kind of corny and romantic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点老土，很浪漫
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversaryThi_000B4526_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully you'll like it enough to wear it because I want you to think of me every time you do and remember this:
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你会喜欢它，因为我希望你每次都能想起我，记住:
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversaryThi_000B4526_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hold the key to my heart and I love you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你握着我的心，我非常爱你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFAnniversaryThi_000B4526_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，维儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome. I hope you like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别客气 我希望你喜欢它
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're almost to the end aren't we? I mean to the battle at The Dam. I want to talk to you before we go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们马上就要去结束这一切么?我指去胡佛大坝上战斗.在你走之前我有话想对你说.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWFMQEndgameOther_000780AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, it's a little toy horse. When I saw it, I thought of you. I hope you like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿,给你这个小玩具马.我看到这个的时候就觉得你会喜欢它的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! That's amazing! Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,这个太赞了!太感谢你了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if we'll go back or not, Willow. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不清楚我们到底还能不能够回来,维儿. 看着办吧.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHomeMarkerNEW0_000A0EAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is for you. It's a lacey teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是给你的.一个带蕾丝边的泰迪熊.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look! It's a tiny teddy bear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看这个!这是一只迷你版的泰迪熊!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, it's a red toaster. Do you like it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你这个,一个红色的烤面包机.你喜欢么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, it's a bottle of perfume. I hope you like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你,这是一瓶子香水.我希望你会喜欢.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look! It's a giant panda bear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看!这是一个巨大的熊猫抱熊

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! That's amazing! Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊! 太棒了！ 非常感谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, it's the Sunset Sarsaparilla garden gnome. I want you to have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你这个,这是个夕阳沙士的花园矮人.我希望你能收着它.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢,这很特别.我非常喜欢.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Charisma] You're my girl, Willow, I won't forget you for one moment. Say you'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 具体说说看?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,你这个油嘴滑舌的家伙,我会这么做的.说不定对我们两个人来说会很有趣呢.我希望你知道我只会为你一个人这么做.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A0EBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a special present for you. I think you're going to really love this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一份特别的礼物要给你.我认为你会喜欢这个的!

ESP.ORIGINAL: A present? What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个礼物?会是什么呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDPRESENTforWILL_000A0EA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a special present for you. I think you're going to really love this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个特别的礼物给你 我想你会非常喜欢这个！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll give you some caps for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我会给你些瓶盖的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDImBrokeYES_000A277D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, Willow, not right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉维儿,现在不行

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦 好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDImBrokeNO_000A277E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this might help when you go in with him. It's up to you, but I find talking is sometimes better than whacking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，当你和他一起走的时候，这可能会有帮助.这取决于你，但我觉得谈话有时比发牢骚好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Silus_000A2780_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place looks exactly like I imagined it would: drunks, lights, hookers. It's perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里简直就是我梦想中的地方:酒鬼,光柱,妓女.太完美了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000A2786_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, New Vegas is why I came to the Mojave, I've been hearing stories about it for years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗,维加斯是我来到这片大沙漠的唯一理由.这么多年来我一直不断的听到有关他的故事
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000A2782_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to go to a casino, aren't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去赌场，不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000A2783_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lights are gorgeous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这灯光真赞
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000A2785_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interested in taking me out for a drink in one the casinos? That might be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有兴趣带我去赌场喝一杯吗?这可能是有趣的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_0010303D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, let's have some fun. What do you say? Let's go jump in the fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，让我们找点乐子.你说什么?我们去喷泉那儿跳吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000931C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you stuck one of us in that freezer. That was heartless. I hope I don't have to worry about what you'll do to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信,你居然停在了自由之城这个烂地方.真是让我伤心.我希望我不用担心你会对我做点什么(和谐)的事.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000777EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, want to go get a drink? I'm thirsty and Cass can always use more whiskey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，想去喝一杯吗?我很渴，卡斯总是可以喝更多的威士忌
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_0007780E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's talking about you, did you notice? Well, maybe they don't know it was you that did it, but they're talking about Mr. House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都在谈论你，你注意到了吗?也许他们不知道是你干的，但他们是在谈论豪斯先生
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000777EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Veronica gets a dress I want one too. Or maybe new shoes or a new hat. I don't know, something pretty. Please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果维罗妮卡得到一件衣服，我也想要一件.或者是新鞋或新帽子.我不知道，漂亮的东西.好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDScriptTim_000B0ABB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, did you hear that? Somebody's talking about Caesar being dead. You're a hero, just like I told you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你听到了吗?有人说凯撒死了.你是个英雄，就像我告诉你的那样!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_0007780F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you say, Boone? Let's have some fun while we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样,布恩?趁我们还在赌城赶紧去找点乐子吧.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedTheStrip_000884D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCaesarsTe_000A2788_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmpf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedCaesarsTe_000A4F3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, would you consider changing your clothes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,你有考虑过换件衣服吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Change my clothes? Do you know I killed the geckos that were used to make my jacket? I think that makes it pretty special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 改变我的衣服吗?你知道我杀了用来做夹克的壁虎吗?我觉得这很特别
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDLetsTalkClothe_000A278A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do, I'm confident the NCR can win this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确是这样,另外我确信NCR可以取得胜利.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I was never excited about getting involved in this war, but after everything we've seen...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我从来没有因为卷入这场战争而感到兴奋，但在我们看到的一切之后……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic009_000A3271_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Driving the legion out of the Mojave is the right thing to do. If I die, doing it, it would be for something worthwhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把军团赶出莫哈韦是正确的事.如果我死了，做这件事，那是值得的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic009_000A3271_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I want to see a Mojave free of both the Legion and the NCR. A truly independent New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我不想让军团或者是NCR染指莫哈维.一个真正独立的,真实的新维加斯.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been excited about getting involved in this war. But, I'm committed to supporting you. I'll do whatever it takes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未对卷入这场战争感到兴奋.但是，我决心支持你.我会不惜一切代价
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic053_000A3273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been excited about getting involved in this war. But, I'm committed to supporting you. I'll do whatever it takes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未对卷入这场战争感到兴奋.但是，我决心支持你.我会不惜一切代价
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic053_000AB407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am committed. I think Mr. House is the right choice for the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承诺.我想豪斯先生是莫哈韦的正确选择

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope it doesn't come to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们希望不用走到那一步吧.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I do! I don't want to die. But I do want to talk to you about the possibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我做!我不想死.但是我想和你谈谈这种可能性
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic012_000A4967_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even against the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指和NCR作对么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that is hard for me, but after everything we've seen? I agree, they shouldn't be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这对我来说很困难，但是在我们看到的一切之后?我同意，他们不应该在这里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic014_000A4969_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, this isn't what I want to talk to you about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，这不是我想跟你说的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowF_AWillowFTopic014_000A4969_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I haven't decided that, you don't need to worry about it. Why do you ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我还没决定那事你用不着担心那个,另外你为什么问我这个?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm from the NCR! I don't want to be shooting them and I don't want them to be shooting at me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自NCR!我不想让他们开枪，我也不希望他们向我开枪!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic005_000A496B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, oh my gosh, if family knew I was fighting against the NCR they would be so mad at me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊，如果家里人知道我在和NCR抗争，他们一定会对我发火的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic005_000A496B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I am. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我的确在这么做,为什么这么问?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm from the NCR! I don't want to be shooting them and I don't want them to be shooting at me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自NCR!我不想让他们开枪，我也不希望他们向我开枪!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic006_000A496D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, oh my gosh, if family knew I was fighting against the NCR they would be so mad at me! But at the same time, I've seen how things are here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊，如果家里人知道我在和NCR抗争，他们一定会对我发火的!但与此同时，我也看到了事情的发展
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic006_000A496D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, the NCR probably doesn't belong here, and I trust you, but I don't really want to get tangled up in this war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，NCR可能不属于这里，我相信你，但我真的不想卷入这场战争
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic006_000A496D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...please just tell me everything's going to be okay and that I'm not a bad person.
ESP.TRADUIT: …请告诉我一切都会好起来的，我不是坏人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, you need a drink! Let's go get you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,你需要喝一杯!让我帮你开一瓶酒吧.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! A drink. Let's do that. Have I ever told you I like whiskey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的!喝一杯.做一下。我有没有告诉过你我喜欢威士忌?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic007_000A4972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, everything is going to be okay and you aren't a bad person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,所有的事情都会好起来的而且我清楚的知道你并不是一个坏人.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I...I just needed to hear that. You're so sweet. My parents! The thought of them is just haunting me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我…我只是想听听.你如此甜美.我的父母!一想到他们，我就心烦意乱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic008_000A4973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, we all have to make hard choices sometimes, this is yours to make. I can't make it for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,我们有时候的确得做一些艰难的选择,但这次是你的选择.我不能替你来决定.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic009_000A4974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm just working with them for a while, why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我只是和他们一起工作一会,为什么这么问?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm not excited about getting involved in this war, and I wish we didn't have to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我对卷入这场战争并不感到兴奋，我希望我们不需要这样做
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic012_000A4978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I probably don't even need to say this, but if we have to get involved I'd rather fight for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不需要这么说，但如果我们要介入的话，我宁愿为NCR而战
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else (Let's you skip personal topics and unlocks items from them for you)
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个,没错..我的确发现那很有挑战性,,,所以求你停下吧...谢谢啊!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A50C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should ask Veronica to train you. She loves punching things. I'm sure she could teach you a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该问问维罗尼卡能否训练你.她就喜欢拿着些东西捅来戳去的.我打赌她能做的很好

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to go ask her about it right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就去问她
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDVeronicaTrng_000A83AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我肯定.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll try to behave. It'll be hard, though. I really don't like her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会努力表现的.不过,它会很难.我真的不喜欢她
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you standing there frozen like that? Let's get a move on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么像个雕塑一样的戳在这儿?咱们赶紧走吧!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatFrozen_000A6C60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation! Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射!好极了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRadsDialo_00063E83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You doing okay? Radiation! What a pain in the butt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么?辐射!真是个大麻烦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRadsDialo_00064FFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, getting a little worried here. Am I starting to glow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，有点担心.我开始发光了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRadsDialo_00064FF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you know, I always wondered what it would feel like to be a ghoul...Um, I think we might find out soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你知道，我一直想知道当一个食尸鬼会是什么感觉……嗯，我想我们很快就会知道的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedRadsDialo_00064FF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your leg?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的腿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you look at it for me? I don't think it's healing right. It's still bothering me a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我看看吗?我不认为这是治愈的权利.这仍然困扰着我很多
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFixMyLeg_000A749E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll look at it for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会给你看看。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think I can do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我觉得我做不来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFixMyLegNO_000A74A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该这样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFixMyLegTHANKS_000A74A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Go do it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,来吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A83AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait. Now's not a good time. Do it later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,现在不合适,晚点再说吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A83B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't like them very much. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我实在不怎么喜欢她,抱歉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I got it that wrong. Hmm. Well, I have something else you might like. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我弄错了..，我还有别的你想要的.这里
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A8972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想看看我的收藏品吗?我一直在谈论它，但还没有给你看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000A8972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing to be afraid of, Willow. I've got your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用不着害怕,维儿.有我保护着你呢.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does make me feel better, but I'm worried about you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我感觉好多了，但我也很担心你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentOpe_00064D06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me with you I'll come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想和我在一起，我会来的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentOpe_00064D06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to grab a bite to eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想抓点吃的么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's a great idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这主意不错
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFoodForWillow_000A8C56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you join me? It's not as much fun eating alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来吗？一个人吃东西无聊死了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFoodForWillow_000B0A9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course! I'm always hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!我总是饿
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFoodForWillow_000B0AA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do want you with me. Come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他的,我想让你跟我一起去看看他们会做些什么

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Let's get this over with. I hope we make it out of this free and alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧.我们把这件事做完.希望我们能从这个自由和充满活力的世界中解脱出来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentYes_000AA8BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you wait for me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,你为什么不在这里等我会儿呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll do that. I would have come with you gladly if that's what you'd wanted, but honestly it's a relief to stay out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,我会的.果这是你想要的，我很乐意和你一起去，但老实说，呆在这里是一种解脱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentWai_000AA8BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you got that off your chest, but I wasn't planning to go in there just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要现在不去那里就可以先不用管这些事儿了

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCROther_000AB481_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep my hands to myself while we're here. Even if there was anything good to pick up, I couldn't do it. They need everything they've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我会管好自己的手.就算是一个好东西孤零零的躺在那儿我也不会顺走他它,他们需要一切可以利用的东西.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCROther_000A3268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad we're helping out around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我们在这里帮忙
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCROther_000A3269_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you gonna be okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你没事吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCROther_000AD997_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR as far as the eye can see. You know, I feel right at home here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里都是NCR的士兵,你知道的,我在这里感觉很好
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNCROther_00073B22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're jealous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是嫉妒了吧!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I am!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRedLucyQS90Res_00076F52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not. But I don't like her and I'm concerned for you. She's a bitch !
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不是.我不喜欢她，我很关心你.是一个婊子!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRedLucyQS90Res_00076F53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're jealous!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你嫉妒!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, Major Knight! How ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨,大骑士!怎么了什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMajorKni_000ACDFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, Major, good to see ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，少校，很高兴见到你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMajorKni_000ADF60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, How are you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奈特少校,你今天过得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoMajorKni_000ADF61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I do not like being out here and I don't trust Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不喜欢在这里，我不相信凯撒
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentOpe_000AD0DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think we should go in there. This cannot be a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们不应该进去.不是个好主意
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentOpe_000AD0DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, I'm Willow. It looks like we'll be spending a lot of time together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨,我是维儿看来我们要花很多时间在一起了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToV1stli_000D558D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you miss your Dinky...oh, oops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赌五毛你会想你的大恐龙的.....oh,oops.(大概是维儿想活跃气氛结果冷场了吧）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToBooneG_000AD98F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could do anything at all right now what would it be? I'd take a shower. Doesn't that sound good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你现在可以做任何事情，那会是什么?我洗澡.起来不错,不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToBooneG_000AD990_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think you'll ever marry again, Boone? Maybe have kids? You'd make a great father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你还会再婚吗，布恩?也许有孩子吗?你会成为一个伟大的父亲
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToBooneG_000AD991_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you thirsty? I have an extra Nuka Cola if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们渴了吗？我有一个额外的核子可乐如果你想要的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToBooneG_000AD992_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you're with us Boone. I feel so safe with you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你和我们在一起，布恩.你在一起我感到很安全
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToBooneG_000AD993_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, I'm Willow. It looks like we're going to be spending a lot of time together. I hope we can be friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，我叫维儿，看来我们要花很多时间在一起。我希望我们能成为朋友
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB1stli_0007C8D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you planning to keep working with the legion or are you done with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算继续与军团合作，还是已经结束了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic010_000AD99C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a hero! I'm so proud of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个英雄！我为你感到骄傲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic010_000AD9A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和他们的事情到此结束了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so proud of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为你感到骄傲
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic013_000AD99E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, I plan to keep working with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩,我打算继续为他们工作.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic014_000AD9A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, like I said, you don't need to worry about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之,像我之前说过的,你用不着担心这个.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我相信你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic016_000ADF5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the asshole! He's here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是混蛋！他在这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDBennyAsshole_000ADF90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you are not really going to sleep with him! Just don't make me watch, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你真的不想和他睡觉！别让我看，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDBennySeduction_000ADF91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he wears a checkered coat and that I should look for him in Novac. That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他穿着一件格子衫,所以我得在诺瓦附近找这样的家伙

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see a trip to Novac in our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了我们未来的诺瓦克之旅
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000ADF95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he wears a checkered coat and I've heard he's in New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他穿着一件格子衫,而且我听说他就在维加斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Vegas! We could kick his ass and then go see the sights!
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯!我们可以踢他的屁股，然后去看风景!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000ADF96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he wears a checkered coat. That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他穿着一件格子衫,仅此而已

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help all I can. What an asshole. Him, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽我所能帮助你的.真是个混蛋啊...呃,不是说你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000ADF97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AD98B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANPC_HELLO_000AD995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not the hat, Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,根本不是那回事.你不需要因为唱歌道歉的.我喜欢你唱歌的样子

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is! I'm sure it helps. But I still need my hat. I do have another one just like it to give you, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是!我相信它可以帮助.我仍然需要我的帽子.过，我确实有另一个像它一样给你的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1438_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to take it and try it out, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你拿去试试，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1438_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are carrying two identical hats?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,别在意.我根本不在意.别让我打扰你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, well, that's a long story. I don't know that I want to tell it or that you want to hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，说来话长.不知道我想告诉你，或者你想听
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B143B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我还以为你会很亢奋呢

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B143D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不讨厌，我喜欢你唱歌的样子，我希望你经常唱一下

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, do whatever you want. But, I'd try the hat if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，做你想做的.是，如果我是你，我会试试这顶帽子
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B143F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, come on, Willow, we're best friends. Tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,拜托了,维儿我们可是最好的朋友啊.告诉我把.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It started before I left home. I wasn't supposed to come to New Vegas alone. My best friend Bethie, she was supposed to be here with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切开始在我离开家之间.原来我并不是打算一个人来新维加斯的.我最好的朋友贝茜,应该和我一起旅行的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1443_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We spent months getting ready to go. My dad made us the radios, we collected gear we wanted to take, we talked to caravan guards about routes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们用了几个月来准备好出行.我爸爸帮我做了这一对无线电,我们收拾了所有能收拾的装备,我们也和商队护卫约好了路程.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1443_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's when things went wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后事情就开始出岔子了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1443_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something happened with one of the caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中的一个商队发生了什么事了么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brian, one of the guards we talked to, liked Bethie right away and started coming 'round to see her. She never said anything about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱恩,这个我们聊到过的守卫,似乎喜欢上了贝茜并且开始和她见面.她从来都没告诉过我这个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1445_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I kept talking about our trip, finishing up plans and getting ready to go. About two weeks before we were supposed to leave Bethie disappeared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我继续聊了聊我们的旅程,制定了一个计划并且准备好出发了.但是在我们打算启程的两个星期前,贝茜消失了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1445_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poof! She was just...gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气>她直接就消失了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1445_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She ran off and left you? What a terrible thing to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她逃走了并且离开了你?真是件可怕的事啊!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I was devastated. She'd been my best friend since we were little kids. I couldn't believe she'd leave without any kind of goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,我遭受了不小的打击.我们两个都是小毛头的时候她就是最好的朋友.我简直不能相信她连再见都没说一声就走了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She took off with Brian didn't she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她和布莱恩已经出发离开这儿了不是么.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, she left with Brian on one of his caravan routes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,她和布莱恩随着另一条商队路线离开了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B1449_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what did you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以,你做了什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I decided to chase her. It took me about a week to finish getting ready and then I left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决定追上她,这大约花了我一个星期的时间来准备,准备完之后我立刻出发了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew where Brian's caravan was headed so that's where I went, but he left the caravan and I never did find her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这个叫布莱恩的家伙藏在哪里,所以我直接去了那儿,不过我到的时候他早已离开我也没有找到贝茜.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second hat was supposed to be hers. We thought matching hats would be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一顶帽子应该是她的,我们曾经觉得两人戴同样的帽子会非常有意思.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, the hats aren't really that identical anymore. The one I've given you is nice and clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是,这顶帽子和原来的比变了很多.我给她的是一顶不错而且干净的帽子.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hasn't been torn up by geckos or gunshots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是帽子还没有被子弹或者蜥蜴完全毁了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B144C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a new recipe for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有新的食谱给我么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! This one's more complex. I call it Willow's Mantis Casserole. The only new ingredient it uses is Mantis Leg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的!这个已经完成了.我管它叫维儿的螳螂煲.这次新加的食材就是螳螂的腿啦.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock02_000B144F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mantis meat gives it a very rich flavor. It's tasty. I think you're going to like it a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些螳螂肉给整道菜带来了非常浓厚的韵味.尝起来棒极了.我觉得你会非常喜欢的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock02_000B144F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have another new recipe for me? How many are you planning to create?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有新食谱要给我?你到底准备发明多少新食谱啊...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this will be last one, but I've had a lot of fun making up the new recipes for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这是最后一步了,但是在发明新食谱的时候我可找了不少乐子啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock03_000B1452_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, the new ingredient I'm adding isn't so fun to gather, but it tastes so great it's going to be worth it. It requires Cazador eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外,新食谱需要的食材收集起来会很"有趣",但是当你尝到它的时候绝对会觉得物有所值,所以弄几个大毒蜂的蛋给我吧.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock03_000B1452_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know, but they taste so good. I'm calling it Willow's Cazador Egg Puff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道,我知道,但是它尝起来非常美味啊.我管这个叫维尔的大黄蜂蛋卷.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock03_000B1452_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are going to get tough around here, really Hardcore. Be prepared. (Set Essential)
ESP.TRADUIT: 情况开始变得糟糕起来了J.T,做好准备,会很危险的(JT不死)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTIsHardcoreEs_000B211A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发牢骚.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTIsHardcoreEs_000B211B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself, J.T. Things are going to get tough. You could get hurt. (Set Unessential)
ESP.TRADUIT: 看你自己，J.T. 事情将变得艰难 你可能会受伤 （设置不重要）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, Fancy Lad Snack Cakes. One of your favorites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧,奇想小子蛋糕,你最喜欢的小点心之一

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B324D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that Raul likes sweets a lot and he seems so sad, would you consider giving it to him instead? It would mean a lot to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道劳尔很喜欢吃甜食，他看起来很伤心，你会考虑把它给他吗?这对我来说意义重大
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000884D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some GumDrops for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些口香糖给你

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B324F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got you some Bubblegum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你找到一些泡泡糖

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B3251_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some Junk Food. You want it, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一些垃圾食品,你最想要的,对不?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I do. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我这样做 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B3253_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a good looking dog you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一只很棒的狗

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_WLPTheBigGuyTop_000B4C1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. That's an odd response. Most people are proud of their animals. You do like him don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃,好奇怪的回应.大多数人都为他们的动物伙伴感到骄傲.你是真的喜欢他的对么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_000B4C1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is he smart? He seems well trained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他聪明么?他看上去训练的很不错

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Big Guy [01021615] (mod) Quest : ([01019D71]AWillowLikesPlayerQuest) She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\AWillowLik_AWillowLikesPla_000B4C1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. What's going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩?怎么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you when we first started traveling together that it wouldn't be for very long, but I'm having so much fun with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，当我们开始一起旅行的时候，不会很长时间，但是我和你在一起很开心
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, you've become very special to me. I think of you as a friend, as a best friend actually, and I don't want to leave you or the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，你对我来说已经变得很特别了.把你当作朋友，实际上是最好的朋友，我不想离开你或莫哈韦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you say? Should we make it official? Shall I stay and keep following you around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你说呢?我们应该让它正式吗?要我留下来跟你走吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F02_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now's a bad time, Willow. We'll have to do it later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不是个好时机,维儿.晚点我们再做那个

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but don't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,但不要忘记
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have something important to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是有什么重要的事儿要告诉我?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you when we first started traveling together that it wouldn't be for very long, but I'm having so much fun with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，当我们开始一起旅行的时候，不会很长时间，但是我和你在一起很开心
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, you've become very special to me. I think of you as a friend, as a best friend actually, and I don't want to leave you or the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，你对我来说已经变得很特别了.把你当作朋友，实际上是最好的朋友，我不想离开你或莫哈韦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you say? Should we make it official? Shall I stay and keep following you around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你说呢?我们应该让它正式吗?要我留下来跟你走吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Why don't you stay. It's working out well for me too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,为什么不呢?完全没问题

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! We'll be best friends forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!我们将永远是最好的朋友!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I very much want you to stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常想要有你在身边

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! We'll be best friends forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!我们将永远是最好的朋友!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, you can stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,你可以留下

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! We'll be best friends forever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了!我们将永远是最好的朋友!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B4F0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was very sorry to hear about your wife, Boone. If you ever feel like talking to someone or ever need anything I'd love to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到你妻子布恩的事，我很难过.果你想和某人说话，或者需要任何我想要帮助的事情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB2ndli_0007C8DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, I was born and raised in the NCR; in Klamath. I'm guessing you're going to keep quiet and not tell me anything about yourself. Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，我是在NCR出生和长大的;在克拉马斯语.猜你要保持安静，不要告诉我任何关于你自己的事情.吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB3rdli_0007CBCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're awful good, Boone. I can see why they wanted you in the 1st Recon. Maybe if we get a chance sometime you could give me some tips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的好,布恩.知道他们为什么要你在第一次侦察.果我们有机会，你可以给我一些建议吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB4thli_0007C8E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, Boone, you are just too quiet. If I confess to you that I hate Caesar and his legion will you talk to me? Because it's true. I do hate him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，布恩，你太安静了.如果我向你承认我讨厌凯撒和他的军团，你会跟我说话吗？ 因为这是真的.我讨厌他
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB5thli_0007CBD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a surprise for you, Willow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个惊喜给你,维儿!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，它是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHasPencils_000B7ABC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my strong suit, but okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的强项，但没关系
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCbTowResp01a_000B80B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe some other time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有些时候
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCbTowResp02a_000B80B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I do best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我最擅长的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCbTowResp06a_000B80B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能完成那个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCbTowResp07a_000B80B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我想.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\maleuniquecraigboone\AWillowANP_ANPCbTowResp08a_000B80B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look! I've been doing some scavenging myself and I've got 50 pencils for you. You'll never run out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧!我也试试当了一回破烂王,而且我搞到了50支铅笔给你.你再也不用担心了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Thank you so much! I love them. It's one of the best presents I have ever gotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,太谢谢你了!我真喜欢他们...我是我所得到的最好的礼物之一
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B9484_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It reminds me of my twelfth birthday, when my best friend, Bethie, went all over town and found me 12 bottles of Wonderglue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我想起了12岁的生日,当我最好的朋友,Bethie, 走遍了整个镇子给我找来了整整12瓶万能胶..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B9484_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It must have taken you so long to find all of these. I appreciate it so much. You'll just never know how much. I love them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这肯定需要很久才办得到.我真的非常感动.你真的不知道....天啊我太爱他们了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000B9484_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. You're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,让过去的过去吧,你真是个好人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪~
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTNevermind_000BC265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Lord Death Perk) You'd make an easy kill, that's why. You should be wearing proper armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: (死亡之主)你现在是个无比脆弱的目标,这就是为啥你需要一件更厚实更好的护甲.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic017_000BC2B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Cherchez La Femme) I'd hate to see any part of you injured. You should have proper armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: (你是百合)我讨厌看到你的身体上留下任何伤痕,所以你需要一件更好的护甲.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic018_000BC2B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Lady Killer) Willow, every lovely part of your body is too precious to risk. You need proper armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: (师奶杀手)维儿,你完美的躯体上的每个"零件"都太宝贵了.你需要件更好的护甲

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Ya, think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是嘛?你真这么想?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDTopic019_000BC2B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's what I really want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,那才是我真正想要的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, goodbye. I don't know what else to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，再见。我不知道还能说什么
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYes1_000C0A06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm sorry. I don't want you to go. Please stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,抱歉抱歉..我不想你离开,请留下吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll stay. Please don't do that again. I don't want to leave you...ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会留下的.但别再这么神经了.我很不舍得离开你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYes2_000C0A07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's what I really want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,那才我真正想要的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, well, thanks for helping me find Beauty, and goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,那么,谢谢帮我找到步枪,再见.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYesPreBF_000C0A0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want you to go. Please stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,抱歉抱歉..我不想你离开,请留下吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我会暂时留下
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFiringYesPreBF_000C0A0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, tell me what you want me to do and we'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,先告诉我看看你想让我做些什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want enough supplies to make enough coffee to last me for a month. Here. I'd already written up the list in case you showed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想搞到足够的补给好让我能有整整一个月的咖啡喝..瞧,我都已经列了个单子准备好让你检阅了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFiredRehi_000C0A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, will you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,你会帮我么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDFiredRehi_000C0A0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. You'll see me again when I have everything on that list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然.等我搞到单子上的所有东西时我会再来找你的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000C0A16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it! I'm not getting all that stuff for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧醒醒!我可不是你的奴隶

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might still be here if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会再在这里呆一阵子,如果你改变主意的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000C0A15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got all the ingredients you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我弄到所有你想要的材料了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow! Look at that! Well, I guess you were serious then, so I'll come with you like I promised I would.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇,瞧那个,太棒了!好吧,我猜你的确是认真的,那么我会像我所保证的那样跟着你的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000C0A1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, I just wanted to come by and see if you were still here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好,我只是顺道过来看看你是不是还在这里

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm still here. I haven't had any luck finding anyone to travel with yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我还在这里..我还没那个运气碰到另一个可以一起旅行的人..
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000C0A1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is gorgeous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方可真华丽啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedL38Pent_0009B0B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's, uh, too bad the Suite doesn't look like this, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个,额,套房看起来不像这样实在是太可惜了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedL38Pent_000A4C57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready, hon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了,亲爱的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDDateDinnersRea_000C0A24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you do something for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我做些事儿么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDDoSomethingFor_000C1E32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop fighting.(Debug to stop combat greeting but should stop enemy hunting if you're not in combat.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止战斗.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCombatShutDown_000C522C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take everything I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把所有的蜥蜴肉都拿走.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Turn off Radiation comments and mask>
ESP.TRADUIT: <关闭辐射提示并且摘下面具>

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([01001656]AWillowF) Willows Wheel and more dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Turn on Radiation comments and mask>
ESP.TRADUIT: <关闭辐射提示并且摘下面具>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, come here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿，来这儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDDoSomethingCom_000D137F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱你

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爱你
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D166B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道.我也爱你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000DC284_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come even closer. I want a kiss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过来过来，亲一下

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, I like that idea!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我喜欢这个主意！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D1383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, anytime lover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，随时随地，宝贝
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000DC285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found something for you to put into your collection. I think it's pretty special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到个东西，送给你吧。我感觉这很特别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D1384_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a surprise for you! Remember you asked for a dress like Veronica or something pretty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个惊喜给你！还记得我像维罗尼卡的漂亮衣服吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! You have something for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！你也会给我嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D1665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a new outfit for you to try on if you want. I think it will look great on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个新的衣服给你，如果你穿一下。我相信会更好看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds fun. Let's do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错。来吧，试试.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D1667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but I might need a hand getting into it. You up for that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，先让我看一下，好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D1668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got something for you. I saw it and immediately thought of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有东西给你。我一看见它，马上就想到了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. That's so thoughtful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢.你太体贴啦
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWillowDWillowTop_000D166A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you're done eating. I'm ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你吃饱了。我准备走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFoodForWillowD_000D1DBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was just what I needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我需要的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDFoodForWillowD_000D1DBA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Here you go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在我这，过来

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. This is it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。就是它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. Here it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm....Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额....死亡爪.
