ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedDeathclaw_0008F251_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, you can do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题的,你可以做到的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedDeathclaw_00092EDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *nervous humming*
ESP.TRADUIT: *紧张的呼吸声*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedDeathclaw_0008F253_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *smooch*
ESP.TRADUIT: *么么*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAdHocKisses_000D3040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *smooch*
ESP.TRADUIT: *么么*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDAdHocKisses_000D4CE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have one piece for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一片蜥蜴肉给你.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDGeckoMeatforWi_000D4CE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess we have that in common then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们达成共识了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTOwResp1_00060135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heck no, Veronica! Punch everything that gets in our way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好样的,维罗妮卡!把任何挡着我们路的家伙都活活揍死把.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_000D4CEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feeling guilty? Did you punch one of us by mistake?
ESP.TRADUIT: 觉得内疚?你不会是把自己人当做敌人给揍了吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_000D4CEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Veronica, I like you just the way your are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,维罗妮卡,我还是喜欢原汁原味的你.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_000D4CED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, not today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,至少不是今天.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_000D558E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: blah
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTOwResp02_000D5590_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klamath. In Oregon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉马斯.在俄勒冈州
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klamath. I traveled through California to get here. It took me about two years. I stopped a lot along the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉马斯.我穿过了加利福尼亚州才到达这里.因为我经常在旅途中停下来,这差不多用了我两年的时间.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_00096B74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, me too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,我也要!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0005A664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And somewhere to go in the dress! That'd be so great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后穿着裙子去随便什么地方玩!这会非常棒的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, and maybe some pretty shoes to go with it! And maybe a great hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,也许几双漂亮的鞋子来配裙子!也许一个好看的帽子也可以.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: blah
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does everyone always say that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么每个人都这么说?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([01029D30]AWillowANPC) Assorted NPCs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\AWillowANPC_ANPCvTowResp3_000D5596_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because it's true. We should do something about it. Get you something that feels and looks good. Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这是事实啊.我们应该做些改变.给你找些用起来舒服而且好看的东西.不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToV3rdRe_000D5598_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to keep quiet when we're walking around. I like the peace and quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走的时候我想你最好保持安静。我喜欢安静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh...okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterToggle_000D5E35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，行
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDChatterToggle_000D5E36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can chatter while we're walking around if you like. It's kind of quiet around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别的的时候你可以聊天，如果你喜欢.但这里需要安静.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been thinking I'd like to create a couple of new recipes based on critters from here in the Mojave. Good idea, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想啊,如果我发明几道由莫哈维本土生物做成的新菜,这会是个不错的主意吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll want to keep cooking if I'm going to be creating new recipes, so that would mean regular shopping trips. That'd be up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想一直保持烹饪状态来测试一下我的新菜谱,所以购物的事情都得靠你来完成了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSQwestsideFG_000D63F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can't turn back now. I have to go in. You can wait out here if you want to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在可没法回头了,我得继续前进.你可在这儿等我如果你乐意的话.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to do that. I'm no coward, but I don't trust him, not at all. If you want me with you I'll come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢做这种事,我不是懦夫,只是我根本不相信他,如果你想让我一起来我还是会加入你的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCaesarsTentOpe_000D8099_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a new recipe for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有新的食谱给我么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you taking me shopping so much I've been able to do some experimenting and I've created a new recipe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你带我去买东西,我用买的东西做了一些实验而且发明了一些新食谱!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock01_000A0EA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've only used one new ingredient though, because we have to keep track of so many already. It's Ant Stew!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这次只用了一新材料,因为我们已经找了这么多种材料了.这次的是蚂蚁煲.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock01_000A0EA6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, it sounds kind of boring, but this is the first time I've tried to make something up on my own. I think it came out pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道,这听起来有点无聊,但是这是我第一次尝试自己设计的食谱啊.我觉得它会非常美味的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDRecipeUnlock01_000A0EA6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like you to stop singing for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你暂时不要再唱歌了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,我可以做那个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSingingToggle_00064D02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! I'd love to!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了!我非常喜欢这个!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDSingingToggle_00064D03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to start singing again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能重新开始唱歌.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you cook something for us at the stove?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能用火炉为我们煮点东西么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'd love to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我非常乐意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHouseStoveCook_000D809F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'd love to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然,我非常乐意.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHouseStoveCook_000A803D_1.ogg
Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookingCampfir_000E3AE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了.走吧
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDShoppingLeave_000E3AE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. while you are following me I don't want you to attack anything. At all. Understood?
ESP.TRADUIT: JT 你跟着我的时候不要攻击。明白了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTStayNOAttack_000EB610_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark, bark!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪，汪
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : J.T. [01046B54] (mod) Quest : ([0106F2E9]AWillowJT) JTs Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowDogsVoice\AWillowJT_AWJTStayNOAttack_000EB611_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. I'd like you to fight with me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.跟我一起上

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoOldLadie_000AC54D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, how are you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奈特少校,你今天过得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoOldLadie_000AD6A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi,how ya doin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨, 你过得怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoHiThere_000AC549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, how are you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奈特少校,你今天过得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoHiThere_000AC54A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDResptoHiThere_000AC548_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't cook anything. We don't have what I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是什么都能烹饪的啦.我们手头没有材料啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDCookingCampfir_00102A73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see what you've scavenged lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你最近整理的东西吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了,随便看.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTrade5_00102A77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boone, you still look lost. If I can help at all, just say the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩,你还是看起来很失落啊.如果我能帮你任何忙只要说一声就行了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToB4thRe_00074F4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <humming>
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼小调>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDHouseCookingSi_0008088A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! I bet this is where they test the eye lasers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦!我赌五毛这就是他们测试激光的地方.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1HVLaserEyes_001055B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's not to like about a place that has a giant statue to greet people when they come into town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁会不喜欢一个有着巨大恐龙雕像来欢迎你的镇子啊
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_001055B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm worried about those legion guys out in Nelson. What if they attack Novac? It'll be awful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点担心那些驻扎在纳尔逊的军团了,如果他们来进攻诺瓦克怎办?我有点害怕啊!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_000743CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much for helping to get the legion out of Nelson. I'm sure all of Novac is grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你帮忙把军团赶出纳尔逊.我想整个诺瓦克的镇民都会很感激你的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_000881F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So now that the NCR is occupying Nelson, Novac should be safe, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在NCR占领了纳尔逊,诺瓦克应该会安全了吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe Boone could come with us when you're done helping him. He's so depressed. It'd probably be good for him to get away from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许在你帮完布恩的忙之后他会愿意和你一起旅行呢?他看起来这么的沮丧,也许离开这块伤心地是对他最好的帮助.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00076F46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like it here. Maybe it's because I grew up in a motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这儿.也许是因为我在汽车旅馆长大的缘故.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_0007C2FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it here. I know, I know. It's dumpy and little. But it's so cozy and homey. Plus it's got a giant dinosaur. It's hard to top that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这儿.我知道,我知道.这听起来有点蠢啊.但是这里又舒服又像家啊.另外这里还有只大恐龙啊.这个绝对是最赞的啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_0007DA63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if No-bark's around today. He's always fun to talk to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想今天"疯嘴"是不是在附近呢.和他聊天一直挺有意思的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00076F49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we go up in Dinky sometime just to look at the view?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能爬到那只大恐龙的顶上去看看风景么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00076F47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, our motel sign it had a couple of pine trees on it. We didn't have anything as interesting as a big dinky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我家里的汽车旅馆门口有两颗松树.我们可没有像大恐龙这么有趣的招牌.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_0007C300_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe after I've seen the Mojave I'll come back here to live for awhile. Wouldn't it be fun to stay in one of the little bungalows at the motel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许在见识过莫哈维之后我会回到这里,并且在这里住下.住在汽车旅馆的一间平房里挺有趣的,不是么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_0007C301_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanna have some fun! Wanna go Brahmin tipping? You'll have to do the tipping though, I can never get the Brahmin to fall over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想去找点乐子!想去弄翻一只双头牛吗?不过你得来弄翻它,我从来都没有成功的弄翻过.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00080597_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so glad we fixed up the bungalow. I love that pink bird we found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我们修好了这间平房.我最喜欢我们找到的这只粉红色的鸟了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_0006D29F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you do right, like some other men do. Get out of here, give me some money too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不像其他男人那样做呢?离开这里，给我一些钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00098865_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *sings with no words*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哼哼*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00098866_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *hums*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_00098867_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How lucky can one girl be? I kissed him and he kissed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个女孩有多幸运？ 我吻了他，他吻了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_000A4F3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How lucky can one girl be? I kissed her and she kissed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个女孩有多幸运？ 我吻了她，她吻了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedNovac_000A4F3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads? You're going after heads? Actual human heads. I hope that's something you're planning to carry yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 元首？ 你正在追逐头部？ 实际的人头。 我希望这是你打算带着自己的东西
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1McCarranBoun_001055B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I like it here! It reminds me of my family's motel back home. Maybe we could stay in one of the bungalows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我喜欢这里！ 这让我想起我家的汽车旅馆回家.也许我们可以留在其中一间平房里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Novac2_0007E5B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is...impressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是令人印象深刻的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedLegate_0007E5B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like the legion might actually be able to win, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来军团实际上可能会赢，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedLegate_000743C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: *嗯
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedLegate_000743C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pfft. And people think the NCR is difficult!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘁,人们还以为NCR会有所不同呢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RamosGreetin_001055BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After seeing Nipton there is no way I will ever think of the legion as silly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在见识了尼普顿的暴行之后.我永远都会觉得军团是一帮大傻X.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_001055C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica, you have been underground too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡,你在兄弟会的地下掩体待的时间太长了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica, I'm sorry, I can't laugh with you about the legion. I don't find them very funny. Okay, maybe those skirts are funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡,我很抱歉,我不觉得军团的笑话很好笑.好吧,也许一帮穿裙子的男人的确挺搞笑的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder what's next. This place is crazy. So far we've seen a ghoul in a wig, a human who's convinced he's a ghoul and now, demons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在想下一个是什么.这地方已经彻底疯了.我们刚刚看到了一个戴假发的僵尸,一个以为自己是僵尸的人类,现在又来了一堆"恶魔"!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RepConnCrazy_001055C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought the other guy was the crazy one, but demons? He can't be serious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得其他家伙已经够神经了,但是"恶魔"?这太扯淡了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RepConnCrazy_001055C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sure hope we can do something to help Rex.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们肯定能做点什么来帮雷克斯复原的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Rex_001055C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Nope, can't think of anything interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩...不,我想不出什么有趣的事情.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FA09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up with a big family too. I have five brothers. We lived above ground though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个大家庭里长大.我有5个兄弟.虽然我们都挤在旅馆的二楼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_00096B75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really like Boone, but he's still so sad about his wife. I don't think he'll ever notice me. Don't say anything to him, though, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我挺喜欢布恩的,但是他任然沉浸在他妻子的伤痛中,我觉得他永远都不会留意到我.额，别告诉他我说了这个,行么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FCE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Nope, can't think of anything interesting. Oh, wait, Cass has been drinking again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩...不,还是想不出什么有意思的事.哦,等等,卡斯又开始酗酒了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raul seems kinda depressed. I wish we could do something for him. I think he needs a woman, but maybe he'd take some Fancy Lad Snack Cakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳尔看起来总是有点淡淡的忧伤啊.我想我们能帮他点忙.我觉得他需要一个女人来安慰他一下,也许几盒奇想小子蛋糕也可以.(注:劳尔喜欢甜食)
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FCE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and the Courier. We finally...you know. I'm so in love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和信使. 我们最后终于.....你懂的,步入了爱河.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FA08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know Red Lucy at the Thorn, right? Ugh, I can't stand her, but don't tell, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道红露西么?荆棘城那个.额,我简直受不了她,别告诉她这个,好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know Red Lucy at the Thorn, right? She's so sexy. I'm really worried about it, but don't tell, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道荆棘城的红露西对吧?她可真是性感,对此我还非常担忧呢.别告诉她这个,好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007F9FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. House is a computer! Well, okay, maybe not, but when you talk to him he's just a picture on a screen. There's no way to tell if he's real or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯先生是一台电脑!额,好吧,也许不是,但是你只能和他在屏幕上的投影说话,也没法确定他到底是不是电脑.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FA06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out Mr. House was just this helpless old guy crammed inside a box. We found him tucked away inside the Lucky 38. It was kind of sad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来神秘的豪斯先生只是一个靠着机器维持生命,且手无缚鸡之力的老头子,并且躲藏在幸运38赌场里.真为他感到小小悲伤啊.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Willow [01000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDTimedzToVeroni_0007FA07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's still alive! Can we help him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还活着!我们能帮助他么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1Anders_001055CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, this one is definitely the craziest. Too bad he and Antler can't come with us. They'd be interesting travel companions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,这家伙绝对是最疯狂的一个了.他和安特勒不能和我们一起上路实在太可惜了.他们让旅途很有意思的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RepConnCrazy_001055CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like him, and Antler too. They're crazy, but it's too bad they can't come with us, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这家伙,安特勒也是.他们很疯狂,不能带他们一起上路实在太可惜了.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01001657]AWillowD) Willows General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\NVWillow.esp\WillowsVoice\AWillowD_AWDx1RepConnCrazy_001055D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Wish List...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的愿望清单

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start up quest for adding plants and mailbox and flamingo to the bungalow. Banana Yucca Plants
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务开始，给小平房购买邮箱，种植大土蕉和火烈鸟
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 1 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Xander Roots
ESP.TRADUIT: 山德根
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 2 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cave Fungus
ESP.TRADUIT: 洞穴蘑菇
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 3 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Broc Flowers
ESP.TRADUIT: 锦缎花
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 4 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mailbox
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮箱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 5 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flamingo
ESP.TRADUIT: 火烈鸟
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 6 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go back to bungalow
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到小平房
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 7 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find some cave fungus to put into the planter inside the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找一些洞穴蘑菇，种植在屋内花盆里.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find two Broc Flower plants to put into the planters outside the door of the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找两朵锦缎花,种植在平房外花盆里.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find three Xander Root plants to put into the planters outside the door of the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找三份山德根,种植在平房外花盆里.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find two Banana Yucca plants to put into the planters outside the door of the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找两株大土蕉种植在平房外花盆里.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a Mailbox for the front of the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找一个邮箱,放在平房外

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find something special to decorate the outside of the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找一些特别的东西装饰一下平房的外表

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the bungalow and install the new improvements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到平房并且安装所有的新物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rock 'Em, Sock 'Em Willow
ESP.TRADUIT: 搏击玫瑰

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest to train Willow in Unarmed
ESP.TRADUIT: 设法给维儿培训徒手格斗
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 1 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest Completed
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务完成
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Help Willow get Unarmed Training so that she feels comfortable fighting with something other than her gun. You can do this by giving her skillbooks or magazines or by finding someone to train her.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选) 帮维儿进行一些徒手搏击的训练,直到她觉得挥起小拳头来比用枪还舒服为止.你可以通过给她技能书与杂志,甚至找个教练的方式来达成.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may give Willow Unarmed training if your Unarmed skill is above 50.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的格斗能力超过50,就可以亲自调教她了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow can receive Unarmed Training from Ranger Andy, but only when you are receiving training from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿的教练可以是游骑兵安迪,但你必须也在那里一起学习.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica can train Willow, but only if Veronica is also one of your followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗尼卡可以教她,但V妹必须首先是你的队友.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow can receive Unarmed Training from Lucius, but only when you are receiving training from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿可以接受卢卡斯的训练,但你必须也在那里一起受训.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Train Willow until she has maxed out her Unarmed skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)训练维儿的徒手技能到达100

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby Needs Some Coffee
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贝儿需要一些咖啡

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player knows about quest but hasn't taken it yet
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家知道任务但尚未接受
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 1 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: To rehire Willow Player must go get coffee ingredients for Willow
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新雇用维儿必须为她找到咖啡的原料
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 5 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player has the ingredients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家有配料
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: rehire Willow
ESP.TRADUIT: 重新雇佣维儿
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve Nuka-Star Coffee ingredients for Willow. Return to her when you have collected all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为维儿寻找所有制备维儿的星核克咖啡所需要的材料.当你得到后就去找她.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You've found all the ingredients for Willow. Return with them to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜!你找齐了材料,现在去找维儿吧.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Invisible/blinky weapon management
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐蔽/闪亮的武器管理

ESP.ORIGINAL: Timer for cooking at bungalow stove

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kyle and Kenny appear at The Raided Farmstead carrying Moira and Beauty and then travel to the the Viper Camp on Hwy 95. They appear in Stage 2 which is when the Objective is shown to the player and the quest also is revealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯尔和肯尼出现在摧毁农庄带着莫伊拉、美丽、然后前往毒蛇营的95号公路 他们出现在第2阶段，当目标显示给玩家，任务也被揭示

ESP.ORIGINAL: Track down the guys who took Willow's belongings. Retrieve her rifle, her teddy bear and her doll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪那些打劫了维儿的败类,夺回步枪,还有毛熊和玩具们!

ESP.TRADUIT: 最好的朋友

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest Completed
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务完成
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 100 Index : 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Willow to like you so much that she wants to be your best friend forever (BFF). This point is reached when you've done a few specific tasks for her and have gained 100 points towards making her happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让维儿成为你的挚友.前提是100点认可度及一些特别的考验.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk further to Willow about Chester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问维儿更多切斯特的消息

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Novac area to find Chester. A ghoul Willow calls "The Big Guy" may have him and is there searching for a group of ghouls. The Big Guy is tall and wears a cowboy hat with a feather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去诺瓦附近寻找切斯特的下落.一个叫做"大个子"的正在找同胞的僵尸手里也许有他.大个子很高,并且戴着一顶有羽毛的牛仔帽.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want more from Willow than just her friendship. Continue making her happy and you may get your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不仅仅是想成为维儿的朋友.继续让她快乐下去也许你就会.....

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just being friends with Willow has its rewards. Be nice to her and nice things may happen to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先试着好好的和维儿做朋友吧,做一个好人,也许好事就会降临.

ESP.ORIGINAL: To move on to BFFs, you must also complete one special task that will show Willow how much you like her. There are three choices available to you. You may also give her gifts. See note in your Pipboy for details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了发展成挚友,你必须同样完成一个特别的考验来证明给维儿看你是真的很喜欢她.你可以有三个选择.并且你一样可以继续送礼给她.检查你PDA里的更多信息.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be able to figure out the task by thinking about the things you've learned about her so far through dialogue with her and others and by reading her journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你和她长久以来共处中所学到,谈到,听到的东西中,甚至她的日记中,你也许可以搞清楚这些挑战该怎么完成

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should expect to be friends with Willow for a couple of days before you become BFFs with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你们的关系更进一步之前至少要做一阵子普通的朋友

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You've just completed one of the required tasks to become BFF's with Willow. Once you have 100 points all you have to do is wait for Willow to move the quest on to the next phase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你,现在你达成了成为挚友所需要的挑战之一.一旦你得到100点的印象分,剩下你要做的就是等待维儿给出任务的下一步指示

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You've just completed one of the required tasks to become BFF's with Willow. Once you have 100 points all you have to do is wait for Willow to move the quest on to the next phase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你,现在你达成了成为挚友所需要的挑战之一.一旦你得到100点的印象分,剩下你要做的就是等待维儿给出任务的下一步指示

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You've just completed one of the required tasks to become BFF's with Willow. Once you have 100 points all you have to do is wait for Willow to move the quest on to the next phase.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've given Willow the 100th piece of gecko meat. Be sure to talk to her about it.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't count on it
ESP.TRADUIT: 别太依赖这个.

ESP.TRADUIT: 我的回答是:不

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Pencil Challenge Unlocked!
Willow would love to have a backpack full of pencils. Are you up to the challenge of finding 50 pencils for her?
Beware! If you pursue this challenge you will be rewarded with both quest points from Willow and a perk.
***If you have pencils in your inventory at the start of the challenge and you don't receive update messages at 10, 20, etc like you should drop the pencils and pick them up again in order for the game to count them correctly. Also, be sure to take all 50 pencils to Willow at one time at the end of the challenge.***
ESP.TRADUIT:
铅笔挑战已经解锁!
维儿非常乐意储存一些铅笔.你愿意为他收集50支铅笔来完成挑战吗?
注意!如果你完成了这个挑战你可以提升维儿的好感度并且得到一个额外PERK
***如果你在开始挑战之前背包里已经存有10支以上铅笔而游戏并未显示挑战进度提示最好重新把铅笔扔下在重新捡起,来让游戏可以记录挑战进程.另外请在收集到全部50支铅笔之后和维儿对话来结束挑战.***

ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜!你成功的说服了维儿更早的解锁她的衣柜!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow is is going to the Mojave Outpost.
She has taken her perk with her.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿已经前往了莫哈维前哨站.
她提供的所有PEAK也都已失效.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow has gone to the suite at the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿已经前往幸运38的总统套房.

ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿已经回到幸运38等待你.(非解雇惩罚)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow has given you the Silver Tongue Perk.
She has traveled extensively and negotiates her way through life using her native charms and her way with words.
While she is your companion you gain +1 to Charisma.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维儿提供给你了"巧舌如簧"PEAK
维儿使用他与生俱来的魅力和特别的交涉技巧还有丰富的旅途经验,来协助自己的旅程.
并且当维儿和你一起旅行时为你提供1点魅力和30点的口才加成

ESP.TRADUIT: 挖出来并收进物品栏.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow has gone home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿已经回家了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a bear from the Nevada Bear Company's prestigious Gold Label Collection. This limited edition collection of seven bears was created exclusively for the Nevada Bear Company by our designers in consultation with many of today's most highly acclaimed experts and designers from fields as unlikely and diverse as Science, Architecture, Fashion Design, and the Military. We bring you this most unusual line hoping that you, the most discriminating collector, will enjoy them for years to come. You can gift the bears to Willow. If you mark the bungalow as Willow's home they may be displayed there from her inventory. You may display them at any time. At the end of the challenge, they can be turned into nonquest items.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜!你现在拥有了内华达泰迪熊公司出品的超级无敌黄金泰迪熊收藏.这些限量版的收藏品由7只不同的泰迪熊组成,这些泰迪熊是由内华达泰迪熊公司的艺术家,画家,收藏家,科学家还有世界顶尖的技师和设计师共同设计和创造的,当然还有军方人士的特别修改. 我们带给您这些最与众不同且最具收藏价值的泰迪熊收藏,希望你们能够享受这些收藏. 你可以把它们作为礼物送给维儿,如果你把维儿的家设置在平房这些物品可以在送给维儿之后仍旧展出,另外它们也可以被设置为非任务物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sleep
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就想睡觉.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clean up mattress
ESP.TRADUIT: 收拾掉铺盖卷

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pencil Challenge complete 50/50! Go talk to Willow about the pencils!
ESP.TRADUIT: 铅笔挑战已经完成 50/50! 去和维儿交谈来完成任务!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Explorer Collectible Challenge Unlocked!
There are 9 items spread throughout the gameworld for you to find which are tracked by this challenge. They are distinguished by a present icon and a special sound when you pick them up. (There is a tenth untracked item available if you have the Wild Wasteland trait).
You may keep these items for yourself or gift them to Willow. If you choose to mark the bungalow as Willow's home they may be displayed there from her inventory, you may display them at any time. At the end of the challenge, if you prefer to keep them, you can turn them into nonquest items.
ESP.TRADUIT:
探索者收集挑战已经解锁!
这个挑战包含了9个收集物品散落在莫哈维各地.当你拿取他们的时候会有图标和特别音效提醒(如果你有狂野荒原特征那你可以收集到第10个收集物品)
你可以自己留着这些物品或者送给维儿.如果你把维儿的家设定在平房你可以在送给维儿之后仍就放在平房展出.最后你如果想自己留着这些物品你可以利用菜单把他们变成非任务物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've received 5 Willow Happy Points.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提升了维儿5点的好感度.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations! You and Willow are Best Friends Forever! She will never leave you unless you fire her. She will follow you regardless of which faction you support. She is completely loyal and devoted to you.
In addition to that, several benefits of being friends will now be unlocked which you will discover in dialogue with her.
Plus there's more to come if you continue to gain points with her.
Have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜!你现在和维儿是终身挚友了!她永远都不会离开你除非你解雇她.无论你加入任何阵营她都会追随你,并对你无比忠诚且愿意为你做出牺牲.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow watched you and Lucius while he taught you the Legion Assault special move. Her Unarmed skill is high enough that she was able to learn quite a bit more from your session with him. Her Unarmed skill has increased by 15.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在卢卡斯教你军团突袭招式的时候,维儿在一旁认真的观察和学习.由于她的空手技能已经足够高可以相当轻松的学习这个招式,所以她的空手技能上升了15点.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's easy to brew coffee in your Deluxe Room at the Dino Dee-lite Motel!
You will need to have of each of the following items in your inventory in order to make three cups of refreshing coffee with the in-room brewing machine:
Broc Flower, Nuka Cola, Pinyon Nuts, Purified Water, Sunset Sarsaparilla, Xander Root and three coffee mugs
ESP.TRADUIT:
在恐龙迪莱特旅馆你可以非常轻松的利用豪华房间的咖啡机来泡制咖啡!
你需要以下材料来用咖啡机泡制咖啡: 锦缎花.核子可乐,松籽,纯净水,夕阳沙士,山德根还有3个咖啡杯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brew a pot of coffee...
ESP.TRADUIT: 泡制一杯咖啡

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have the necessary ingredients to make a pot of coffee...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有足够的材料来泡制一杯咖啡.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, wait there. I'll come to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,在那里等着,我会来找你的.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you keep doing what you're doing now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为何不保持现状呢.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, please meet me at my current location. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,请到我现在所在的地点来见我.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations, you have just purchased a fine canine companion!
You will be able to set a house marker for J.T. or send him to the Lucky 38 suite to wait once you have access to it. If you fire him he will go to the Mojave Outpost.
The Big Guy has given you J.T.'s squeaky baseball. J.T. likes the squeak and will return to you promptly if you use it.
Enjoy!
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜!你刚刚买到了一只忠实的猎犬!
当你得到幸运38的总统套房时J.T.会去总统套房等你.如果你解雇了他则会去莫哈维前哨站.
大个子把J.T.的咬咬球给了你.如果你使用了咬咬球,J.T.会像所有其他狗一样追着球,咬着球,然后叼回来给你.(用完记得擦擦球上的口水)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You examine Willow's leg and see that the wound was never cleaned properly. You clean the wound of debris and use antibiotics to clear up the infection. Willow should no longer experience any discomfort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仔细的观察了维儿腿上的伤口,发现伤口并未被清理干净,你认真的清理了伤口并且使用了一支抗生素,维儿的伤口应该会很快痊愈.

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. has gone home.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.已经回家了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can clean up the box when you are done with it. If you do, maybe you'll get more presents from Willow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完事了可以随时随地的清理箱子,你在清理的时候可能会找到可以送给维儿的东西.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open box
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开箱子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clean up box
ESP.TRADUIT: 清理箱子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are either missing NVSE entirely or could use a newer version to fully enjoy the features added to Willow via NVSE. The version you need for Willow is NVSE v2b12. The information about where to download it is available on Willow's mod page at Nexus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你缺少NVSE或者NVSE的版本太旧,维儿的MOD需要至少NVSE V2B12版本才能完全运行.在Nexus网上维儿MOD的网页里可以找到NVSE的下载链接.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Pencil challenge is going great! 40/50
ESP.TRADUIT: 铅笔挑战非常接近成功啦! 40/50

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's easy to purify water in your Deluxe Room at the Dino Dee-lite Motel!
You will need to have at least one bottle of dirty water or irradiated dirty water in order to use the in-room purifying machine.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在汽车旅馆的豪华房间里,你可以非常轻易的净化你身上的污水!
使用房间里的净化机器你需要至少一瓶污水或者辐射水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify one bottle dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化一瓶污水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify five bottles dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化5瓶污水

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify all of my bottles of dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化我身上所有的污水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify one bottle irradiated dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化1瓶辐射水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify five bottles irradiated dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化5瓶辐射水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purify all of my bottles of irradited dirty water
ESP.TRADUIT: 净化我身上所有的辐射水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no water to be purified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有任何污水可以净化.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You currently have %.0f happy points with Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿对你有 %.0f 点好感度

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: We hope you enjoy your purified water courtesy of the Dino Dee-lite Motel!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们希望你能享受这些纯净水.恐龙迪莱特汽车旅馆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take your purified water (one bottle due)
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿取你的纯净水(拿一瓶)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take your purified water (five bottles due)
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿取你的纯净水(直接拿五瓶)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take your purified water
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿取你的纯净水.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No purified water is available at this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这段时间没有纯净水供应.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
1) Willow will sleep/wait for you if you leave her while she sleeps. Her location will be marked on your Pipboy. You can wake her any time by talking to her otherwise she will sleep for approximately five ingame hours. 2) You must use her special wake up dialogue to get her to follow you again. The companion wheel dialogue will not work to do this. The wake up dialogue is a greeting she will give you if you enter dialogue from the companion wheel. If you use her radio to call her when sleeping use this dialogue to get her dressed again. 3) You must clean up the bedroll after she gets up or you will get bloated save games.
Don't forget to clean up her bedroll and have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT:
请耐心读完:维儿在等待你的时候会睡觉,她的位置会在你的哔哔小子上标出.你可以通过和她对话来叫醒她,她的睡觉时间大约在5个游戏时间左右.
注意!在她醒来之后你必须收拾掉她的铺盖卷!否则将造成游戏存档损坏!

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You must clean up Willow's Campfire after she has set it up. If you leave it in the gameworld, your saved games will get bloated.
Also, when Willow sets out her campfire she will automatically remove her ingredients from your inventory so she can cook with them.
Have fun and don't forget to clean up the campfires!
ESP.TRADUIT:
在使用营火之后你必须把它收拾掉.如果你把营火留在游戏中了则会造成存档损坏. 同样，当维儿使用篝火时，她会自动从您的库存中删除食材并烹饪。
玩得开心，别忘了清理篝火！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clean up the meal whenever you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 按你自己的习惯来收拾干净食物.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clean up meal
ESP.TRADUIT: 把食物收拾干净

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow is now marked essential. She CANNOT die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿现在是不死的,她不会永久性死亡.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow is now marked unessential. She CAN and may die now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿现在不是不死的了.现在她可以并且会永久死亡.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow has learned some tricks from Ranger Andy and her Unarmed skills have increased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿在游骑兵安迪身上学到几招,她的空手技能得到了提升.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've helped Willow recover her stolen items and she is very grateful. She now considers you a friend.
To become best friends you might want to make a grand gesture to her. But what?
She might appreciate something that shows her how much you'd like her to stay here in the Mojave with you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你帮助维儿追回了她失窃的物品她十分感激,现在你和她成为朋友了.
你需要做不少事情来成为她最好的朋友.但是怎么做呢？
如果你非常希望她和你一起呆在莫哈维你可以表现出来，说不定她很乐意接受呢.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow is storing the Gecko Meat you give her in the bungalow crafting cupboard above the stove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿把你给她的所有蜥蜴肉都储存在了平房火炉上面的食品柜里.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Use this menu to sort items into containers (Requires NVSE):
You may dump the contents of Willow's scavenging container or the Aid and Miscellaneous Items she is carrying in her regular inventory into your own inventory. Once you've done that you can sort them along with your items or use them, sell them, etc.
ESP.TRADUIT:
用这个菜单来把物品分类到各个箱子里(需要NVSE)
你也许已经把维儿的回收箱或者维儿的辅助和零碎物品从维儿的物品栏转移到了你自己的物品栏.你可以用这个来把他们和你的物品一起从新分类,当然你也可以卖掉他们,随你喜好.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dump the contents of Willow's Scavenging container into my inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把维儿的回收箱内的东西转移到我的物品栏.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dump Willow's Aid and Misc items she's carrying into my inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把维儿的辅助和零碎物件转移到我的物品栏.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Aid Items (all items, chems, food, crafting ingredients, etc)
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类辅助物品(所有物品,药品,食物,材料,制造图)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Aid Items (ONLY Food Crafting ingredients)
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类辅助物品(食物,材料,食材)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Ammo...
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类弹药

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Armor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类装甲

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Currency...
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类货币

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Miscellaneous Items...
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类其他零碎的玩意

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort Weapons...
ESP.TRADUIT: 分类武器

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow was successfully trained by Veronica who spent several hours with Willow and taught her many useful tricks, moves and attacks. Willow's Unarmed skills have increased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡成功的训练了维儿,并且教了她几个有用的招式,维儿的空手技能得到了提升.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Use this menu to display eligible items you or Willow are carrying in your inventory. (Willow will only display items if her house marker is set here in the bungalow)
Please note that if you choose to make Challenge items nonquest items you can break your challenges. Items, when dropped and picked up again, can be counted multiple times toward the challenge.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你可以用这个菜单把在你和维儿物品栏里对应的物品放在展示架上.(当你把维儿的家设置在平房里的时候维儿才会这么做)
请注意:如果你把挑战物品修改为非任务物品会影响你的当前挑战进程,另外挑战物品被扔下并再次拾起可能会造成挑战的重复计数.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Display items I'm holding...
ESP.TRADUIT: 展出玩家物品栏的挑战物品

ESP.ORIGINAL: Display items Willow is holding...
ESP.TRADUIT: 展出维儿物品栏的挑战物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make Challenge items nonquest items...
ESP.TRADUIT: 把挑战收集品变为非任务物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Display Willow's Wish List quest items...
ESP.TRADUIT: 展出维儿的愿望单中的所有物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Display Snowglobes here in the bungalow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 展出平房里所有的雪景球

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove Snowglobes from bungalow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿取平房所有的雪景球.

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T到达了Lucky38

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Willow's Gold Plated Cheater's Edition! I'd suggest you don't cheat and play through properly if you haven't played the mod before. However, if you choose to cheat, containers and a terminal will appear to help you. First take Beauty, Moira and Chester from the gold ammo container next to the shelves and give them to Willow through dialogue. Once that's done use the terminal to move to BFFs, talk to her again about being best friends and be sure to go back into dialogue after the fade to black kiss to choose the Romance or Friends path and then return to the terminal to choose what else to do (you won't be able to choose to skip ahead to finish the quest until you've made that decision). The Shopping Quest and Unarmed Quest can be completed at the terminal after you have received them in dialogue from Willow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到维儿的作弊版本！如果您以前没有玩过Mod，我建议您不要作弊。但是，如果您选择作弊，那么容器和终端将出现为您提供帮助。首先从架子旁边的弹药箱中拿出红颜步枪，莫伊拉和切斯特，然后通过对话将它们交给维儿。完成此操作后，使用终端移至挚友，再次与她谈谈成为最好的朋友，并确保在接吻黑屏后选择“浪漫”或“朋友”路径后再返回对话，然后返回终端选择其他内容要做的事情（您必须先做出决定，然后才能选择跳过以完成任务）。在您从维儿的对话中收到购物任务和徒手训练任务后，便可以在终端上完成它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to cheat! You can cheat other quests besides the main one (enables items necessary to do so)
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要作弊！除了主要任务外，您还可以作弊其他任务（启用必要的项目）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I changed my mind! I do not want to cheat! (PERMANENTLY disables opportunity to cheat)
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变注意了。我不想作弊！（永久禁止作弊的机会）

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't decide right now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在还没法决定这个.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow used one Antivenom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿使用了一支解毒剂.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, follow me, but don't attack anything, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,跟着我,并且无论如何都别开枪好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to fight again. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你重新加入战斗.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay where you are, please, and don't attack anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请在原地呆着,并且无论如何都别开枪.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for waiting, but I want your help now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的等待,现在我又需要你的帮助了.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of there. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上离开那里!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to fight again. Now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你重新加入战斗.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop fighting and return to my position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止战斗并且回到我的位置.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep doing what you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持现在的状态.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to my position immediately!
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到我的位置来!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Companions in this mod are set to be Essential by default. They cannot die in Hardcore mode. You may change this in their Tactics menu when you are in Hardcore mode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个同伴MOD的所有人物都是设置为不死的,甚至在核心难度,你可以在核心难度同伴的战术面板里修改这一选项.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow watched you and Lucius while he taught you the Legion Assault special move. Because her Unarmed skill is still below 50 most of what he showed you went over her head. Her Unarmed skill has only increased by 5.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在卢卡斯教你军团突袭招式的时候维儿认真的观察和学习了招式.但是由于她的空手技能低于50点学习的招式无法精通,所以她的空手技能只上升了5点.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Willow will not use Shorty if you add the modded silencer to it in the game. However, if she is given a version of Shorty with the silencer already attached she will use it.
Use the menu option below to get a version of Shorty, with the silencer attached, that Willow will use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你给维儿其他的消音武器维儿将不会再使用维儿的手枪,但是如果维儿的手枪加装了消音器维儿将会仍然使用它.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the weapon
ESP.TRADUIT: 把武器给我

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need a shovel to dig here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要一把铲子才能挖开它.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shovel Required
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要一把铲子

ESP.ORIGINAL: This item is unharvestable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此不可收割。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shovel Required
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要一把铲子

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. is now marked unessential. He CAN and may die now.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.用掉了肉山盾.所以它现在可以死亡.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cook
ESP.TRADUIT: 烹饪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cook Ant Stew and set up meal for two on the table (requires ingredients for two batches of Stew)
ESP.TRADUIT: 做两人份的蚂蚁煲并且放在餐桌上(需要两份蚂蚁煲的材料)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. is now marked essential. He CANNOT die.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.拿到了肉山盾.所以它不会再死亡.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cook
ESP.TRADUIT: 烹饪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cook Ant Stew and set up meal for two on the table (requires ingredients for two batches of Stew)
ESP.TRADUIT: 做两人份的蚂蚁煲并且放在餐桌上(需要两份蚂蚁煲的材料)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations! You've completed Willow's Teddy Collectible Challenge!
Enjoy your rewards! And, remember, if you've chosen to keep all the bears in your inventory you can turn them into nonquest items with the menu in the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜!你完成了维儿的泰迪熊收集挑战!
请享受你的奖励!如果你打算把这些东西留在物品栏里你可以利用平房里的菜单来把他们修改成非任务物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations! You've completed Willow's Explorer Collectible Challenge!
Enjoy your rewards! And, remember, if you've chosen to keep all the bears in your inventory you can turn them into nonquest items with the menu in the bungalow.
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜!你完成了维儿的探索者收集挑战!
请享受你的奖励!如果你打算把这些东西留在物品栏里你可以利用平房里的菜单来把他们修改成非任务物品.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Kyle Tracker 2000 can move you to Kyle's location now that he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯尔追踪器2000可以把你传送到凯尔的尸体附近.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move to Kyle's location
ESP.TRADUIT: 传送到凯尔的位置.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove Kyle Tracker 2000 from my inventory
ESP.TRADUIT: 从物品栏移除凯尔追踪器2000.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dig up and put into inventory
ESP.TRADUIT: 挖出来并且放进物品栏.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow has gone to the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿已经前往莫哈维前哨站.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are experiencing a pleasant afterglow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你享受了一个非常愉悦的日落~~~~

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've received Willow's Pencils Rule Perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得到了维儿的铅笔法则PERK.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow has finished shopping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿已经完成购物.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congratulations! You've completed Willow's shopping quest!
If you decide to take Willow shopping in the future she will need to have caps when she enters the store or approaches the trader. She needs 20 caps in each location. If she doesn't have the caps she will not approach the trader. If that happens, you will find a dialogue topic when you are in those locations, when she has insufficient caps, and you can use it to give her caps. It prompts her to go talk to the trader.
ESP.TRADUIT:
恭喜!你完成了维儿的购物任务!
在这之后如果你带维儿去购物她就会需要一些瓶盖.每一次购物都会花费20瓶盖.如果她没有足够的瓶盖来购物她则不会接近商人,并且在购物地点会触发维儿的语言提示,当然你可以通过给他一些瓶盖来让她进行购物.

ESP.ORIGINAL: J.T. is is going to the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: J.T.已经前往莫哈维前哨站.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've received Willow's I Carry More Junk!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cook at campfire

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Firing Willow is serious business. You can only fire her once and get her back again. After that she will not return to you. She doesn't like being fired; you are rejecting her when you do it.
If you need to adventure without her have her wait for you somewhere. She will wait forever because she doesn't have a wait timer like the vanilla companions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解雇维儿是一件严肃的事.你只能解雇她然后重新让她加入队伍一次,在这之后解雇她将不会再加入你的队伍,并且直接消失.并且如果你这么做了你的良心会受到谴责.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is certain
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是肯定的

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Use this menu to have Willow do a handful of actions in the bungalow.
NOTE: If you use this menu to have Willow sit in her chair at the table you MUST return to this menu to have her stand up out of the chair again.
ESP.TRADUIT:
使用这个菜单你可以在平房内让维儿做很多事.
主意:如果你用菜单让维儿坐在桌子旁边的凳子上的话,你必须重新使用菜单让她来离开凳子.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow relax in the bungalow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,请在平房里休息.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow stop relaxing and follow me again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,请结束在平房里的休息并且开始跟着我.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow cook something at the stove...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,用火炉帮我做些食物.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow sit down in her chair at the dining table...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,离开餐桌旁的凳子.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow get up from her chair at the dining table...
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,离开餐桌旁的凳子.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set out a meal for two of Willow's Ant Stew on the dining table...
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备两人份的蚂蚁煲,并且放在餐桌上.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow cooks, sets the table with Ant Stew and sits at the table (return to menu to unsit her)
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿,先去做蚂蚁煲并且放在桌上,然后在餐桌旁边坐下(返回菜单来取消她的行动)

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is decidedly so
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是肯定如此

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without a doubt
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有异议

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes - definitely
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,当然

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may rely on it
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以依靠这个

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I see it, yes
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我所见,是的

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most likely
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样最好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow is busy. You cannot communicate with her right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维儿很忙。您目前无法与她交流。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put CLOTHING/ARMOR for Willow inside this wardrobe via this menu. Once you have put items into the "drawers" you will be able to manage them in a topic in Willow's dialogue. An empty drawer will leave Willow naked if you choose that outfit in dialogue. PERMANENT OUTFIT: You MUST do the following to set it up: Dress Willow ONLY in the clothing items you want her to wear at all times. Use this menu & select Permanent Outfit. When you want to change it repeat that process. The script will return the old outfit to your inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用这个菜单把衣服或者护甲放进维儿的衣柜.一旦你把衣服放进了"衣柜"你可以在和维儿的对话里管理他们.如果维儿的"衣柜"里没有衣服但是你选择了穿上衣服,这样维儿就会全裸~~~ 如果你想更换维儿的日常衣服你必须遵守如下说明：给维儿穿上你想要让她穿的日常衣服.使用菜单来设置永久穿着.如果你想要更换衣服重复上述操作,被更换的衣服会自动返还到你的物品栏.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do Nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做.

ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行装备 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行装备 2

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outlook good
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去不错

ESP.TRADUIT: 标志指向是的

ESP.TRADUIT: 回应模糊,重新再试试.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've have fired Willow one too many times. She has left the Mojave for good, never to return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把维儿解雇太长时间.她已经离开了莫哈维,并且永远不会回来.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Gecko Slayer Challenge Unlocked!
Willow hates geckos and is happy to cook up any meat you bring to her, but do you possess the courage and determination to take it to the next level?
If you do, show it by slaying enough geckos to bring her 100 pieces of gecko meat. Do this and she will surely reward you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
蜥蜴大屠杀挑战解锁！
维儿不喜欢蜥蜴并且非常乐意烹饪任何你带给她的蜥蜴肉，但是你有勇气和胆量来进一步挑战吗？
如果是的，那就去杀足够多的蜥蜴并且带给维儿100片蜥蜴肉.如果你完成了她会好好的"奖励"你~~~

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask again later
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚点再问我.
